card.desc:
You sharpen your sword to extremely high level, able to even cut a needle in half.
COSTS 1 [BONUS ACTION](https://trello.com/c/fYSLNTR5/297-bonus-actions "‌")

Use **D10+1(%)** ki per turn to add **+25%** to **damage rolls**, but **-40%** to **DEX** attacking rolls.

Toggling it on uses an Bonus Action

**– Mastery –**
**1 Mastery**: Costs **D10+1(%)** ki per turn, **+30%** to **damage rolls**.
**2 Mastery**: Costs **D10(%)** ki per turn, **+35%** to **damage rolls**.
**3 Mastery**: Costs **D9(%)**  ki per turn, **+40%** to **damage rolls**, **-30%** to **DEX** attacking rolls.

card.desc:
# **Smithing System Overview**

### **1. Tools and Requirements**

Each tool has an INT requirement and specific resource cost to be used:

- **Anvil**: Required for all weapon and armor crafting, minimum INT 5, costs 250 resources.
- **Smelting Forge**: Required for melting ores and forming ingots, minimum INT 6, costs 400 resources.
- **Tongs**: Needed for handling hot metals safely, minimum INT 2, costs 30 resources.
- **Ingot Mold**: Required for creating metal ingots, minimum INT 5, costs 70 resources.
- **Armor Mold**: Needed to shape armor, minimum INT 4, costs 50 resources.

---

### **2. Crafting Process**

1. **Prepare Ores**: Smelt ores into ingots using the **Smelting Forge** and **Ingot Mold**. Each ore type provides unique stat bonuses and durability modifiers.
2. **Crafting Phase**:
   - **Weapons**: Use the **Anvil** and chosen ore ingot to craft. Weapon stats are rolled based on the weapon type, as outlined in the weapon stats table. Ore bonuses and rarity modifiers apply at this step.
   - **Armor**: Shape using the **Armor Mold** on the Anvil. Armor durability and resistance stats are based on the ore type and quality roll.

---

#### **3. Ore Types and Bonuses**

Each ore brings specific bonuses or penalties to crafted items, impacting stats, durability, and unique properties:

‌

**Iron**: | Standard ore, commonly available.|

**Steel**: +**2 STR DMG** to weapons | +**20% CON** for armor |**+2 Durability**
| Balanced between durability and power.|

**Mithril**: **+1 DEX** for weapons | **+20% DEX** for armor | - 5 Durability
| Lightweight, favored for agility-based weapons.|

**Adamantine**: **+3 STR DMG** and  **+2 DEX** for weapons | **+30% CON** for armor | +10 Durability | Extremely durable, effective for heavy weapons and armor.

**Katchin**: **+4 STR DMG** and **+2 DEX** for weapons | **+35% DEX** for armor | +4
Durability | Rare ore with extraordinary resilience and flexibility.|

**Soulstone**: **+15% SPI DMG** for weapons |**+20% WIL** for armor | - 15 Durability | Enhances ki/spiritual attacks; fragile but powerful.|

**Orichalcum**: **+2 STR DMG** and **-2 DEX** for weapons, | **+20% CON** and **-20% DEX** for armor | +10 Durability | Infuses weapons with **Brute** like power. |

**Ebonite**: **+15% WIL** and **+1 DEX** for weapons | **+20% SPI** for armor | -10 Durability	| Amplifies ki-focused attacks; delicate structure. |

---

## **Upon crafting, roll d20+int to determine the item quality, affecting base stats**

Weapons:

**Masterwork (33-35)**: +4 STR DMG, +2 DEX

**Fine (29-32)**: +2 STR DMG, +1 DEX

**Good (21-28)**: +1 STR DMG

**Ok (15-20)**: No modifier

**Bad (9-14)**: -1 STR DMG

**Worthless (1-8):** -2 STR DMG, +1 DEX

###

ARMOR:

**Masterwork (33-35)**: +10 to all damage reduction rolls, +5 durability.

**Fine (29-32)**: +8 to all damage reduction rolls, +3 durability.

**Good (21-28)**: +5 to all damage reduction rolls.

**Ok (15-20)**: No bonus.

**Bad (9-14)**: -10 to all damage reduction rolls, -2 durability.

**Worthless (1-8)**: -20 to all damage reduction rolls, -3 durability.
card.name: SMITHING

card.desc:
When doing quests, they can either be negatively aligned or positively aligned.

Low rank negatively/positively aligned quests give **-2/+2** alignment per quest.

Challenging negatively/positively aligned quests give **-4/+4** alignment per quest.

Very challenging negatively/positively aligned quests give **-12/+12** alignment per quest.

Story quests give **-25/+25** alignment depending on which side you took.

Canon actions give **+30/-30** alignment depending on which side you took.

---

Alignment can control how certain NPCs/Mentors talk to you. Some don’t care about your alignment, but most do. Also, your alignment can get you in trouble with the law. Goku Will Also Attempt to stop you from being evil.
card.name: Alignment

When below **-900** alignment, the galactic patrol will be sent after you.

card.desc:
Traveling through the world is part of **Dragon Ball**, and you can find many new places and wonders of the world through traveling.

When on a planet, you can roll a dice to travel to a new area or existing with the following dice:

Earth’s Moon: D25 | +6 on ore rolls
**Earth**: **D75**

Random Moon: D15 | +5 on ore rolls
Random Barron Planet: D40 | +4 on ore rolls
Random Low Tech Planet: D45 | +2 on ore rolls
Random High Tech Planet: D60 | -2 on ore rolls

**Namek**: **D75**
Namek’s Blue Moon: D15 | +10 ore rolls
Namek’s Orange Moon: D25 | +5 ore rolls

**Yardrat**: **D50**

Frieza Empire Controlled Planet: D75

---

You can find very useful places, usually with some sort of canonical relevance to the story or a mentor to teach new abilities. If you roll on any of these within their specified planets (if not already found), ping Chilly in the Discord. Here’s a list of all important places right now:

**World Tournament Arena**: 24, Earth
**Goku’s House**: 3, Earth (doesnt exist)
**Roshi’s Island**: 36, Earth
**West City**: 45, Earth
**North City**: 1, Earth
**East City**: 6, Earth
**Satan City:** 17, Earth
**South City**: 31, Earth
**Capsule Corp**: 46, Earth
**Kami’s Lookout**: 41, Earth
**Korin’s Tower**: 40, Earth
**Crane School**: 10, Earth

Traveling uses **8** KI every time. You can travel to an area adjacent to the current one you already are at for **4** Ki instead.
card.name: Traveling

old.desc:
Traveling through the world is part of **Dragon Ball**, and you can find many new places and wonders of the world through traveling.

When on a planet, you can roll a dice to travel to a new area or existing with the following dice:

**Earth**: **d75**
**Namek**: **d75**
**Yardrat**: **d50**

You can find very useful places, usually with some sort of canonical relevance to the story or a mentor to teach new abilities. If you roll on any of these within their specified planets (if not already found), ping Chilly in the Discord. Here’s a list of all important places right now:

**World Tournament Arena**: 24, Earth
**Goku’s House**: 3, Earth (doesnt exist)
**Roshi’s Island**: 36, Earth
**West City**: 45, Earth
**North City**: 1, Earth
**East City**: 6, Earth
**Satan City:** 17, Earth
**South City**: 31, Earth
**Capsule Corp**: 46, Earth
**Kami’s Lookout**: 41, Earth
**Korin’s Tower**: 40, Earth
**Crane School**: 10, Earth

Traveling uses **8** KI every time. You can travel to an area adjacent to the current one you already are at for **4** Ki instead.

card.desc:
# **Smithing System Overview**

### **1. Tools and Requirements**

Each tool has an INT requirement and specific resource cost to be used:

- **Anvil**: Required for all weapon and armor crafting, minimum INT 5, costs 250 resources.
- **Smelting Forge**: Required for melting ores and forming ingots, minimum INT 6, costs 400 resources.
- **Tongs**: Needed for handling hot metals safely, minimum INT 2, costs 30 resources.
- **Ingot Mold**: Required for creating metal ingots, minimum INT 5, costs 70 resources.
- **Armor Mold**: Needed to shape armor, minimum INT 4, costs 50 resources.

---

### **2. Crafting Process**

1. **Prepare Ores**: Smelt ores into ingots using the **Smelting Forge** and **Ingot Mold**. Each ore type provides unique stat bonuses and durability modifiers.
2. **Crafting Phase**:
   - **Weapons**: Use the **Anvil** and chosen ore ingot to craft. Weapon stats are rolled based on the weapon type, as outlined in the weapon stats table. Ore bonuses and rarity modifiers apply at this step.
   - **Armor**: Shape using the **Armor Mold** on the Anvil. Armor durability and resistance stats are based on the ore type and quality roll.

---

#### **3. Ore Types and Bonuses**

Each ore brings specific bonuses or penalties to crafted items, impacting stats, durability, and unique properties:

‌

**Iron**: | Standard ore, commonly available.|

**Steel**: +**2 STR DMG** to weapons | +**20% CON** for armor |**+2 Durability**
| Balanced between durability and power.|

**Mithril**: **+1 DEX** for weapons | **+20% DEX** for armor | - 5 Durability
| Lightweight, favored for agility-based weapons.|

**Adamantine**: **+3 STR DMG** and  **+2 DEX** for weapons | **+30% CON** for armor | +10 Durability | Extremely durable, effective for heavy weapons and armor.

**Katchin**: **+4 STR DMG** and\*\*+2 DEX\*\*  for weapons | **+35% DEX** for armor | +4
Durability | Rare ore with extraordinary resilience and flexibility.|

**Soulstone**: **+15% SPI DMG** for weapons |**+20% WIL** for armor | - 15 Durability | Enhances ki/spiritual attacks; fragile but powerful.|

**Orichalcum**: **+2 STR DMG** and **-2 DEX** for weapons, | **+20% CON** and **-20% DEX** for armor | +10 Durability | Infuses weapons with **Brute** like power. |

**Ebonite**: **+15% WIL** and **+1 DEX** for weapons | **+20% SPI** for armor | -10 Durability	| Amplifies ki-focused attacks; delicate structure. |

---

## **Upon crafting, roll d20+int to determine the item quality, affecting base stats**

Weapons:

**Masterwork (33-35)**: +4 STR DMG, +2 DEX

**Fine (29-32)**: +2 STR DMG, +1 DEX

**Good (21-28)**: +1 STR DMG

**Ok (15-20)**: No modifier

**Bad (9-14)**: -1 STR DMG

**Worthless (1-8):** -2 STR DMG, +1 DEX

###

ARMOR:

**Masterwork (33-35)**: +10 to all damage reduction rolls, +5 durability.

**Fine (29-32)**: +8 to all damage reduction rolls, +3 durability.

**Good (21-28)**: +5 to all damage reduction rolls.

**Ok (15-20)**: No bonus.

**Bad (9-14)**: -10 to all damage reduction rolls, -2 durability.

**Worthless (1-8)**: -20 to all damage reduction rolls, -3 durability.
card.name: SMITHING

card.desc:
You can search **7 times per new area**. This limit resets every midnight. Searching takes **3 Ki**.

By searching, you can find gear, quests, and characters/mentors.
For quests, check [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline") and [https://trello.com/c/ugKoYqi8/110-alignment](https://trello.com/c/ugKoYqi8/110-alignment "smartCard-inline")!

Roll a **1d100.**

_**Legendary Item**_

_**Saga Mission**_

if the number is **higher than or equal to 93 but lower than 98**, you found a **story quest**! This quest’s difficulty changes based on the saga and can even be the reason for a saga change. Notify your friends or create enemies! You will fight a character, depending on your alignment, from the original Dragon Ball anime, respective to the saga and timeline. **THESE CAN ONLY BE ROLLED ON EARTH AS OF NOW. IF NOT ON EARTH, ROLL A d2. 1 = Mentor (if none, do a challenging quest) 2 = Challenging Quest.**
(Or Optionally Do a Backstory involved mission, must be approved my Tae, chilly or wolfie.)

Completing these quests gives (**d90+30 x saga number**) stat points and **500d100** zeni to whoever helped/opposed.
Make sure to read [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline")!

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\__

_**Mentorship**_
If the number is **higher than or equal to** **80 but lower than 93 you found a** mentor! You’ll have to fight them and win to see if you can learn anything from them. This fight also counts as spar training. **Please contact a DM for stat rolls.**

_**Very Challenging Mission**_

If the number is **higher than or equal to 75 but lower than 80**, you found a **Very** **challenging quest**! Roll a **d2** to see what type of quest it is.

Negatively aligned = 1
Positively aligned = 2

Both quests give (**d30+10 x saga number**) stat points and **15000** zeni.
Make sure to read [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline")!

_**Challenging Mission**_

If the number is **higher than or equal to 65 but lower than 75** you found a **challenging quest**! Roll a **d2** to see what type of quest it is.

Negatively aligned = 1
Positively aligned = 2

Both quests give (**d20 + 8 x saga number**) stat points and **10000** zeni.
Make sure to read [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline")!

_**Casual Mission**_

If the number is **higher than or equal to 50 but lower than 65**, you found a **low rank quest**! Roll a **d2** to see what type of quest it is.

Negatively aligned = 1
Positively aligned = 2

Both quests give (**d10 + 5 x saga number**) stat points and **5000** zeni.
**Engaging in combat gives you d15 die instead of d10**.
Make sure to read [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline")!

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\__

_**Normal Item**_

If the number is **higher than or equal to 30 but lower than 50**, you found an **item**! Roll a **d20** to see what item it is.

_**Saga Mission**_

if the number is **higher than or equal to 93 but lower than 98**, you found a **story quest**! This quest’s difficulty changes based on the saga and can even be the reason for a saga change. Notify your friends or create enemies! You will fight a character, depending on your alignment, from the original Dragon Ball anime, respective to the saga and timeline. **THESE CAN ONLY BE ROLLED ON EARTH AS OF NOW. IF NOT ON EARTH, ROLL A d2. 1 = Mentor (if none, do a challenging quest) 2 = Challenging Quest.**
(Or Optionally Do a Backstory involved mission, must be approved my Tae, chilly or wolfie.)

Completing these quests gives (**d90+30 x saga number**) stat points and **500d100** zeni to whoever helped/opposed.
Make sure to read [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline")!

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\__

_**Mentorship**_
If the number is **higher than or equal to** **80 but lower than 93 you found a** mentor! You’ll have to fight them and win to see if you can learn anything from them. This fight also counts as spar training. **Please contact a DM for stat rolls.**

_**Very Challenging Mission**_

If the number is **higher than or equal to 75 but lower than 80**, you found a **Very** **challenging quest**! Roll a **d2** to see what type of quest it is.

Negatively aligned = 1
Positively aligned = 2

Both quests give (**d30+10 x saga number**) stat points and **15000** zeni.
Make sure to read [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline")!

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\__

_**Challenging Mission**_

If the number is **higher than or equal to 65 but lower than 75** you found a **challenging quest**! Roll a **d2** to see what type of quest it is.

Negatively aligned = 1
Positively aligned = 2

Both quests give (**d20 + 8 x saga number**) stat points and **10000** zeni.
Make sure to read [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline")!
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\__

_**Casual Mission**_

If the number is **higher than or equal to 50 but lower than 65**, you found a **low rank quest**! Roll a **d2** to see what type of quest it is.

Negatively aligned = 1
Positively aligned = 2

Both quests give (**d10 + 5 x saga number**) stat points and **5000** zeni.
**Engaging in combat gives you d15 die instead of d10**.
Make sure to read [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline")!

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\__

_**Normal Item**_

If the number is **higher than or equal to 30 but lower than 50**, you found an **item**! Roll a **d20** to see what item it is.

Small wallet (5000 zeni) = 1
[5x] Resources = 2
Recovery capsule = 3
Shovel = 4
Hetap™ = 5
Vita Drink = 6
Sage Water = 7
Ki recovery capsule = 8

[Broken] Motherboard = 10
Component = 11
[2x] Copper Wires = 12
[Destroyed] [Unrepairable] Engine Conjuction = 13
Mixed capsule = 14
Hunting Traps = 15
Fishing Rod = 16
Small Training Weight = 17
Healer’s Kit = 18
Skining Knife =19
Senzu bean = 20
Steel = 21
Mithril = 22
Soulstone = 23
Orichalcum = 24
Ebonite= 25

If the number is **lower than 30**, you found **nothing**.

\-Needs **1x** Campfire-

_**SPACE TRAVEL | ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY**_

card.desc:
# **During an NPC enemy's turn, if they have multiple targets, roll a dX (where X is the number of targets) to determine whom they will attack.**

# **Next, based on the NPC's fighting style (if applicable), roll a dY+1 (where Y is the number of available moves) to decide which move they will use against you.**

# **After the NPC's turn is complete, proceed to the next player's turn.**
card.name: NPC combat help

old.desc:
During an NPC enemy's turn, if they have multiple targets, roll a dX (where X is the number of targets) to determine whom they will attack.

Next, based on the NPC's fighting style (if applicable), roll a dY+1 (where Y is the number of available moves) to decide which move they will use against you.

After the NPC's turn is complete, proceed to the next player's turn.

card.name: NPC combat help

card.desc:
You can search **7 times per new area**. This limit resets every midnight. Searching takes **3 Ki**.

By searching, you can find gear, quests, and characters/mentors.
For quests, check [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline") and [https://trello.com/c/ugKoYqi8/110-alignment](https://trello.com/c/ugKoYqi8/110-alignment "smartCard-inline")!

Roll a **1d100.**

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\__

_**Legendary Item**_

If the NAT roll is **98** or higher, you found a **legendary item**! Roll a **d20** to see which legendary item it is(If Location Specific items are rolled, reroll):

1 = Dragon Ball that hasn’t been found yet ( Earth or Namek )
2 = [https://trello.com/c/ZKruvbgE/271-huge-treasure](https://trello.com/c/ZKruvbgE/271-huge-treasure "smartCard-inline")
3 = [https://trello.com/c/HlaDY97s/267-brave-sword](https://trello.com/c/HlaDY97s/267-brave-sword "smartCard-inline")
4 =  [https://trello.com/c/dnMmpPiS/283-eldritch-run-contains-the-power-of-the-stars](https://trello.com/c/dnMmpPiS/283-eldritch-run-contains-the-power-of-the-stars "smartCard-inline")
5 =  [https://trello.com/c/dQsBz2I4/273-ancient-wuxia-talisman](https://trello.com/c/dQsBz2I4/273-ancient-wuxia-talisman "smartCard-inline")
6 = [https://trello.com/c/lOXga68Y/172-masterwork-weapon](https://trello.com/c/lOXga68Y/172-masterwork-weapon "smartCard-inline")
7 = [https://trello.com/c/SBWa3LTF/16-seed-of-might](https://trello.com/c/SBWa3LTF/16-seed-of-might "smartCard-inline")
8 = [https://trello.com/c/Pgyjq96g/274-one-mans-trash](https://trello.com/c/Pgyjq96g/274-one-mans-trash "smartCard-inline")
9 = [https://trello.com/c/Se8RIDsI/268-bansho-fan](https://trello.com/c/Se8RIDsI/268-bansho-fan "smartCard-inline")
10 = Adamantine
11 = Katchin
12 = [https://trello.com/c/4m00Cu8W/269-magic-carpet](https://trello.com/c/4m00Cu8W/269-magic-carpet "smartCard-inline")
13= [https://trello.com/c/ZLHHEvRN/278-spear-of-longinus](https://trello.com/c/ZLHHEvRN/278-spear-of-longinus "smartCard-inline")
14 = [https://trello.com/c/b2aMYDTy](https://trello.com/c/b2aMYDTy "smartCard-inline")
15 = [https://trello.com/c/B9csO4Lf/173-masterwork-armor](https://trello.com/c/B9csO4Lf/173-masterwork-armor "smartCard-inline")
16 =  [https://trello.com/c/kN0qcZ1Q/279-true-capsule](https://trello.com/c/kN0qcZ1Q/279-true-capsule "smartCard-inline")
17 = [https://trello.com/c/QxN37RN0/17-dimension-shard](https://trello.com/c/QxN37RN0/17-dimension-shard "smartCard-inline")  (Hell Exclusive)
18 = [https://trello.com/c/IdUcmYzH/174-bag-of-senzu-16x](https://trello.com/c/IdUcmYzH/174-bag-of-senzu-16x "smartCard-inline") (Earth Exclusive)
19 = [https://trello.com/c/qRsRjvWM/187-gravitational-control-chip](https://trello.com/c/qRsRjvWM/187-gravitational-control-chip "smartCard-inline")
20 =  [https://trello.com/c/I2MOkurX/280-jeremy-wades-fishing-rod](https://trello.com/c/I2MOkurX/280-jeremy-wades-fishing-rod "smartCard-inline")
21 = [https://trello.com/c/IPGtZiBo/281-fountain-of-youth](https://trello.com/c/IPGtZiBo/281-fountain-of-youth "smartCard-inline")
22 = [https://trello.com/c/aYx1ioX9/270-blood-ruby](https://trello.com/c/aYx1ioX9/270-blood-ruby "smartCard-inline")

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\__

_**Saga Mission**_

if the number is **higher than or equal to 93 but lower than 98**, you found a **story quest**! This quest’s difficulty changes based on the saga and can even be the reason for a saga change. Notify your friends or create enemies! You will fight a character, depending on your alignment, from the original Dragon Ball anime, respective to the saga and timeline. **THESE CAN ONLY BE ROLLED ON EARTH AS OF NOW. IF NOT ON EARTH, ROLL A d2. 1 = Mentor (if none, do a challenging quest) 2 = Challenging Quest.**
(Or Optionally Do a Backstory involved mission, must be approved my Tae, chilly or wolfie.)

Completing these quests gives (**d90+30 x saga number**) stat points and **500d100** zeni to whoever helped/opposed.
Make sure to read [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline")!

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\__

_**Mentorship**_
If the number is **higher than or equal to** **80 but lower than 93 you found a** mentor! You’ll have to fight them and win to see if you can learn anything from them. This fight also counts as spar training. **Please contact a DM for stat rolls.**
1d9
1=[https://trello.com/c/HXxMcYpr/74-swordsman](https://trello.com/c/HXxMcYpr/74-swordsman "smartCard-inline")
2=[https://trello.com/c/PsPfPNGG/239-legionary-discipline](https://trello.com/c/PsPfPNGG/239-legionary-discipline "smartCard-inline")
3=[https://trello.com/c/1WdxfPnA/75-turtle](https://trello.com/c/1WdxfPnA/75-turtle "smartCard-inline")
4=[https://trello.com/c/XBxqThxM/76-crane](https://trello.com/c/XBxqThxM/76-crane "smartCard-inline")
5=[https://trello.com/c/LPEYYw0x/97-wolf](https://trello.com/c/LPEYYw0x/97-wolf "smartCard-inline")
6=[https://trello.com/c/QyZNO45m/78-wrestler](https://trello.com/c/QyZNO45m/78-wrestler "smartCard-inline")
7=[https://trello.com/c/2pHpep32/192-boxing](https://trello.com/c/2pHpep32/192-boxing "smartCard-inline")
8=[https://trello.com/c/asuMaVyP/194-tiger](https://trello.com/c/asuMaVyP/194-tiger "smartCard-inline")
9=[https://trello.com/c/OkxTO2ZW/236-taekwondo](https://trello.com/c/OkxTO2ZW/236-taekwondo "smartCard-inline")
10=[https://trello.com/c/FzJOmlST/235-karate](https://trello.com/c/FzJOmlST/235-karate "smartCard-inline") WIP
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\__

_**Very Challenging Mission**_

If the number is **higher than or equal to 75 but lower than 80**, you found a **Very** **challenging quest**! Roll a **d2** to see what type of quest it is.

Negatively aligned = 1
Positively aligned = 2

Both quests give (**d30+10 x saga number**) stat points and **15000** zeni.
Make sure to read [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline")!

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\__

_**Challenging Mission**_

If the number is **higher than or equal to 65 but lower than 75** you found a **challenging quest**! Roll a **d2** to see what type of quest it is.

Negatively aligned = 1
Positively aligned = 2

Both quests give (**d20 + 8 x saga number**) stat points and **10000** zeni.
Make sure to read [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline")!
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\__

_**Casual Mission**_

If the number is **higher than or equal to 50 but lower than 65**, you found a **low rank quest**! Roll a **d2** to see what type of quest it is.

Negatively aligned = 1
Positively aligned = 2

Both quests give (**d10 + 5 x saga number**) stat points and **5000** zeni.
**Engaging in combat gives you d15 die instead of d10**.
Make sure to read [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline")!

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\__

_**Normal Item**_

If the number is **higher than or equal to 30 but lower than 50**, you found an **item**! Roll a **d20** to see what item it is.

Small wallet (5000 zeni) = 1
[5x] Resources = 2
Recovery capsule = 3
Shovel = 4
Hetap™ = 5
Vita Drink = 6
Sage Water = 7
Ki recovery capsule = 8
[5/5 durabiltiy] Welding Torch = 9
[Broken] Motherboard = 10
Component = 11
[2x] Copper Wires = 12
[Destroyed] [Unrepairable] Engine Conjuction = 13
Mixed capsule = 14
Hunting Traps = 15
Fishing Rod = 16
Small Training Weight = 17
Healer’s Kit = 18
Skining Knife =19
Senzu bean = 20
Steel = 21
Mithril = 22
Soulstone = 23
Orichalcum = 24
Ebonite= 25

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\__

If the number is **lower than 30**, you found **nothing**.

card.desc:
When you first obtain a weapon, whether it be from making it, you must roll for its stats. The type of dice you roll depends on the weapon.

Attacking with a weapon and rolling less than a **3** on your NAT roll reduces durability by **1**.

Weapons:

**Basic Gloves:** Roll d2 for ATTACK mod, Roll d4 for inhibiting DEX mod

---

**Reinforced Gloves:** Roll d4+1 for ATTACK mod, Roll d5+1 for inhibiting DEX mod. Grrants an additional 1d4 STR bonus to punch attacks.

---

**Spiked Gloves:** Roll d5 for **ATTACK** mod, Roll d6+4 for inhibiting **DEX** mod.
Adds bleed effect (1 turn) on successful hit.

---

**Dragonhide Gloves:** Roll d6+2 for **ATTACK** mod, Roll d4+4 for inhibiting **DEX** mod. Increases crit range by +1 (crit success on NAT 19-20).

---

**Basic Boots:** Roll d3 for **ATTACK** mod, Roll d4+1 for inhibiting **DEX** mod

---

**Steel-Toe Boots:** Roll d5+1 for **ATTACK** mod, Roll d6+2 for inhibiting **DEX** mod. Grants additional 1d4 STR bonus to kick attacks.

---

**Bladed Boots:** Roll d6 for **ATTACK** mod, Roll d7+3 for inhibiting **DEX** mod bypasses armor on successful hit.

---

**Dragonhide Boots:** Roll d8+2 for **ATTACK** mod, Roll d8+4 for inhibiting **DEX** mod. Increases crit range by +1 (crit success on NAT 19-20).

---

**Club**: roll a d2 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation) , roll a d3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod.

---

**Spiked Club**: roll a d3 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod

---

**Power Pole**: roll a d4 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod

---

**Bo-Staff:** roll a d4 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod, your **DEX mod** is used for **ATTACK** damage.

---

**Nun-Chuck:** roll a d2 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod, your **DEX mod** is used for **ATTACK** damage.

---

**Duel Sai**: roll a 2 d2 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d4+1 for inhibiting attacking DEX mod Your attacks use half of your **ATTACK** mod and half of your **DEX** mod for ATTACK damage.**(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.)**

---

**Sword**: roll a d5 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d7+4 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod

---

**Katana**: roll a d2 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d7+5 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. Your attacks use half of your **ATTACK** mod and half of your **DEX** mod for **ATTACK** damage.

---

**Scythe**: roll a d7+1 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d8+4 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. **(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.) Crits with this weapon cause the dice to explode.**

---

**Nodachi**: roll a d4+1 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d9+5 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. Your attacks use half of your **ATTACK** mod and half of your **DEX** mod for damage. Add **+5** to durability roll. **(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.)**

---

**Spear**: roll d6+2 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d8+3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. **(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.)**

---

**Halberd**: roll d8+3 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d10+5 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. **(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.)**

---

**Greatsword**: roll a d9+3 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d10+5 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod.

---

**Greathammer**: roll a d10+3 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d11+8 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. **(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.)**

---

**Bansho Fan**: roll a d3 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d2+1 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. Your attacks use half of your **SPIRIT** mod and half of your **STR** mod for ATTACK damage.

---

**Brave Sword**: roll a d15+4 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d8+3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. Cannot break.

---

**Dimension Sword**: roll a d20+6 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d6+2 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. Cannot break.

Attacking with a weapon and rolling less than a **3** on your NAT roll reduces durability by **1**.

Weapons:

**Club**: roll a d2 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation) , roll a d3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod.

---

**Spiked Club**: roll a d3 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod

---

**Power Pole**: roll a d4 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod

---

**Bo-Staff:** roll a d4 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod, your **DEX mod** is used for **ATTACK** damage.

---

**Nun-Chuck:** roll a d2 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod, your **DEX mod** is used for **ATTACK** damage.

---

**Duel Sai**: roll a 2 d2 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d4+1 for inhibiting attacking DEX mod Your attacks use half of your **ATTACK** mod and half of your **DEX** mod for ATTACK damage.**(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.)**

---

**Sword**: roll a d5 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d7+4 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod

---

**Katana**: roll a d2 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d7+5 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. Your attacks use half of your **ATTACK** mod and half of your **DEX** mod for **ATTACK** damage.

---

**Scythe**: roll a d7+1 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d8+4 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. **(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.) Crits with this weapon cause the dice to explode.**

---

**Nodachi**: roll a d4+1 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d9+5 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. Your attacks use half of your **ATTACK** mod and half of your **DEX** mod for damage. Add **+5** to durability roll. **(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.)**

---

**Spear**: roll d6+2 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d8+3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. **(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.)**

---

**Halberd**: roll d8+3 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d10+5 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. **(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.)**

---

**Greatsword**: roll a d9+3 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d10+5 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod.

---

**Greathammer**: roll a d10+3 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d11+8 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. **(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.)**

---

**Bansho Fan**: roll a d3 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d2+1 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. Your attacks use half of your **SPIRIT** mod and half of your **STR** mod for ATTACK damage.

---

**Brave Sword**: roll a d15+4 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d8+3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. Cannot break.

---

**Dimension Sword**: roll a d20+6 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d6+2 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. Cannot break.

card.desc:
# **Smithing System Overview**

### **1. Tools and Requirements**

Each tool has an INT requirement and specific resource cost to be used:

- **Anvil**: Required for all weapon and armor crafting, minimum INT 5, costs 250 resources.
- **Smelting Forge**: Required for melting ores and forming ingots, minimum INT 6, costs 400 resources.
- **Tongs**: Needed for handling hot metals safely, minimum INT 2, costs 30 resources.
- **Ingot Mold**: Required for creating metal ingots, minimum INT 5, costs 70 resources.
- **Armor Mold**: Needed to shape armor, minimum INT 4, costs 50 resources.

---

### **2. Crafting Process**

1. **Prepare Ores**: Smelt ores into ingots using the **Smelting Forge** and **Ingot Mold**. Each ore type provides unique stat bonuses and durability modifiers.
2. **Crafting Phase**:
   - **Weapons**: Use the **Anvil** and chosen ore ingot to craft. Weapon stats are rolled based on the weapon type, as outlined in the weapon stats table. Ore bonuses and rarity modifiers apply at this step.
   - **Armor**: Shape using the **Armor Mold** on the Anvil. Armor durability and resistance stats are based on the ore type and quality roll.

---

#### **3. Ore Types and Bonuses**

Each ore brings specific bonuses or penalties to crafted items, impacting stats, durability, and unique properties:

‌

**Iron**: | Standard ore, commonly available.|

**Steel**: +**2 STR DMG** to weapons | +**20% CON** for armor |**+2 Durability**
| Balanced between durability and power.|

**Mithril**: **+1 DEX** for weapons | **+20% DEX** for armor | - 5 Durability
| Lightweight, favored for agility-based weapons.|

**Adamantine**: **+3 STR DMG** and  **-2 DEX** for weapons | **+30% CON** for armor | +10 Durability | Extremely durable, effective for heavy weapons and armor.

**Katchin**: **+4 STR DMG** and\*\*+2 DEX\*\*  for weapons | **+35% DEX** for armor | +4
Durability | Rare ore with extraordinary resilience and flexibility.|

**Soulstone**: **+15% SPI DMG** for weapons |**+20% WIL** for armor | - 15 Durability | Enhances ki/spiritual attacks; fragile but powerful.|

**Orichalcum**: **+2 STR DMG** and **+1 DEX** for weapons, | **+20% CON** and **-20% DEX** for armor | +10 Durability | Infuses weapons with **Brute** like power. |

**Ebonite**: **+15% WIL** and **+1 DEX** for weapons | **+20% SPI** for armor | -10 Durability	| Amplifies ki-focused attacks; delicate structure. |

---

## **Upon crafting, roll d20+int to determine the item quality, affecting base stats**

Weapons:

**Masterwork (33-35)**: +4 STR DMG, +2 DEX

**Fine (29-32)**: +2 STR DMG, +1 DEX

**Good (21-28)**: +1 STR DMG

**Ok (15-20)**: No modifier

**Bad (9-14)**: -1 STR DMG

**Worthless (1-8):** -2 STR DMG, +1 DEX

###

ARMOR:

**Masterwork (33-35)**: +10 to all damage reduction rolls, +5 durability.

**Fine (29-32)**: +8 to all damage reduction rolls, +3 durability.

**Good (21-28)**: +5 to all damage reduction rolls.

**Ok (15-20)**: No bonus.

**Bad (9-14)**: -10 to all damage reduction rolls, -2 durability.

**Worthless (1-8)**: -20 to all damage reduction rolls, -3 durability.

- Iron:	**+1 STR DMG** to weapons | **+10% CON for armor**
  Standard ore, commonly available.
- Steel: +**2 STR DMG** to weapons | +**20% CON** for armor |**+2 Durability**
  Balanced between durability and power.
- Mithril: **+1 DEX** for weapons | **+20% DEX** for armor | - 5 Durability
  Lightweight, favored for agility-based weapons.
- Adamantine: **+3 STR DMG  -2 DEX** for weapons | **+30% CON** for armor | +10 Durability
  Extremely durable, effective for heavy weapons and armor.
- Katchin: **+4 STR DMG** **+2 DEX**  for weapons | **+35% DEX** for armor | +4 Durability
  Rare ore with extraordinary resilience and flexibility.
- Soulstone: **+15% SPI DMG** for weapons |**+20% WIL** for armor | - 15 Durability
  Enhances ki/spiritual attacks; fragile but powerful.
- Orichalcum:	+2 STR and +1 DEX for weapons, +2 CON for armor	+3 Durability	Infuses weapons with speed and power.
- Ebonite:	+2 WIL and +1 DEX for weapons, +2 SPI for armor	-3 Durability	Amplifies ki-focused attacks; delicate structure.

Upon crafting, roll d20+int to determine the item quality, affecting base stats:

- Masterwork (33-35): +4 STR DMG, +2 DEX
- Finework (29-32): +2 STR DMG, +1 DEX
- Good (21-28): +1 STR DMG
- OK (15-20): No modifier
- Bad (9-14): -1 STR DMG
- Worthless (1-8): -2 STR DMG, +1 DEX
  or if armor
- **Masterwork (33-35)**: +3 to all damage reduction rolls, +5 durability.
- **Finework (29-32)**: +2 to all damage reduction rolls, +3 durability.
- **Good (21-28)**: +1 to all damage reduction rolls.
- **OK (15-20)**: No bonus.
- **Bad (9-14)**: -1 to all damage reduction rolls, -2 durability.
- **Worthless (1-8)**: -2 to all damage reduction rolls, -3 durability.

card.desc:
You can make things with the resources you’ve gathered, provided you have enough **INT** to make them.

---

_**HOMESTEAD | WILDERNESS**_

**Large Home** : **7+ INT** req, 7500 resources.

**Small Home** : **5+ INT** req, 2500 resources.

**Small Camp** : **5+ INT** req, 1200 resources.

**Fishing Tackle** : **5+ INT** req, 100 resources.

**Tent** : **4+ INT** req, 230 resources.

**Storage Container** : **2+ INT** req, 200 resources.

**Camp Fire** : **2+ INT** req, 25 resources.

_**TOOLS | DOHICKYEYS**_

**Welding Torch** : **8+ INT** req, 100 resources

**Drill** : **7+ INT** req, 1000 resources and a shovel.

**Shovel**  : **5+ INT** req, 50 resources.

**Pickaxe** : **3+ INT** req, 50 resources.

**Fishing Rod** : **2+ INT** req, 50 resources.

---

_**SMITHING | FORGE WORK**_

**Anvil** : **5+ INT** req, 250 resources.
**Smelting Forge** : **6+ INT** req, 400 resources.
**Tongs** : **2+ INT** req, 30 resources.
**Ingot Mold** : **5+ INT** req, 70 resources.
**Armor Mold** : **4+ INT** req, 50 resources.

---

_**BASIC VEHICLE | MEHCANIC WORK**_

Plane : **9+ INT** req, 3000 resources.
\-Needs **20x** Components-
\-Needs **10x** Welder Charges-
\-Needs **1x** Engine-
\-Needs **1x** ECU\FLIGHT NAV-

**Pickup Truck**  : **7+ INT** req, 2500 resources.
\-Needs **15x** Components-
\-Needs **5x** Welder Charges-
\-Needs **1x** Engine-
\-Needs **1x** ECU-

**Bike** : **4+ INT** req, 150 resources.
\-Needs **5x** Components-
\-Needs **1x** Welder Charges-

**Car** : **6+ INT** req, 1500 resources.
\-Needs **8x** Components-
\-Needs **5x** Welder Charges-
\-Needs **1x** Engine-
\-Needs **1x** ECU-

**Engine** : **7+ INT** req, 300 resources.
\-Needs **3x** Components-
\-Needs **3x** Welder Charges-
\-Needs **1x** Engine-
\-Needs **1x** ECU-

**ECU \ FLIGHT NAV** : **7+ INT** req, 50 resources.
\-Needs **1x** Components-
\-Needs **1x** Copper Wires-

---

_**ADVANCED VEHICLE | ADVANCED MEHCANIC WORK**_

**Advanced AI Control System** : **12+ INT** req, 600 resources.
\-Needs **2x** Components-
\-Needs **2x** Copper Wires-
\-Needs **2x** Functional Motherboard-
\-Needs **1x** Welder Charges-

**Hover Jet** : **11+ INT** req, 7800 resources.
\-Needs **5x** Components-
\-Needs **15x** Copper Wires-
\-Needs **2x** Functional Motherboard-
\-Needs **1x** Hover Craft Engine-
\-Needs **10x** Welder Charges-

**Hovercraft Car** : **11+ INT** req, 4000 resources.
\-Needs **4x** Components-
\-Needs **8x** Copper Wires-
\-Needs **1x** Functional Motherboard-
\-Needs **1x** Hover Craft Engine-
\-Needs **5x** Welder Charges-

**Hovercraft Bike** : **10+ INT** req, 3000 resources.
\-Needs **1x** Components-
\-Needs **10x** Copper Wires-
\-Needs **1x** Hover Craft Engine-
\-Needs **2x** Welder Charges-

**Hovercraft Pickup Truck** : **12+ INT** req, 5500 resources.
\-Needs **8x** Components-
\-Needs **10x** Copper Wires-
\-Needs **10x** Welder Charges-
\-Needs **1x** Functional Motherboard-
\-Needs **1x** Hover Craft Engine-

**Hover Craft Engine** : **10+ INT** req, 600 resources.
\-Needs **5x** Components-
\-Needs **15x** Copper Wires-
\-Needs **6x** Welder Charges-

---

_**SPACE TRAVEL | ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY**_

**Space-pod**: **10+ INT** req, 10000 resources.
\-Needs **1x** Functional Reactor Core-
\-Needs **2x** Functional Engine Conjunction.-
\-Needs **2x** Functional Motherboard-
\-Needs **10x** Components-
\-Needs **13x** Copper Wires-
\-Needs **3x** Welder Charge-

**Spaceship**: **13+** **INT** req, 50000 resources.
\-Needs **4x** Functional Reactor Cores-
\-Needs **5x** Functional Engine Conjunction.-
\-Needs **7x** Functional Motherboard-
\-Needs **15x** Components-
\-Needs **15x** Copper Wires.-
\-Needs **6x** Welder Charges-

**Gravity Chamber** : **13+ INT** req, 25000 resources.
\-Needs **10x** Functional Motherboard-
\-Needs **2x** Functional Reactor Cores-
\-Needs **30x** Components-
\-Needs **35x** Copper Wires-
\-Needs **12x** Welder Charge-
\-Needs **2x** Gravitational Control Chip-

---

_**FUEL CREATON | GAS STATIONS**_

**Uranium Fuel Cell Charging Bank** : **11+ INT** req,10000 resources.
\-Needs **15x** Components-
\-Needs **30x** Copper Wires-
\-Needs **10x** Welder Charge-
\-Needs **1x** Functional Reactor Core-

**Diesel Dispenser Machine** : **10+ INT** req, 2300 resources.
\-Needs **15x** Components-
\-Needs **25x** Copper Wires-
\-Needs **8x** Welder Charge-

\-Needs **10x** Components-
\-Needs **15x** Copper Wires-
\-Needs **5x** Welder Charge-

---

_**CRAFTING MATERIALS**_

**Gravitational Control Chip**  : **11+ INT** req, 150 resources.

\-Needs **8x** Components-
\-Needs **5x** Copper Wires-

card.desc:
When you first obtain a weapon, whether it be from making it, you must roll for its stats. The type of dice you roll depends on the weapon.

Attacking with a weapon and rolling less than a **3** on your NAT roll reduces durability by **1**.

Weapons:

**Club**: roll a d2 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation) , roll a d3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod.

---

**Spiked Club**: roll a d3 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod

---

**Power Pole**: roll a d4 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod

---

**Bo-Staff:** roll a d4 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod, your **DEX mod** is used for **ATTACK** damage.

---

**Nun-Chuck:** roll a d2 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod, your **DEX mod** is used for **ATTACK** damage.

---

**Duel Sai**: roll a 2 d2 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d4+1 for inhibiting attacking DEX mod Your attacks use half of your **ATTACK** mod and half of your **DEX** mod for ATTACK damage.**(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.)**

---

**Sword**: roll a d5 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d7+4 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod

---

**Katana**: roll a d2 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d7+5 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. Your attacks use half of your **ATTACK** mod and half of your **DEX** mod for **ATTACK** damage.

---

**Scythe**: roll a d7+1 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d8+4 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. **(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.) Crits with this weapon cause the dice to explode.**

---

**Nodachi**: roll a d4+1 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d9+5 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. Your attacks use half of your **ATTACK** mod and half of your **DEX** mod for damage. Add **+5** to durability roll. **(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.)**

---

**Spear**: roll d6+2 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d8+3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. **(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.)**

---

**Halberd**: roll d8+3 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d10+5 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. **(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.)**

---

**Greatsword**: roll a d9+3 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d10+5 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod.

---

**Greathammer**: roll a d10+3 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d11+8 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. **(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.)**

---

**Bansho Fan**: roll a d3 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d2+1 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. Your attacks use half of your **SPIRIT** mod and half of your **STR** mod for ATTACK damage.

---

**Brave Sword**: roll a d15+4 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d8+3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. Cannot break.

---

**Dimension Sword**: roll a d20+6 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d6+2 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. Cannot break.

card.desc:
# When you first obtain armor from making it, you must roll for its stats. The type of dice you roll depends on the armor.

---

**Light Battle Armor**: roll a **d20** for **PERCENTAGE** **DAMAGE REDUCTION**, roll a **d20+15** for defending **DEX PERCENTAGE REDUCTION**. Roll a **d30** for durability. Each time you are hit with an attack that does **25% of your** health or more, your armor durability goes down by **1**.

---

**Battle Armor**: roll a **d35** for **PERCENTAGE** **DAMAGE REDUCTION**, roll a **d35+20** for defending **DEX PERCENTAGE REDUCTION**. Roll a **d45** for durability. Each time you are hit with an attack that does **25% of your** health or more, your armor durability goes down by **1**.

---

**Heavy Battle Armor**: roll a **d50** for **PERCENTAGE** **DAMAGE REDUCTION**, roll a **d40+30** for defending **DEX PERCENTAGE REDUCTION**. Roll a **d60** for durability. Each time you are hit with an attack that does **25% of your** health or more, your armor durability goes down by **1**.

---

old.desc:
When you first obtain armor from making it, you must roll for its stats. The type of dice you roll depends on the armor.

Armor:
**Light Battle Armor**: roll a **d3** for **DAMAGE REDUCTION** mod, roll a **d3** for defending **DEX**  subtraction mod. Roll a **d20** for durability. Each time you are hit with an attack that does **5** damage or more, your armor durability goes down by **1**.
**Medium** **Battle Armor**: roll a **d5** for **DAMAGE REDUCTION** mod, roll a **d4** for defending **DEX subtraction**  mod. Roll a **d30** for durability. Each time you are hit with an attack that does **10** damage or more, your armor durability goes down by **1**.
**Heavy Battle Armor**: roll a **d7+2** for **DAMAGE REDUCTION** mod, roll a **d8+3** for defending **DEX** subtraction mod. Roll a **d40** for durability. Each time you are hit with an attack that does **15** damage or more, your armor durability goes down by **1**.

card.desc:
There are four main methods of training:
**Shadow boxing**
**Weight training**
**Meditation training**
**Spar training (REQUIRES 2 PEOPLE)**

**Shadow boxing** increases your **DEX** stat.
**Weight training** increases your **STR** and **CON** stat.
**Meditation training** increases your **WILL** and **SPI** stat.
**Spar training** increases **ALL STATS** (except INT).

---

You can roll a **d10 x (SAGA)** to see how many stat points you gained. If you did a spar training, roll **5d10** **x (SAGA)**

When sparing with an opponent who’s power level is at least **250%** yours, increase the stat gain result by **250**% for each stat and decrease the opponent’s stat gain by **70%** for each stat. _**The Spar must last 20 turns.**_

If the training improves two stats, divide the gain in half and distribute the points how you want.

The stat gain can be amplified by training in a stronger gravity. You can go to a different planet or buy a gravity chamber.

**x10 Gravity**: 2d10x (SAGA)  gain, 500 PL Req

**x20 Gravity**: 4d10x (SAGA) gain, 1000 PL Req

**x50 Gravity**: 6d10x (SAGA) gain, 5000 PL Req

**x100 Gravity**: 1d100x (SAGA) gain, 10000 PL Req

**x150 Gravity**: 2d100x (SAGA) gain, 50000 PL Req

**x200 Gravity**: 4d100x (SAGA) gain, 100000 PL Req

**x250 Gravity**: 6d100x (SAGA) gain, 250000 PL Req

**x300 Gravity**: 10d100x (SAGA) gain, 500000 PL Req

---

These are the stat gains for spar training in stronger gravity.

**x10 Gravity**: 5d20x (SAGA) gain, 500 PL Req

**x20 Gravity**: 5d40x (SAGA) gain, 1000 PL Req

**x50 Gravity**: 5d60x (SAGA) gain, 5000 PL Req

**x100 Gravity**: 5d100x (SAGA) gain, 10000 PL Req

**x150 Gravity**: (2 5d100)x (SAGA) gain, 50000 PL Req

**x200 Gravity**: (4 5d100)x (SAGA) gain, 100000 PL Req

**x250 Gravity**: (6 5d100)x (SAGA) gain, 250000 PL Req

**x300 Gravity**: (10 5d100)x (SAGA) gain, 500000 PL Req

You can train multiple times a day, but each training will be less profitable. Refer to [https://trello.com/c/TmIAq3d8/109-fatigue](https://trello.com/c/TmIAq3d8/109-fatigue "smartCard-inline")  for more information.

The stat gain can be amplified by training in a stronger gravity. You can go to a different planet or buy a gravity chamber.

**x10 Gravity**: 2d10x (SAGA)  gain, 500 PL Req

**x20 Gravity**: 4d10x (SAGA) gain, 1000 PL Req

**x50 Gravity**: 6d10x (SAGA) gain, 5000 PL Req

**x100 Gravity**: 1d100x (SAGA) gain, 10000 PL Req

**x150 Gravity**: 2d100x (SAGA) gain, 50000 PL Req

**x200 Gravity**: 4d100x (SAGA) gain, 100000 PL Req

**x250 Gravity**: 6d100x (SAGA) gain, 250000 PL Req

**x300 Gravity**: 10d100x (SAGA) gain, 500000 PL Req

These are the stat gains for spar training in stronger gravity.

**x10 Gravity**: 5d20x (SAGA) gain, 500 PL Req

**x20 Gravity**: 5d40x (SAGA) gain, 1000 PL Req

**x50 Gravity**: 5d60x (SAGA) gain, 5000 PL Req

**x100 Gravity**: 5d100x (SAGA) gain, 10000 PL Req

**x150 Gravity**: (2 5d100)x (SAGA) gain, 50000 PL Req

**x200 Gravity**: (4 5d100)x (SAGA) gain, 100000 PL Req

**x250 Gravity**: (6 5d100)x (SAGA) gain, 250000 PL Req

**x300 Gravity**: (10 5d100)x (SAGA) gain, 500000 PL Req

You can train multiple times a day, but each training will be less profitable. Refer to [https://trello.com/c/TmIAq3d8/109-fatigue](https://trello.com/c/TmIAq3d8/109-fatigue "smartCard-inline")  for more information.

card.desc:
Unleash your hatred onto the world. Your skin starts to glow a deep blue, revealing all of your hideous features. Orbs of ki start to circle around you, with your ki turning a strange deep blue and mimicking roaring hell flames

Gain **+15** **ALL MODS** (except INT) while the form is active. Transforming does not take an action. Gain **x30 PL**.

Every **-70** alignment increases modifier by **+10** and **PL modifier by x5** more.

Drain: **40** Ki per turn.

**Soul Siphon**: Every punch saps the victim’s energy. On **successful hits/blocked hits**, regain **1d15** ki and cause them the same amount.

card.desc:
The messenger of Death. You bring the feeling of doom with your very presence. Hell spat you out because you were too bitter for its gaping maw. Bastardized by your very home, you roam the overworld searching...

**Mistake:** Your very being is a mistake. Unlike many Onis, your bulky muscles do not slow you down. Negate the **DEX** penalty applied from being an Oni.

**Fuel the Flames of Hatred:** You feed off negative energy. Gain **+2** to **ALL MODS** for every **-70** alignment.

**Damned:** Cannot gain access to God Ki. When fighting against foes with God Ki, gain **+5** to **DEX** and **STR** rolls. You also no longer gain disadvantage when fighting foes with God Ki.

**Tormented**: Cannot meditate, but gains **+1 SPI** mod every **5** kills. Kills also heal **+10** HP and **+5** Ki. **(ONLY FROM COMBAT)**

**Unleashed:** Gain access to Dark Devil form.
card.name: Dread-forged Ashen Soul

The power of your Tribunal Saint _**CBUM**_ flows through you at its highest level.
CBUM
(Tren, Tes, Roids)

Your ki floods the entire planet with Primative Energy (everyone has -5 int) While this form is active, Including you.

Mastery Level 4: Reduce drain by **20**.
Mastery Level 5: Reduce drain by **20**. Gain **+8** **STR** modifier to attack rolls and **+5 DEX** modifier to attack and defense rolls, and **+5 CON. Instead**

card.desc:
Saibamen are plant creatures. **planting seeds and pouring growth liquid over them** will cause a Saibamen to sprout. They are born to kill, and excel at doing so.

**- Abilities -**

**We Are Not The Same:** Saibamen are physical demons out the womb. Instead of rolling **5d20** for stats, you will instead roll **5d50.**

---

**Apex Predator:** Saibamen are quick, and sneaky. They are capable of completely camouflaging themselves, including their ki signatures in areas of vegetation. **+20%** to all Dexterity Saving Throws.

---

**Plant Life:** Saibamen are immune to all forms of poison, and have strong regeneration. They are capable of regenerating limbs on short rests.

---

**Ruler of Many:** Once every saga (Except The First Saga) Saibamen are capable of draining their ki and health to 1 in order to release a seed from their heads. This seed will sprout 24 hours from planting, and will have 1/10th of the stats of the creator. This Saibamen cannot complete any other actions than self destruct, or sparring with their creator.

---

**PTSD:** These beings are capable of firing every synapse in their body at once in order to implode from the inside out. This explosion will instantly end the life of the user, and will deal **(User Current Hp + User Current Ki)** . If there are any hatchlings in the area, the user is able to transfer it’s consciousness to one of them instead of ending their lineage there.

---

**Sharp Claws:** Saibamen have no need for ki blasts or weapons. They use their sharp claws to tear through flesh. Barehanded attacks are capable of tearing off limbs, and **all critically successful attacks apply bleed for 1 turn.**

---

**Simple Minded:** Saibamen roll **1d3** for intelligence instead of **1d10**

**Simple Minded:** Saibamen roll **1d3** for intelligence instead of **1d10**

card.desc:
Akin to your first Roid Rage your hair flares up once again but this tome out and down as your brows vanish, now being accompanied by Green lightning that occasionally sparks around your body. Your Green aura is much more intense and condensed than that of your previous form.

Gain **+15 Mod** (except INT) while the form is active, applying modifiers as needed. Gain **x75 PL**.

Require Traumatic Experience to Trigger Form. Doesn't take a Turn.
**Minimum** Req- **60k PL**

**Drain**: **80 Energy** per turn

Mastery Level 1: Reduce drain by **5**
Mastery Level 2: Reduce drain by **5 +1 str | +1 con | +1 dex**
Mastery Level 3: Reduce drain by **5**
Mastery Level 4: Reduce drain by **5**. **+2 Str | +2 con | +2 Dex | Instead**
Mastery Level 5: Reduce drain by 1**5**. +3 Str | +2 Con | +2 Dex | Instead

card.desc:
Boxing, the fighting style of hitting and not getting hit. Some people say it’s an art, and some refer to it as the sweet science.

**– Proficiencies –**

**Focused Iron Fist**: You’ve trained your fist to deliver crushing blows, likening your hand to that of a truck. **Gain 5 STR mod + (10%** **STR mod)**  attack mod.

---

**Decisive Strikes**: You can pick apart your opponent, delivering punches in the right place at the right time. When dodging, you can spend **5** ki and force the opponent to make a **DEX** saving throw with a save of **d15+DEX mod (d20+DEX** mod if the opponent critically failed). On fail, roll to attack the enemy for **damage dice+(STR mod/2)** and gain [https://trello.com/c/sdiPWijl/193-rhythm](https://trello.com/c/sdiPWijl/193-rhythm "smartCard-inline") **.** On critical success, explode the dice. (roll it again without modifiers.)

---

**Head Movement**: You are tiresome to hit. Dodging an opponent’s attack drains **1d5% KI** and grants a stack of [https://trello.com/c/sdiPWijl/193-rhythm](https://trello.com/c/sdiPWijl/193-rhythm "smartCard-inline")**.**

‌

**– Abilities –**

**One-Two**

**Liver Punch**

**Corkscrew**

card.desc:
**OBTAINING THIS CLASS REDUCES YOUR STR MOD BY 50%, BUT INCREASES YOUR DEX MOD BY 25%**

**Finesse/Blindspot**: When critically succeeding a dodge attempt, the enemy will be afflicted with **Off-Balance.** If the enemy is Off-Balance, then you can do use a bonus action to stab the enemies' **Blindspot**, which will do **4%** of the enemies' health in **True Damage**

---

**Bane**: Landing critical attacking rolls will increase your **Bane stacks with a max of 3**, at max Bane stacks, you will be able to attack the enemy with an unblockable strike.

---

**Precise Blows:** You are able to land critical attacks easier. Your threshold for landing critical attacks is **1 lower** than usual.

---

**-Abilities-**
**Lethality**

**Shadow's Step**

card.desc:
Your fighting style can only be described as pure violence. You truly live in the thrill of the fight, not caring about how you hurt the person. The only thing that matters to you is that you do.

**THIS STYLE CANNOT BE LEARNED THROUGH A MENTOR.**
(**-900 ALIGNMENT AND NO FIGHTING STYLE)**

**– Proficiencies –**

**Sadist Limit**: You can only hold it in for so long. Taking damage, dealing damage, and blocking damage fills the limit equal to **1d50+damage dealt/taken/blocked**. Sadist Limit is **100+**(**CON**).

---

**Combat Addicted**: You can’t stand being left out of a good fight. You fight your body when it decides to betray you. Upon reaching **0 HP**, roll **1d20+(Remaining Sadism/2)**, regaining the result as HP and consuming the remaining sadism. This can be done **twice** per battle as long as you have sadism left.

---

**Ferocious Blows**: Your wild swinging and the sheer power behind them often terrifies your enemies. When attacking at **50%+** sadism, force a **WIL** saving throw with a save of **12+(Sadism/4)** (round down). If failed, apply **1d3** turns of [https://trello.com/c/GEs5Y73T/89-frighten](https://trello.com/c/GEs5Y73T/89-frighten "smartCard-inline").

---

**Urge to Kill**: You can’t take it anymore. You want them to suffer. When at max sadism, add **+4 DEX+50% DEX mod** attack rolls and **+3 STR+50% STR mod** attack rolls. After landing a **critical success** on **STR** attack roll, apply **1d8** turns of [https://trello.com/c/7P6ITb5L/115-trauma](https://trello.com/c/7P6ITb5L/115-trauma "smartCard-inline").

---

**Unhinged**: You have trouble with emotions. Gain immunity to [https://trello.com/c/GEs5Y73T/89-frighten](https://trello.com/c/GEs5Y73T/89-frighten "smartCard-inline") and [https://trello.com/c/7P6ITb5L/115-trauma](https://trello.com/c/7P6ITb5L/115-trauma "smartCard-inline").

---

**I Love That Sound**: You love inflicting harm on your opponent. When it’s permanent, it’s the best feeling in the world. When breaking an opponent’s limb, gain **+12+40% STR** to next successful attack damage roll and force the opponent to make a WIL saving throw with the save of attack damage. If failed, the opponent gains [https://trello.com/c/7P6ITb5L/115-trauma](https://trello.com/c/7P6ITb5L/115-trauma "smartCard-inline") permanently.

card.desc:
You prefer to make quick work of your foes. You like targeting your opponent’s weak spots and landing critical blows, often ending the battle before it even started.

**-Negative 250 ALIGNMENT REQUIRED**

**– Proficiencies –**

**Predator's Finish**: You are a master when it comes to finishing off weakened prey. Deal **15%** increased damage to targets with less than **30%** health remaining.

---

**Toxic Executioner**: You capitalize on your foes' weakened states. Inflict **1d10%** extra damage against victims suffering from damage over time effects.

---

**Shadow's Gait**: You’re quick to take opportunities when they are open. Gain **+8** to initiative rolls when starting combat. When attacking a surprised opponent, attacks are **always critical**. Attacks done while [https://trello.com/c/Pkipq3vz/107-invisible](https://trello.com/c/Pkipq3vz/107-invisible "smartCard-inline") receive **+50% DEX** mod.

---

**Assassin’s Touch**: You know exactly where to hit to damage an opponent fatally. Critical **STR** attack rolls deal **2x** more damage.

---

**Evasion Bypass**: You can slip from an opponent’s line of vision, making them think you vanished. When critically succeeding **DEX** defense rolls and the opponent has ki sense activated, force them to make a disadvantaged **DEX** saving throw with a save of **15+(DEX mod/2)** mod. If failed or the opponent does not have ki sense activated, abandon the defense check and go [https://trello.com/c/Pkipq3vz/107-invisible](https://trello.com/c/Pkipq3vz/107-invisible "smartCard-inline").

---

**– Abilities –**

**Assassinate**

**Pin-Point Blow**

**Incognito**

**Secret Poison**

card.desc:
**Wolf Fang Fist** is a technique used and taught by Yamcha.

**– Proficiencies –**

**Heightened Instincts**: Your connection to wolves and nature sharpen your reflexes. Gain **3 DEX mod + (15%** **DEX mod)** defense rolls.

---

**Predatory Precision**: Drawing from your wolf-like instincts, you exhibit heightened melee accuracy. Gain **3 DEX mod + (15%** **DEX mod )** melee attack rolls.

---

**Swift Onslaught**: You trade out precise and strong blows for multiple that swarm and blitz your enemy.

Roll **2 d20+DEX mod** for attack rolls, but roll **2** (**d2+STR** **mod/2**) for damage rolls. You no longer cause the opponent to roll defense checks due to your unprecise strikes.

---

**Frenzy Strikes**: Your unorthodox fighting style is unpredictable and occasionally you release a dual-strike. If you **critically succeed** both **STR** melee attack rolls on a successful attack roll, Roll **1d20**. If the roll is higher than or equal to **18**, add **2d4+(STR mod/2)** to your damage total and apply [https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed](https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed "smartCard-inline") for **1** turn.

---

**Vulnerable Pelt**: You traded out a lot of durability and defense for offense. **Lose (4+20% CON mod)** modifier.

‌

**– Abilities –**

**Wolf Fang Fist**

**Whirlwind Kick**

**Wolf Slice Fist**

**Neo Wolf Fang Fist**

**– Proficiencies –**

**Heightened Instincts**: Your connection to wolves and nature sharpen your reflexes. gain **3 static DEX mod  + ( 15%** **DEX ) mod** defense rolls.

---

**Predatory Precision**: Drawing from your wolf-like instincts, you exhibit heightened melee accuracy.  gain **3 static DEX mod  + ( 15%** **DEX )** melee attack rolls.

---

**Swift Onslaught**: You trade out precise and strong blows for multiple that swarm and blitz your enemy.

Roll **2 d20+DEX mod** for attack rolls, but roll **2** (**d2+STR** **mod/2**) for damage rolls. You no longer cause the opponent to roll defense checks due to your unprecise strikes.

---

**Frenzy Strikes**: Your unorthodox fighting style is unpredictable and occasionally you release a dual-strike. If you **critically succeed** both **STR** melee attack rolls on a successful attack roll, Roll **1d20**. If the roll is higher than or equal to **18**, add **2d4+(STR mod/2)** to your damage total and apply [https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed](https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed "smartCard-inline") for **1** turn.

---

**Vulnerable Pelt**: You traded out a lot of durability and defense for offense. **Lose (4+20% CON mod)** modifier.

‌

**– Abilities –**

**Wolf Fang Fist**

**Whirlwind Kick**

**Wolf Slice Fist**

**Neo Wolf Fang Fist**

card.desc:
You believe that the other fighting styles don’t reach their full potential because they only choose to see the value in specific limbs. You choose to turn all of your limbs into lethal weapons.

**– Proficiencies –**

**Iron Bone Conditioning**: Your bones are unnaturally tough. It’s like you have iron rods underneath your skin. When blocking a physical attack, deal **d3+(Blocked Damage/2)** mod to the attacker.

---

**Prowling Fury**: You walk your opponents down when they try to flee combat. Opponent Loses **25% to retreat rolls.**

---

**Spirit of the Tiger**: You like to show your opponent how useless fighting back is. When you would dodge an attack, you can choose to take the attack instead and make the opponent roll a **WIL** saving throw with a save of **d20+SPI** mod. If failed, apply [https://trello.com/c/GEs5Y73T/89-frighten](https://trello.com/c/GEs5Y73T/89-frighten "smartCard-inline") for **1** turn.

---

**Fearless Strikes**: You are sure in your strikes, threatening to punch directly through your opponent. **Gain (5+25% STR)** mod to attack damage rolls. If your damage roll **critically succeeds**, gain another action and impose disadvantage on the opponent. You can only gain an action once per turn this way.

---

**Eye of the Tiger**: Even while wounded, you’re still extremely dangerous. **Gain (3 + 15% DEX** ) mod when under **40%** HP.

---

**– Abilities –**

**Savage Elbow**

**Feral Fury Knee**

**Shin Drive**

**Leaping Tiger Fist**

card.desc:
You drive your sword into the opponent’s torso.

Use d**10%** ki to impale a target. Upon successful attack, apply **1** turn of [https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed](https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed "smartCard-inline") and deal additional **1d1/4 STR**. Force the opponent to make a **CON** saving throw with a save of **d20+STR mod**. If failed, apply [https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance](https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance "smartCard-inline") for **1** turn and regain action.

**– Mastery –**
**1 Mastery**: Costs d**8** ki. Deal **1d8** mod
**2 Mastery**: Costs d**7** ki. Deal **1d10** mod
card.name: Impaling Stab

card.desc:
You sharpen your sword to extremely high level, able to even cut a needle in half.
COSTS 1 [BONUS ACTION](https://trello.com/c/fYSLNTR5/297-bonus-actions "‌")

Use **D10(%)** ki per turn to add **+25%** to **damage rolls**, but **-40%** to **DEX** attacking rolls.

Toggling it on uses an Bonus Action

**– Mastery –**
**1 Mastery**: Costs **D9(%)** ki per turn, **+4** to **damage rolls**.
**2 Mastery**: Costs **D8(%)** ki per turn, **+5** to **damage rolls**.
**3 Mastery**: Costs **D7(%)**  ki per turn, **+6** to **damage rolls**, **-30%** to **DEX** attacking rolls.

card.desc:
A strong slash that crosses the opponent’s body.

Use (d**10+15)% KI** to violently slash across the opponent’s body. On successful hit/block, force the opponent to make a **CON** saving throw with a save of **d20+STR** **mod**. If failed, apply [https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed](https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed "smartCard-inline") for **1d4** turns and force the opponent to make another **CON** saving throw with a save of **1d12+(STR mod/4)** (round down). If failed, split the opponent in half, killing them. Else, deals **1d10+STR** mod.

COSTS 1 [**ACTION** ](https://trello.com/c/gJNhtO4D/296-action "‌")AND [**BONUS ACTION**](https://trello.com/c/fYSLNTR5/297-bonus-actions "‌")

**– Mastery –**
**1 Mastery**: Deals **1d12+STR** mod. Costs **(d10+10%)** ki.
**2 Mastery**: Deals **1d14+STR** mod. Costs **(d10+8%)** ki
**3 Mastery**: Upon **critically succeeding**, explode the dice. Costs **(d8+8%)** ki.
card.name: Cross Slash

card.desc:
Physically, Tuffles are small in stature compared to Saiyans, with round heads, large brains, and diminutive bodies. They have unique features such as large, expressive eyes and distinct facial structures, often portrayed with different skin tones ranging from various shades of blue, purple, or green. They are highly skilled in advanced machinery, genetics, and engineering, which allowed them to create sophisticated gadgets, advanced weaponry, and groundbreaking inventions.

**– Abilities –**

**Incredibly Intelligent**: Tuffles can easily make advanced technology as well as understand it. Roll **1d12+3** when rolling for your initial intelligence.

**Physically Frail**: Tuffles are not exactly built for combat. -**2 STR** mod and -**2 CON** mod when in combat.

**Advances in Bioengineering**: Due to your advanced intellect, you are extremely proficient in the studies of bioengineering. When making **Androids**, roll **5 8d100+120+(creators INT mod*10)** instead. You can also make [https://trello.com/c/CfWExemf/48-baby-tuffle](https://trello.com/c/CfWExemf/48-baby-tuffle "smartCard-inline").

card.desc:
**OBTAINING THIS CLASS REDUCES YOUR STR MOD BY 50%, BUT INCREASES YOUR DEX MOD BY 25%**

**Finesse/Blindspot**: When critically succeeding a dodge attempt, the enemy will be afflicted with **Off-Balance.** If the enemy is Off-Balance, then you can do use a bonus action to stab the enemies' **Blindspot**, which will do **4%** of the enemies' health in **True Damage**

---

**Bane**: Landing critical attacking rolls will increase your **Bane stacks with a max of 3**, at max Bane stacks, you will be able to attack the enemy with an unblockable strike.

---

**Precise Blows:** You are able to land critical attacks easier. Your threshold for landing critical attacks is **1 lower** than usual.

---

**-Abilities-**
**Phantom Blade**

**Shadow's Step**

**Finesse/Blindspot**: When critically succeeding a dodge attempt, the enemy will be afflicted with **Off-Balance.** If the enemy is Off-Balance, then you can do use a bonus action to stab the enemies' **Blindspot**, which will do **4%** of the enemies' health in **True Damage**

---

**Bane**: Landing critical attacking rolls will increase your **Bane stacks with a max of 3**, at max Bane stacks, you will be able to attack the enemy with an unblockable strike.

---

**Precise Blows:** You are able to land critical attacks easier. Your threshold for landing critical attacks is **1 lower** than usual.

**-Abilities-**
**Phantom Blade**

**Lethality**

**Shadow's Step**

card.name: Dagger Base Class

old.desc:
**OBTAINING THIS CLASS REMOVES YOUR STRENGTH MOD FOR ATTACK ROLLS AND REPLACES IT WITH DEX MOD**.

**Backstab**: When dodging an attack, **the opponent** will have Off-Balance during this time and will have to roll a **D20 DEX** saving roll of **d10+DEX** mod, If they fail the save you will backstab them for TRUE damage and do 2% of their max hp no matter what.

---

**Finesse**: **Dodging an attack** will **add** a stack of **Finesse** up to a **max of +40% DEX** mod, attacking will exhaust all Finesse stacks and buff your next attack by the amount of Finesse stacks you have ( 1 **Finesse = +10% DEX DAMAGE**)

---

**Clinch pick Gamble**: When being grappled each turn roll a **d20+DEX mod with a save of 15+grapper's CON**, if failed lose full turn but if succeeded stab the grappler with your dagger with **1d5+DEX mod damage as a BONUS ACTION**

---

**Bane**: Landing Crits will increase your **Bane stacks with a max of 3**, at max Bane your next attack will cleave up their arms and bypass block, this will also give you an a**dditional action.**

(This only applies if they are blocking and if they aren't blocking the stacks will instead buff the next attack skills included. However this will lower the block effectiveness of the next attack blocked by 50% if they are blocking.)

‌

**-Abilities-**
**Phantom Blade**

**Lethality**

**Shadow's Step**

card.name: British Sword Fighting

card.desc:
Baby Tuffles are parasites, seeking strong vessels to carry out their plans.
When being converted into an Baby Tuffle, reset your stats and roll **8 8d100+(creators INT mod*10)** for your stats, roll **1d20+5** for your intelligence, and gain a mutation roll.
Requires **950,000/ 1/4th int** resources to make a Baby Tuffle.

**– Abilities –**

**Vesselmonger**: You need a lifeform to take control of. You take **2x** more damage when outside of a body. You are vulnerable to Spirit Fission. When outside of a body, -**7 DEX** mod.

**Life Hijack**: Baby Tuffle can enter into people’s bodies through cuts. When an opponent is bleeding, force them to make a **CON** save with a save of **35**. If failed, the opponent loses their body.

**Parasite Infection**: Leave eggs behind in previous hosts, turning them into Tuffle servants. Victims can roll a **D20** to break free of the parasite every **30** **minutes** or every **5** turns (if in combat). **The victim must critically succeed.**

**My New Body**: Baby Tuffles amplify their vessels and unleash the full potential of their being. Baby Tuffles add their vessel’s stats onto theirs. They also receive the forms and mutations unlocked by the vessel.

**Hateful**: Gain access to Revenge Death Ball.

card.desc:
AND THIS… IS TO GO… EVEN FURTHER… BEYOND..! Your scream shakes the heavens and scares the ends of hell. Your ki floods the entire realm with immense pressure.

Gain **+80 ALL MODS** (except INT) while the form is active, applying modifiers as needed. Gain **x400 PL**.

**Drain**: **500 energy** per turn.

Mastery Level 1: Reduce drain by **100.**
Mastery Level 2: Reduce drain by **100.**
Mastery Level 3: Reduce drain by **100.**
Mastery Level 4: Reduce drain by **50**. Gain **+10** **STR** modifier to attack rolls and **+10 DEX** modifier to attack and defense rolls.
Mastery Level 5: Reduce drain by **50**. Gain **+10** **STR** modifier to attack rolls and **+10 DEX** modifier to attack and defense rolls. Gain **x480 PL**.

**Parasite Infection**: Leave eggs behind in previous hosts, turning them into Tuffle servants. Victims can roll a **D20** to break free of the parasite every **30** **minutes** or every **5** turns (if in combat). **The victim must critically succeed.**

**My New Body**: Baby Tuffles amplify their vessels and unleash the full potential of their being. Baby Tuffles add their vessel’s stats onto theirs. They also receive the forms and mutations unlocked by the vessel.

**Hateful**: Gain access to Revenge Death Ball.

card.desc:
Androids are mechanical versions of their specified races. Currently, the only known races to be converted are **Cerealian**, **Earthling**, and **Tuffle**. When being converted into an android, reset your stats and roll **5 8d100+(creators INT mod*3)** for your stats and roll **1d15+5** for your intelligence.
Requires **50000** resources to make an Android.

**– Abilities –**

**Nuclear Battery**: Your ki is replaced by charge. Your **SPI** now dictates your potential max charge. Starts at **50%** of the potential max charge. Must be upgraded to be able to use more potential max charge. After combat, your battery is filled back to full. Doing an action that usually takes ki takes charge now. Unlike organics, you cannot regenerate charge in combat.

**Infinite Stamina**: You will never be fatigued by your energy.

**Flesh is Weak**: You cannot eat, sleep, or train. You can make mechanical clones of yourself. When dying, upload your consciousness to a mechanical clone (if you have one). Every facet of yourself can be upgraded through cybernetic enhancements. If you were injured, you must fix the injury through a repair table.

card.desc:
These are actions that affect the story. Things like destroying cities or defeating an evil monster or invasion.

These are **NOT** actions like fishing or doing basic jobs.

Canon actions also heavily dictate your alignment. Doing net negative actions like mass murder will decrease your alignment, while doing net positive actions like saving a planet from destruction will increase your alignment.

It also worth noting that since the story progresses from these actions, consequences of your actions will start to appear.

All Players have the ability to complete **1 CANON ACTION** every _**3 days**_

You must alert **EVERYONE** whenever you make a canon action.

**Upon completion, roll a (3d90)+80 for stat points.**

card.desc:
A swordsman is someone proficient in the use of a sword for combat or artistic expression.

**– Proficiencies –**

**Practiced Technique**: You trained to purge most unnecessary movements from your striking. Gain **+25%** to **DEX** attack rolls.

---

**Sword Mastery**: Your extensive training with a sword makes your weapon look like an extension of your own body. When wielding a sword, gain **+1d3** attack mod to attacks done with swords and **-1d4** to all **dexterity hinderances** from using a weapon.

---

**Exposing Wounds**: You know exactly where to slice to wound your opponent. When rolling a critical success on **STR** attack rolls, cause **1d2** turns of [https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed](https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed "smartCard-inline"). Additionally, when attacking bleeding opponents, add **an additional 25% on top of your total damage**.

‌

**– Abilities –**

**Cross Slash**

**Ki Sharpening**

**Impaling Thrust**
