card.desc:
Verily! Thou dost now comprehend the most ancient and hallowed beginnings of Polearms-Manship! Yea, the noble art of poke and thrust, passed down through the annals of time by warriors of yore! The very foundations of this most revered combat form lie within thy grasp, bestowed upon thee by the hands of fate itself! Wield now thy polearm with valor, for the basics of this martial prowess are thine to command, O gallant one!!

**– Proficiencies –**

**Extended Reach:**
Your training with polearms allows you to maintain a safe distance from your opponents. When wielding a polearm, all physical attacks has _**disadvantage**_ towards the wielder.

---

**Precision Strikes:**
You have honed your technique to deliver powerful strikes. Gain a **+1d4**
attack mod to polearms rolls. Additionally, you may add your **25%** of you **DEX modifier** to the damage of polearm **Attack rolls** by spending **5+5%** ki.

---

**Battlefield Control :**
Your experience with polearms enables you to manipulate your opponent’s movements. You Receive **3 Charges** of this passive which **Resets at Midnight.**  When you successfully land a hit with a polearm, you can choose to impose [https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance](https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance "smartCard-inline") for **1 Turn.**

---

**Puncture Wounds:**
You know the vital points of your enemies. When rolling a critical success on **STR** attack rolls made with a polearm, cause **1d3 turns of** [https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed](https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed "smartCard-inline")  Additionally, when attacking opponents affected by Bleed Status, add a **1d3+STR** modifier to your **DEX** roll.

---

**Grappling Proficiency:**
Your polearm serves as an effective tool for controlling your opponent’s movements. When grappling with a polearm, **you do not roll with disadvantage**, even if your opponent is not in [https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance](https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance "smartCard-inline")   Status.

‌

**– Abilities –**

**Sweeping Swing**

**Thrusting Strikes**

**Lacerating Slash**

Wield now thy polearm with valor, for the basics of this martial prowess are thine to command, O gallant one!!

attack mod to polearms rolls. Additionally, you may add your **25%** of you **DEX modifier** to the damage of polearm **Attack rolls** by spending **5+5%** ki.

card.desc:
Your fighting style can only be described as pure violence. You truly live in the thrill of the fight, not caring about how you hurt the person. The only thing that matters to you is that you do.

**THIS STYLE CANNOT BE LEARNED THROUGH A MENTOR.**
(**-900 ALIGNMENT AND NO FIGHTING STYLE)**

**– Proficiencies –**

**Sadist Limit**: You can only hold it in for so long. Taking damage, dealing damage, and blocking damage fills the limit equal to **1d50+damage dealt/taken/blocked**. Sadist Limit is **100+**(**CON**).

---

**Combat Addicted**: You can’t stand being left out of a good fight. You fight your body when it decides to betray you. Upon reaching **0 HP**, roll **1d20+(Remaining Sadism/2)**, regaining the result as HP and consuming the remaining sadism. This can be done **twice** per battle as long as you have sadism left.

---

**Ferocious Blows**: Your wild swinging and the sheer power behind them often terrifies your enemies. When attacking at **50%+** sadism, force a **WIL** saving throw with a save of **12+(Sadism/4)** (round down). If failed, apply **1d3** turns of [https://trello.com/c/GEs5Y73T/89-frighten](https://trello.com/c/GEs5Y73T/89-frighten "smartCard-inline").

---

**Urge to Kill**: You can’t take it anymore. You want them to suffer. When at max sadism, add **+4 DEX+50% DEX mod** attack rolls and **+3 STR+50% STR mod** attack rolls. After landing a **critical success** on **STR** attack roll, apply **1d8** turns of [https://trello.com/c/7P6ITb5L/115-trauma](https://trello.com/c/7P6ITb5L/115-trauma "smartCard-inline").

---

**Unhinged**: You have trouble with emotions. Gain immunity to [https://trello.com/c/GEs5Y73T/89-frighten](https://trello.com/c/GEs5Y73T/89-frighten "smartCard-inline") and [https://trello.com/c/7P6ITb5L/115-trauma](https://trello.com/c/7P6ITb5L/115-trauma "smartCard-inline").

---

**I Love That Sound**: You love inflicting harm on your opponent. When it’s permanent, it’s the best feeling in the world. When breaking an opponent’s limb, gain **+12+20% STR** to next successful attack damage roll and force the opponent to make a WIL saving throw with the save of attack damage. If failed, the opponent gains [https://trello.com/c/7P6ITb5L/115-trauma](https://trello.com/c/7P6ITb5L/115-trauma "smartCard-inline") permanently.

card.desc:
A swordsman is someone proficient in the use of a sword for combat or artistic expression.

**– Proficiencies –**

**Practiced Technique**: You trained to purge most unnecessary movements from your striking. Gain **+25%** to **DEX** attack rolls.

---

**Sword Mastery**: Your extensive training with a sword makes your weapon look like an extension of your own body. When wielding a sword, gain **+1d3** attack mod to attacks done with swords and **-1d4** to all **dexterity hinderances** from using a weapon.

---

**Exposing Wounds**: You know exactly where to slice to wound your opponent. When rolling a critical success on **STR** attack rolls, cause **1d2** turns of [https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed](https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed "smartCard-inline"). Additionally, when attacking bleeding opponents, add **an additional 25% damage**.

‌

**– Abilities –**

**Cross Slash**

**Ki Sharpening**

**Impaling Thrust**

card.desc:
Martial Arts founded by turtle hermit **Master Roshi** which presumably continues the teachings of Roshi's former sensei, **Master Mutaito**.

**– Proficiencies –**

**Shell Guard**: This guard is surprisingly effective at denying the opponent chance to strike vital points. When blocking an attack, add an extra **1d10**% of damage negation to the result. (i.e if you roll a **5**, add that as a **%** to your blocking negation. **80+5** = **85%**) Additionally, gain **4 + (20% CON)** to **CON** saving throws and add **5** + (**25% DEX**) to **DEX** defense check rolls.

---

**Turtle Tenacity**: Due to extensive training, your body is extraordinarily durable. When hit with a Ki attack, absorb **1d20**% (round down) of ki used to make the attack and negate **1d15+(25%)** points of damage from the attack. In addition to this, positive status effects last **2** turns shorter than usual.

---

**Not a Snapping Turtle**: Your resilience comes at a cost. -**4** mod to physical attack rolls.

---

**Beam Proficiency**: Your understanding of ki makes your beams much stronger and accurate. Gain **6 + (25%) WIL** mod and **3+ (15%) DEX** mod when attacking with a beam.

**– Abilities –**

**Kamehameha**

**Kamehameha Surge**

**Dashing Kamehameha**

**Destructo Disc**

card.desc:
You believe that the other fighting styles don’t reach their full potential because they only choose to see the value in specific limbs. You choose to turn all of your limbs into lethal weapons.

**– Proficiencies –**

**Iron Bone Conditioning**: Your bones are unnaturally tough. It’s like you have iron rods underneath your skin. When blocking a physical attack, deal **d3+(Blocked Damage/2)** mod to the attacker.

---

**Prowling Fury**: You walk your opponents down when they try to flee combat. Opponent Loses **25% to retreat rolls.**

---

**Spirit of the Tiger**: You like to show your opponent how useless fighting back is. When you would dodge an attack, you can choose to take the attack instead and make the opponent roll a **WIL** saving throw with a save of **d20+SPI** mod. If failed, apply [https://trello.com/c/GEs5Y73T/89-frighten](https://trello.com/c/GEs5Y73T/89-frighten "smartCard-inline") for **1** turn.

---

**Fearless Strikes**: You are sure in your strikes, threatening to punch directly through your opponent. **Gain (5+25% STR)** to attack damage rolls. If your damage roll **critically succeeds**, gain another action and impose disadvantage on the opponent. You can only gain an action once per turn this way.

---

**Eye of the Tiger**: Even while wounded, you’re still extremely dangerous. **Gain (3 + 15% DEX** ) mod when under **40%** HP.

---

**– Abilities –**

**Savage Elbow**

**Feral Fury Knee**

**Shin Drive**

**Leaping Tiger Fist**

card.desc:
Boxing, the fighting style of hitting and not getting hit. Some people say it’s an art, and some refer to it as the sweet science.

**– Proficiencies –**

**Focused Iron Fist**: You’ve trained your fist to deliver crushing blows, likening your hand to that of a truck. **Gain 5+10% STR** attack mod.

---

**Decisive Strikes**: You can pick apart your opponent, delivering punches in the right place at the right time. When dodging, you can spend **5** ki and force the opponent to make a **DEX** saving throw with a save of **d15+DEX mod (d20+DEX** mod if the opponent critically failed). On fail, roll to attack the enemy for **damage dice+(STR mod/2)** and gain [https://trello.com/c/sdiPWijl/193-rhythm](https://trello.com/c/sdiPWijl/193-rhythm "smartCard-inline") **.** On critical success, explode the dice. (roll it again without modifiers.)

---

**Head Movement**: You are tiresome to hit. Dodging an opponent’s attack drains **1d5% KI** and grants a stack of [https://trello.com/c/sdiPWijl/193-rhythm](https://trello.com/c/sdiPWijl/193-rhythm "smartCard-inline")**.**

‌

**– Abilities –**

**One-Two**

**Liver Punch**

**Corkscrew**

card.desc:
**Wolf Fang Fist** is a technique used and taught by Yamcha.

**– Proficiencies –**

**Heightened Instincts**: Your connection to wolves and nature sharpen your reflexes. (**3 + 15%** **DEX)** defense rolls.

---

**Predatory Precision**: Drawing from your wolf-like instincts, you exhibit heightened melee accuracy. **(3 + 15%** **DEX)** melee attack rolls.

---

**Swift Onslaught**: You trade out precise and strong blows for multiple that swarm and blitz your enemy.

Roll **2 d20+DEX mod** for attack rolls, but roll **2** (**d2+STR** **mod/2**) for damage rolls. You no longer cause the opponent to roll defense checks due to your unprecise strikes.

---

**Frenzy Strikes**: Your unorthodox fighting style is unpredictable and occasionally you release a dual-strike. If you **critically succeed** both **STR** melee attack rolls on a successful attack roll, Roll **1d20**. If the roll is higher than or equal to **18**, add **2d4+(STR mod/2)** to your damage total and apply [https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed](https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed "smartCard-inline") for **1** turn.

---

**Vulnerable Pelt**: You traded out a lot of durability and defense for offense. **Lose (4+20% CON)** modifier.

‌

**– Abilities –**

**Wolf Fang Fist**

**Whirlwind Kick**

**Wolf Slice Fist**

**Neo Wolf Fang Fist**

card.desc:
Channeling the essence of the legendary Kamehameha, Turtle users can unleash super beams after reaching a specific power threshold.

Requires and uses **80%** of your max ki. Roll **1d10+5** along with your Kamehameha attack. This can be used in the middle of your Kamehameha charging turn. While charging a Kamehameha, negate all effects of fatigue.

COSTS **1 ACTION** AND [BONUS ACTION](https://trello.com/c/fYSLNTR5/297-bonus-actions "‌")

**– Mastery –**
**1 Mastery**: Roll **1d15+5**
**2 Mastery**: Roll **1d20+5**
**3 Mastery**: Roll **1d25+10.** Upon successful hit, force the opponent to make a **CON** saving throw of (**d20**+**CON** mod+remaining HP), requiring a save of **d25+WIL mod+(Damage Dealt/3 rounded down)**. If failed, disintegrate the opponent.
card.name: Kamehameha Surge

card.desc:
You prefer to make quick work of your foes. You like targeting your opponent’s weak spots and landing critical blows, often ending the battle before it even started.

**-Negative 250 ALIGNMENT REQUIRED**

**– Proficiencies –**

**Predator's Finish**: You are a master when it comes to finishing off weakened prey. Deal **15%** increased damage to targets with less than **30%** health remaining.

---

**Toxic Executioner**: You capitalize on your foes' weakened states. Inflict **1d10%** extra damage against victims suffering from damage over time effects.

---

**Shadow's Gait**: You’re quick to take opportunities when they are open. Gain **+8** to initiative rolls when starting combat. When attacking a surprised opponent, attacks are **always critical**. Attacks done while [https://trello.com/c/Pkipq3vz/107-invisible](https://trello.com/c/Pkipq3vz/107-invisible "smartCard-inline") receive **+15% DEX** mod.

---

**Assassin’s Touch**: You know exactly where to hit to damage an opponent fatally. Critical **STR** attack rolls deal **2x** more damage.

---

**Evasion Bypass**: You can slip from an opponent’s line of vision, making them think you vanished. When critically succeeding **DEX** defense rolls and the opponent has ki sense activated, force them to make a disadvantaged **DEX** saving throw with a save of **15+(DEX mod/2)** mod. If failed or the opponent does not have ki sense activated, abandon the defense check and go [https://trello.com/c/Pkipq3vz/107-invisible](https://trello.com/c/Pkipq3vz/107-invisible "smartCard-inline").

---

**– Abilities –**

**Assassinate**

**Pin-Point Blow**

**Incognito**

**Secret Poison**

Can only be used against opponents with [https://trello.com/c/4JJvwsUX/114-grapple](https://trello.com/c/4JJvwsUX/114-grapple "smartCard-inline") in which case you are the grappler.

Use **1d15(%)** ki to lift your opponent into the air by their neck before slamming them into the ground.

Deal **1d5+STR** mod and end [https://trello.com/c/4JJvwsUX/114-grapple](https://trello.com/c/4JJvwsUX/114-grapple "smartCard-inline"). If the roll **critically succeeds**, explode the dice. (roll the dice again without the modifier)
Alternatively, spend **15** ki to keep [https://trello.com/c/4JJvwsUX/114-grapple](https://trello.com/c/4JJvwsUX/114-grapple "smartCard-inline").

COSTS 1 [ACTION ](https://trello.com/c/gJNhtO4D/296-action "‌")AND [**BONUS ACTION**](https://trello.com/c/fYSLNTR5/297-bonus-actions "‌")

**1 Mastery**: Roll **1d6+STR** mod
**2 Mastery**: Roll **1d7+STR** mod
**3 Mastery**: Roll **1d8+STR** mod. Costs **9** ki. Spend **10** ki to keep [https://trello.com/c/4JJvwsUX/114-grapple](https://trello.com/c/4JJvwsUX/114-grapple "smartCard-inline").

card.desc:
Run at your opponent, threatening to blow their head off.

You can target up to two opponent’s with this move. (If both of your arms are healthy)

Using **1d10+3(%)** ki, force the opponent to make a **DEX** saving throw with a save of **d20+CON** mod. If failed, deal **1d13+STR** mod and apply [https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance](https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance "smartCard-inline") for **2** rounds. Alternatively, use **10** ki to apply [https://trello.com/c/4JJvwsUX/114-grapple](https://trello.com/c/4JJvwsUX/114-grapple "smartCard-inline"). If succeeded, gain [https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance](https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance "smartCard-inline")for **1** turns.

**– Mastery –**
**1 Mastery**: Roll **d25+CON** mod for saving throw.
**2 Mastery**: Costs **8** ki.
**3 Mastery**: Roll **1d15+STR** mod for damage.

card.desc:
Charge a ball of ki that can be released into a beam of radiant light.

Spend **1d10(%)** ki to charge up a Kamehameha. You can charge it for **3** turns straight, using **1d5+2(%)** ki each turn.

For each hit you take, roll **1d20+CON** mod with a save of **16+(ATTACK DMG/2)**. Upon failing this save, stop charging Kamehameha.

For every turn you charge Kamehameha, add **+2** modifier to the damage roll.

card.desc:
Use your ki to make you fly. Increase **DEX** defense and attack rolls by 2. Opponent’s on the ground have **disadvantage** when attacking with a melee attack.

COSTS 1 [**BONUS ACTION**](https://trello.com/c/fYSLNTR5/297-bonus-actions "‌")

**MUST LEARN FROM MENTOR.**

**Drain: 10 energy** per turn.

Traveling takes **2** less energy.

Must clarify in combat if fly is used or not.

**– Mastery Thresholds** **–**

**1 Mastery**: Drain is reduced by **2**.

**2 Mastery**: Drain is reduced by **2**. Traveling takes **4** less energy.

**3 Mastery**: Drain is reduced by **2**. Increase **DEX** defense rolls by **2**.

**4 Mastery**: Drain is reduced by **2**. Add **+3** to **retreat** **rolls**. Traveling takes **6** less energy.

**5 Mastery**: Drain is reduced by **2**. You can reroll your travel roll once. Traveling no longer takes ki.

card.desc:
As you progressed as a swordsman, you realized that most of your fights could be solved if you were more sure in your strikes. You decide to pick up a bigger blade so that even if you wanted to pull back, you couldn’t.

Finish a combat turn while using a [Str & Dex] Weapon then roll a **3d100** **every enemy killed**, the save is **295**, in order to unlock this style.

---

**– Proficiencies –**

**Cleaving Swings**: Your training emphasizes destroying your opponent totally. Gain **+30%** **STR** mod to attack rolls.

‌

Additionally, if the opponent blocks with a weapon after critically succeeding **STR** attack roll, reduce their weapon’s durability by **3**.

---

**Bushido Code**: You follow the way of the samurai, upholding honor and integrity. Gain **+20%** **CON** mod. Additionally, gain **+1** to saving throws.

---

**Masterful Parry**: Your mastery with the sword allows you to parry incoming attacks effortlessly. When wielding a **Nodachi**, **+5 DEX** mod to defense rolls.

---

**Traditional Teachings**: Your main weapon is a Nodachi. Gain the buffs of **Swordsman** when wielding a **Nodachi**. When wearing heavy armor, **+15% DEX** mod to attacking roll.

---

**Honor Guard Stance**: Your footwork is elite, allowing you move into stances that threatens the opponent’s next instance of movement. When blocking an attack, move into **Honor Guard Stance**. Attacking ends this stance. If the attack is blocked, deal half the damage through block instead. If the opponent has no weapon, force a **CON** saving throw, the save being (**15+DMG/2**). On fail, do full damage and apply [https://trello.com/c/5zBjrquz/240-shogun-mark](https://trello.com/c/5zBjrquz/240-shogun-mark "smartCard-inline") until the end of your next turn.

---

**– Abilities –**

**Rising Sun Technique**

**Sweeping Sunlight**

**Early Morning**

**Crimson Sky Flurry**

card.desc:
Finish a combat turn while using a [SPEAR] Weapon then roll a **2d100**, the save is **199**, in order to unlock this style.

Will-Power must be your second or highest skill to roll the unlock for this style.

---

**– Proficiencies –**

**Draconic Precision**: Your technique mimics the deadly accuracy of a drake’s strike. Gain a **d5%** attack modifier to spear rolls. Additionally, you may add **50% of your WIL modifier** to the damage of spear **attack rolls** by spending **20% of your ki**. ( Stacks with **Precision Strikes** )

---

**Reptilian Swiftness:** Draconic energy flowing through you enhances your footwork and speed, while you wield a spear. **-1d2+1 to all dexterity hindrances from Spears**.

---

**Will of the Drake:** Your resolve draws on the power of draconic energy, enhancing your spiritual attacks. **Gain (2 + 10% SPI**) modifier and **Gain (2 + 15% WIL)** modifier.

When using **ki-based abilities** with your spear, you gain a additional **+2 bonus** to your **WIL modifier** for the duration of the attack.

---

**Scale and Strength:** Through rigorous training, your body has become as tough as drake scales.

You gain a **15%** to your **CON modifier** while wielding a spear, and you gain **3 Temporary HP** for every **WIL modifier** representing the resilience of a drake.

When lost restore fully at **midnight**.

---

**Draconic Aura:** Your presence on the battlefield resonates with the power of drakes, instilling fear in your foes. Once per encounter, you can emit an aura that forces all **opponents** roll a **WIL saving throw** with a save of **1d30+WILL** . On failure, they receive disadvantage on all rolls for one turn.

---

**-Abilities-**
card.name: Drake Knight

card.name: Assassin(Out Dated, tell tae to fix)

card.desc:
You elevate your fighting style with devastating kicks and agile maneuvers, making your legs a dangerous threat. Every strike is an expression of art and strength, capable of cutting through your opponent's defenses.

**– Proficiencies –**

**Wings of the Tempest**: Your legs move with the speed and grace of a hurricane’s gusts, enabling you to strike from unexpected angles. If you successfully land two kicks in a row, gain a third strike as a free action. The third strike deals **DEX mod** as additional damage.

---

**Phantom Step**: You glide across the battlefield unpredictably with the elegance of a breeze. **+35% DEX** mod.


 Any opponent attempting to attack you after a dodge is forced to roll a **WIL** saving throw with the save of **d20+DEX** mod. Upon failure, apply **1** turn of [https://trello.com/c/OWYFCAJQ/251-hesitant](https://trello.com/c/OWYFCAJQ/251-hesitant "smartCard-inline").

---

**Knee Block**: You’ve learned to block with a harder part of your body, the knees. Doesn’t actually do anything, I just think its a cool detail.

---

**Flamingo Stance**: You open up your opponent, using a stance similar to that of a Flamingo to keep your opponent guessing. After critically succeeding a **DEX** attack roll, switch into [https://trello.com/c/tc2qbqna/252-flamingo-stance](https://trello.com/c/tc2qbqna/252-flamingo-stance "smartCard-inline") and **store** the original roll. Roll the attack roll again and choose between the original or the new attack roll. Both attacks can be thrown out in the same turn.

---

**Steady Base**: Your training helps you stay on your feet. When you would be [https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance](https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance "smartCard-inline"), roll a **WIL** saving throw with a save of **D20+Enemy DEX** mod. If it succeeds, negate the effect. You can only do this once until its your turn.

---

**– Abilities –**

**Crashing Thunder Kick**
**Tornado Roundhouse**
**Heaven’s Howl**

card.desc:
You believe that the other fighting styles don’t reach their full potential because they only choose to see the value in specific limbs. You choose to turn all of your limbs into lethal weapons.

**– Proficiencies –**

**Iron Bone Conditioning**: Your bones are unnaturally tough. It’s like you have iron rods underneath your skin. When blocking a physical attack, deal **d3+(Blocked Damage/2)** mod to the attacker.

---

**Prowling Fury**: You walk your opponents down when they try to flee combat. Opponent Loses **25% to retreat rolls.**

---

**Spirit of the Tiger**: You like to show your opponent how useless fighting back is. When you would dodge an attack, you can choose to take the attack instead and make the opponent roll a **WIL** saving throw with a save of **d20+SPI** mod. If failed, apply [https://trello.com/c/GEs5Y73T/89-frighten](https://trello.com/c/GEs5Y73T/89-frighten "smartCard-inline") for **1** turn.

---

**Fearless Strikes**: You are sure in your strikes, threatening to punch directly through your opponent. **Gain 5+25% STR** to attack damage rolls. If your damage roll **critically succeeds**, gain another action and impose disadvantage on the opponent. You can only gain an action once per turn this way.

---

**Eye of the Tiger**: Even while wounded, you’re still extremely dangerous. **Gain (3 + 15% DEX** ) mod when under **40%** HP.

---

**– Abilities –**

**Savage Elbow**

**Feral Fury Knee**

**Shin Drive**

**Leaping Tiger Fist**

card.desc:
Boxing, the fighting style of hitting and not getting hit. Some people say it’s an art, and some refer to it as the sweet science.

**– Proficiencies –**

**Focused Iron Fist**: You’ve trained your fist to deliver crushing blows, likening your hand to that of a truck. **Gain 5+10% STR** attack mod.

---

**Decisive Strikes**: You can pick apart your opponent, delivering punches in the right place at the right time. When dodging, you can spend **5** ki and force the opponent to make a **DEX** saving throw with a save of **d15+DEX mod (d20+DEX** mod if the opponent critically failed). On fail, roll to attack the enemy for **damage dice+(STR mod/2)** and gain [https://trello.com/c/sdiPWijl/193-rhythm](https://trello.com/c/sdiPWijl/193-rhythm "smartCard-inline") **.** On critical success, explode the dice. (roll it again without modifiers.)

---

**Head Movement**: You are tiresome to hit. Dodging an opponent’s attack drains **1d5% KI.**

---

Evasive Foot Work - Dodging an attack add  1 Stack of [**RHYTHM**](https://trello.com/c/sdiPWijl/193-rhythm "‌") per turn.

**– Abilities –**

**One-Two**

**Liver Punch**

**Corkscrew**

When dodging, you can spend **5** ki and force the opponent to make a **DEX** saving throw with a save of **d15+DEX mod (d20+DEX** mod if the opponent critically failed). On fail, roll to attack the enemy for **damage dice+(STR mod/2)** and gain [https://trello.com/c/sdiPWijl/193-rhythm](https://trello.com/c/sdiPWijl/193-rhythm "smartCard-inline") **.** On critical success, explode the dice. (roll it again without modifiers.)

---

**Head Movement**: You are tiresome to hit. Dodging an opponent’s attack drains **1d5% KI.**

**– Abilities –**

**One-Two**

**Liver Punch**

**Corkscrew**

card.desc:
Striking is for chumps. You crave the thrill of tussling with your opponents, dominating them in every single way physically.

**– Proficiencies –**

**Ring Fortitude**: Your training made your body naturally tough as you endure punishment trying to approach your opponent. When taking damage from an attack, roll **d3+(CON** mod/2). The result is how much damage negated.

---

**Grapple Mastery**: You have an extensive understanding on how to manipulate and throw your weight around. Grapple attempts no longer have disadvantage and gain advantage when opponent has [https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance](https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance "smartCard-inline"). Additionally, stuns against an opponent last for **1** turn longer.

---

**Sprawl**: You know how to stop yourself from being grappled. Grapple attempts against you, unless the grappler is a wrestler, have disadvantage. If they fail the roll, apply [https://trello.com/c/4JJvwsUX/114-grapple](https://trello.com/c/4JJvwsUX/114-grapple "smartCard-inline") to the opponent.

---

**Crushing Physicality**: Your physical dominance is your main weapon. Substitute **STR** modifier for **CON** in attack rolls.

---

**Ground Glider**: You learned how to take advantage of your opponent’s mistakes by wrapping them up and making sure it’s the last mistake they ever make. When dodging an attack, spend **3%** ki to make both players roll **d20+DEX** mod with the opposing player rolling with disadvantage. If succeeded, apply [https://trello.com/c/4JJvwsUX/114-grapple](https://trello.com/c/4JJvwsUX/114-grapple "smartCard-inline") to the opponent.

---

**– Abilities –**

**Clothesline**

**Arm Crusher**

**Choke Slam**

**Suplex**

**Groundslam**

**Shove**

card.desc:
**Wolf Fang Fist** is a technique used and taught by Yamcha.

**– Proficiencies –**

**Heightened Instincts**: Your connection to wolves and nature sharpen your reflexes. (**3 + 15%** **DEX)** defense rolls.

---

**Predatory Precision**: Drawing from your wolf-like instincts, you exhibit heightened melee accuracy. **(3 + 15%** **DEX)** melee attack rolls.

---

**Swift Onslaught**: You trade out precise and strong blows for multiple that swarm and blitz your enemy.

Roll **2 d20+DEX mod** for attack rolls, but roll **2** (**d2+STR** **mod/2**) for damage rolls. You no longer cause the opponent to roll defense checks due to your unprecise strikes.

---

**Frenzy Strikes**: Your unorthodox fighting style is unpredictable and occasionally you release a dual-strike. If you **critically succeed** both **STR** melee attack rolls on a successful attack roll, Roll **1d20**. If the roll is higher than or equal to **18**, add **2d4+(STR mod/2)** to your damage total and apply [https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed](https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed "smartCard-inline") for **1** turn.

**Vulnerable Pelt**: You traded out a lot of durability and defense for offense. **Lose (4+20% CON)** modifier.

‌

**– Abilities –**

**Wolf Fang Fist**

**Whirlwind Kick**

**Wolf Slice Fist**

**Neo Wolf Fang Fist**

card.desc:
Verily! Thou dost now comprehend the most ancient and hallowed beginnings of Polearms-Manship! Yea, the noble art of poke and thrust, passed down through the annals of time by warriors of yore! The very foundations of this most revered combat form lie within thy grasp, bestowed upon thee by the hands of fate itself! Wield now thy polearm with valor, for the basics of this martial prowess are thine to command, O gallant one!!

**– Proficiencies –**

**Extended Reach:**
Your training with polearms allows you to maintain a safe distance from your opponents. When wielding a polearm, all physical attacks has _**disadvantage**_ towards the wielder.

**Precision Strikes:**
You have honed your technique to deliver powerful strikes. Gain a **+1d4**
attack mod to polearms rolls. Additionally, you may add your **25%** of you **DEX modifier** to the damage of polearm **Attack rolls** by spending **5+5%** ki.

**Battlefield Control :**
Your experience with polearms enables you to manipulate your opponent’s movements. You Receive **3 Charges** of this passive which **Resets at Midnight.**  When you successfully land a hit with a polearm, you can choose to impose [https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance](https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance "smartCard-inline") for **1 Turn.**

**Puncture Wounds:**
You know the vital points of your enemies. When rolling a critical success on **STR** attack rolls made with a polearm, cause **1d3 turns of** [https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed](https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed "smartCard-inline")  Additionally, when attacking opponents affected by Bleed Status, add a **1d3+STR** modifier to your **DEX** roll.

**Grappling Proficiency:**
Your polearm serves as an effective tool for controlling your opponent’s movements. When grappling with a polearm, **you do not roll with disadvantage**, even if your opponent is not in [https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance](https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance "smartCard-inline")   Status.

**– Abilities –**

**Sweeping Swing**

**Thrusting Strikes**

**Lacerating Slash**

card.desc:
A swordsman is someone proficient in the use of a sword for combat or artistic expression.

**– Proficiencies –**

**Practiced Technique**: You trained to purge most unnecessary movements from your striking. Gain **+25%** to **DEX** attack rolls.

**Sword Mastery**: Your extensive training with a sword makes your weapon look like an extension of your own body. When wielding a sword, gain **+1d3** attack mod to attacks done with swords and **-1d4** to all **dexterity hinderances** from using a weapon.

**Exposing Wounds**: You know exactly where to slice to wound your opponent. When rolling a critical success on **STR** attack rolls, cause **1d2** turns of [https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed](https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed "smartCard-inline"). Additionally, when attacking bleeding opponents, add **an Additional 25% Damage**.

‌

**– Abilities –**

**Cross Slash**

**Ki Sharpening**

**Impaling Thrust**

card.desc:
**Crane Style** is a martial arts style founded by Master Shen and taught by Shen and his brother Mercenary Tao.

**– Proficiencies –**

**Crane's Marking Strike**: You are taught to be persistent, not letting up until you see the life leave their eyes. Ki techniques can mark opponents, applying [https://trello.com/c/lgAEQXx4/95-cranes-mark](https://trello.com/c/lgAEQXx4/95-cranes-mark "smartCard-inline") for **1d5** turns and creating openings in their defense. If the attack is a multi-hit attack, you only have to roll once to decide how many turns it lasts for.

---

**Ki Rejuvenation**: You can regain your stamina quicker than usual due to your cardio intensive training. When [https://trello.com/c/lgAEQXx4/95-cranes-mark](https://trello.com/c/lgAEQXx4/95-cranes-mark "smartCard-inline") is removed from an enemy, remove one of the cooldowns from your skill and force the opponent to make a **CON** Saving Throw. If failed, [https://trello.com/c/O6wPnJ9j/96-stun](https://trello.com/c/O6wPnJ9j/96-stun "smartCard-inline") the opponent for **1** turn. Additionally, regain **1d10+5%** ki each turn.

---

**Crane’s Persistence**: Your teacher has always taught you finish what you started. **Gain ( 6 + 25% SPI )** mod and **( 4 + 25% WIL )** mod.

---

**– Abilities –**

**Dodon Ray**

**Dodon Barrage**

**Kikoho (Tien only)**

**Machine Gun Punch**

**Solar Flare (Tien only)**

card.desc:
Martial Arts founded by turtle hermit **Master Roshi** which presumably continues the teachings of Roshi's former sensei, **Master Mutaito**.

**– Proficiencies –**

**Shell Guard**: This guard is surprisingly effective at denying the opponent chance to strike vital points. When blocking an attack, add an extra **1d10**% of damage negation to the result. (i.e if you roll a **5**, add that as a **%** to your blocking negation. **80+5** = **85%**) Additionally, gain **4 + (20% CON)** to **CON** saving throws and add **5** + (**25% DEX**) to **DEX** defense check rolls.

---

**Turtle Tenacity**: Due to extensive training, your body is extraordinarily durable. When hit with a Ki attack, absorb **1d20**% (round down) of ki used to make the attack and negate **1d15+(25%)** points of damage from the attack. In addition to this, status effects last **2** turns shorter than usual.

---

**Not a Snapping Turtle**: Your resilience comes at a cost. Lose 4 **+ (20%) STR** modifier to physical attack rolls.

---

**Beam Proficiency**: Your understanding of ki makes your beams much stronger and accurate. Gain **6 + (25%) WIL** mod and **3+ (15%) DEX** mod when attacking with a beam.

**– Abilities –**

**Kamehameha**

**Kamehameha Surge**

**Dashing Kamehameha**

**Destructo Disc**

When grappling with a polearm, **you do not roll with disadvantage**, even if your opponent is not in [https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance](https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance "smartCard-inline")   Status.

**– Abilities –**

**Sweeping Swing**

**Thrusting Strikes**

**Lacerating Slash**

card.desc:
A swordsman is someone proficient in the use of a sword for combat or artistic expression.

**– Proficiencies –**

**Practiced Technique**: You trained to purge most unnecessary movements from your striking. Gain **+10%** to **DEX** attack rolls.

**Sword Mastery**: Your extensive training with a sword makes your weapon look like an extension of your own body. When wielding a sword, gain **+1d3** attack mod to attacks done with swords and **-1d4** to all **dexterity hinderances** from using a weapon.

**Exposing Wounds**: You know exactly where to slice to wound your opponent. When rolling a critical success on **STR** attack rolls, cause **1d2** turns of [https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed](https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed "smartCard-inline"). Additionally, when attacking bleeding opponents, add **an Additional 25% Damage**.

‌

**– Abilities –**

**Cross Slash**

**Ki Sharpening**

**Impaling Thrust**

card.desc:
Mastery is extremely important. Mastery allows you to become more efficient and effective with your transformations. Sometimes, using a weaker transformation that you have better mastery in is better than using your latest, strongest transformation. The same applies to abilities.

---

At the end of every fight that you are conscious and have used the ability, roll a **d20** for abilities and a **d50** for forms (unless specified otherwise) for mastery on **one** ability/form that you used during combat. The save is **20/50** respectively.

---

You can also roll for mastery on abilities and forms after you train. Ki abilities can be trained through meditation, while physical/martial abilities can be trained through sparring or shadow boxing.

---

After every fight in which you fail the save, you gain a **+1** modifier to your next mastery roll.

card.desc:
As long as you are not in any dangerous situation or combat situation, you can gain short rest charges.

Short rest charges heal at a rate of **d20(%)** hp, restore **d20(%)** ki, and remove **d15(%)** fatigue.

---

_**Outside a healing pod**_, you gain **1** short rest charge every **30 minutes**.

---

_**Inside a healing pod**_, you gain **2** short rest charges every **15 minutes.**

---

You can also use certain consumable items to heal yourself.

At **midnight**, you will heal back to full, regenerate all of your energy regardless of cooldown, and remove all fatigue. Does not apply if you are still in combat.

**Maximum Amount** of stored **Rest charge: 2**

‌

---

&

Every time you train, add **10**% to your fatigue.

---

It’s best to rest for fatigue to be removed. Alternatively, you can eat a [_**SENZU BEAN**_](https://trello.com/c/ARQNAFRz/111-senzu-bean "‌") to remove fatigue entirely.

**10%** Fatigue: (-**1 DEX - 10% DEX MOD)** and (**-1 STR - 10% STR MOD**). **20%** less training gains.

---

**20%** Fatigue: (-**2 DEX - 20% DEX MOD)** and (**-2 STR - 20% STR MOD**) mod. **40%** less training gains.

---

---

---

**80%** Fatigue: -**5 CON** mod. Disadvantage on **CON** saving throws.

**90%** Fatigue: Cannot search or travel. -**5 CON** mod. Disadvantage on **CON** saving throws. **Disadvantage on attack and defense rolls**. **100%** less training gains. (-**15 DEX - 90% DEX MOD)**, (**-15 STR - 90% STR MOD**), (**-15 SPI - 90% SPI MOD**)

---

**DEX** = 1000: **1d30**
**DEX** = 10000: **1d35**

card.desc:
Grappling allows you to restrain your opponent’s movements and control their body weight, whether that be pinning them onto the ground or throwing them around like a ragdoll.

---

This ability take 1 [**ACTION**](https://trello.com/c/gJNhtO4D/296-action "‌"), you can grapple. If the opponent is not [https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance](https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance "smartCard-inline"), roll with disadvantage.

If the grapple misses, **l**ose [**BONUS ACTIONS**](https://trello.com/c/fYSLNTR5/297-bonus-actions "‌") and turn ends.

---

When succeeding a grapple, apply [https://trello.com/c/4JJvwsUX/114-grapple](https://trello.com/c/4JJvwsUX/114-grapple "smartCard-inline").

card.desc:
You are evenly matched, clashing fists, kicks, and even ki beams.

---

If the attack that started the clash was a **melee attack**, start a clash frenzy. Both players roll **d20+DEX** mod. Both players roll **d20+DEX** mod again. This pattern continues until one party wins twice in a row.  This will override who’s turn it was and **The winning party rolls their attack roll for damage.**

If the attack that started the clash was a **ki attack**, start a ki struggle. Both players roll **d20+WIL** mod. Both players roll **d20+WIL** mod again. This pattern continues until one party wins twice in a row. This will override who’s turn it was and **The winning party rolls their attack roll for damage.**

card.desc:
Depending on which limb is targeted, injuries can mean certain death.
**Majins** are immune to injuries. Injury effects stack with other injury effects.

If one of the **arms** were targeted and was **broken**:
\-3 **STR** mod to attacks with that arm
\-2 **DEX** mod
The same effects still apply under **slicing**, but has an added effect.
[https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed](https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed "smartCard-inline") for **1d6+2** turns.

---

If one of the **legs** were targeted and was **broken**:
\-2 **STR** mod
\-3 **DEX** mod
The same effects still apply under **slicing**, but has an added effect.
[https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed](https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed "smartCard-inline") for **1d8+2** turns.

---

If the **ribs** were targeted and was **broken**:
\-**3 CON** mod

---

If the **head** was targeted and was **concussed**:
\-3 **HP**
\-3 **STR** mod
\-3 **DEX** mod
[https://trello.com/c/TvrlE0vP/153-concussion](https://trello.com/c/TvrlE0vP/153-concussion "smartCard-inline")

---

If the head was decapitated, then the victim dies. **(Does not apply to Bio-Androids)**

After combat, you can choose to injure the opponent. You can only injure them twice while they are unconscious. Multiple people can injure one person.

**Eye**: -**4 DEX** mod per eye if the victim does not have ki sense; With ki sense, **-2 DEX** mod per eye.
**Legs**: Same effects as above.
**Arms**: Same effects as above.
**Ears**: -**2 DEX** mod per ear;
**Head**: Same effects as above. Instead of inflicting a concussion, inflict brain damage and decrease opponent’s **INT** by -1.

---

card.desc:
**Combat is on a turn-based basis**. Who goes first is decided on initiative. (roll a raw **d50** and whoever gets the highest goes first, in descending order.)

---

ALL PLAYER WILL HAVE ONE [_**ACTION**_](https://trello.com/c/gJNhtO4D/296-action "‌") AND ONE [_**BONUS ACTION**_](https://trello.com/c/fYSLNTR5/297-bonus-actions "‌")

Player one will describe an Action and state specifically what they are using. If any, (**PHYSICAL ATTACK OR KI-BASED ATTACK**) clarify weather the attack is an action or bonus action.

If attacking with either action or bonus actions during their turn, Player one (ATTACKER) and player (DEFENDER) two will both roll **1d20+DEX** mod. If the attacker rolls higher than defender or if the defender critically fails (NAT 1), the hit lands. If the attacker rolls lower than the defender or if the attacker critically fails (NAT 1), that hit is either blocked or dodged: Both roll **1d20+DEX** again. **If the attacker critically failed, they roll 1d20-5**. **If the defender critically succeeded, they roll 1d20+5**. If the attacker rolled higher than the defender, the attack is blocked negating **80%** of the damage (Round down if decimal). However, if the attacker rolled lower than or the same as the defender, the defender dodges, receiving no damage. \*\*If both the attacker and the defender roll the same, [_**clash**_](https://trello.com/c/H9H51Ahx/123-clashing "‌").

Landing a **CRITICAL ATTACK ROLL** with at _**+5**_ to your attack **damage**.

---

If the hit lands, the attacker will roll **1d5+STR/WILL** mod. If the attacker **critically succeeds** (NAT 5 OR MAX ROLL), the attacker has a chance to break armor and break/remove a limb. The attacker rolls a **d20+STR/WILL**  mod. If the target is the defender’s head, roll a **d18+STR/WILL**  mod. The defender rolls a constitution saving throw. (if blocking, roll **d35+CON mod.** If not, roll **d25+CON mod**). If their throw is lower than the attacker’s roll, break/slice off the opponent’s limb. (**If it is a blunt attack, then the specified limb is broken/concussed. If it is a slash attack, then the specified limb is sliced off.**)

---

After the an a player fully end’s their turn, it will now be the person’s turn who was next in order of initiative.

This pattern continues to go on until one side has no more opposing players/player HP is 0.

If the battle is not going in a player’s favor, they can attempt to retreat.
Both players roll a **d20**. The roll needed to retreat is equal to the opponent’s roll + their **DEX** modifier. On a successful roll, the player will escape to a random area on the planet equal. (i.e roll = 356 so area-356) On a failed roll, They’ll lose their full turn and will gain disadvantage on all actions and actions bonus until the end of their next turn.

---

If player is knocked out or incapacitated during combat.
They must succeed a death d20 save every time it is their turn.
**Succeeding a death save 2** times (_rolling over 8_) times with leave you incapacitated. **Failing a death save 3 times** (_Rolling under 8_) _**will kill you.**_ A **player or npc can use an action** on their turn to **SAVE You** and cause you to **automatically succeed your death save**, yet at the same can also target you and  still **Attack You**, which is a **guaranteed** attack, in doing so you will have to **roll a con save**( **d20+Con** ) **if failed** (_**Under 15**_) **gain 1 failed death save**.

1. rolls 1d20 = 9 = failed once , on their next turn rolled again 1d20= 3 failed again, on their next turn rolls 1d20=2 dead.

---

Battles can be fought with more than 2 players. You’ll have to specify who’s on which team and who’s attacking who.
card.name: Combat

old.desc:
**Combat is on a turn-based basis**. Who goes first is decided on initiative. (roll a raw **d50** and whoever gets the highest goes first, in descending order.)

ALL PLAYER WILL HAVE ONE [_**ACTION**_](https://trello.com/c/gJNhtO4D/296-action "‌") AND ONE [_**BONUS ACTION**_](https://trello.com/c/fYSLNTR5/297-bonus-actions "‌")

Player one will describe an Action and state specifically what they are using. If any, (**PHYSICAL ATTACK OR KI-BASED ATTACK**) clarify weather the attack is an action or bonus action.

If attacking with either action or bonus actions during their turn, Player one (ATTACKER) and player (DEFENDER) two will both roll **1d20+DEX** mod. If the attacker rolls higher than defender or if the defender critically fails (NAT 1), the hit lands. If the attacker rolls lower than the defender or if the attacker critically fails (NAT 1), that hit is either blocked or dodged: Both roll **1d20+DEX** again. **If the attacker critically failed, they roll 1d20-5**. **If the defender critically succeeded, they roll 1d20+5**. If the attacker rolled higher than the defender, the attack is blocked negating **80%** of the damage (Round down if decimal). However, if the attacker rolled lower than or the same as the defender, the defender dodges, receiving no damage. \*\*If both the attacker and the defender roll the same, [_**clash**_](https://trello.com/c/H9H51Ahx/123-clashing "‌").

If the hit lands, the attacker will roll **1d5+STR/WILL** mod. If the attacker **critically succeeds** (NAT 5 OR MAX ROLL), the attacker has a chance to break armor and break/remove a limb. The attacker rolls a **d20+STR/WILL**  mod. If the target is the defender’s head, roll a **d18+STR/WILL**  mod. The defender rolls a constitution saving throw. (if blocking, roll **d35+CON mod.** If not, roll **d25+CON mod**). If their throw is lower than the attacker’s roll, break/slice off the opponent’s limb. (**If it is a blunt attack, then the specified limb is broken/concussed. If it is a slash attack, then the specified limb is sliced off.**)

After the an a player fully end’s their turn, it will now be the person’s turn who was next in order of initiative.

This pattern continues to go on until one side has no more opposing players/player HP is 0.

If the battle is not going in a player’s favor, they can attempt to retreat.
Both players roll a **d20**. The roll needed to retreat is equal to the opponent’s roll + their **DEX** modifier. On a successful roll, the player will escape to a random area on the planet equal. (i.e roll = 356 so area-356) On a failed roll, They’ll lose their full turn and will gain disadvantage on all actions and actions bonus until the end of their next turn.

If player is knocked out or incapacitated during combat.
They must succeed a death d20 save every time it is their turn.
**Succeeding a death save 2** times (_rolling over 8_) times with leave you incapacitated. **Failing a death save 3 times** (_Rolling under 8_) _**will kill you.**_ A **player or npc can use an action** on their turn to **SAVE You** and cause you to **automatically succeed your death save**, yet at the same can also target you and  still **Attack You**, which is a **guaranteed** attack, in doing so you will have to **roll a con save**( **d20+Con** ) **if failed** (_**Under 15**_) **gain 1 failed death save**.

1. rolls 1d20 = 9 = failed once , on their next turn rolled again 1d20= 3 failed again, on their next turn rolls 1d20=2 dead.

Battles can be fought with more than 2 players. You’ll have to specify who’s on which team and who’s attacking who.

card.desc:
Weights can enhance your training gains by large margins. The strongest fighters even fight with them on to enhance their gains. These gains are applied after all modifiers and multipliers to the result. They do not affect meditation.

**Light Weight**: **1.25**x Gains, -**2 DEX** - **20% DEX** mod

**Med. Weight**: **1.5**x Gains, -**4 DEX** - **40% DEX** mod

**Heavy Weight**: **2**x Gains, -**8 DEX** - **80% DEX** mod

**Extremely** **Heavy Weight**: **2.25**x Gains, -**15 DEX** - **90% DEX** mod

---

Weights have a durability of **20+INT** mod. Each time you train with weights equipped, lower the durability by **1**.

Completing Combat with weights on gives you a bonus to your mastery roll.

---

**Light Weight**: **+3** to **mastery roll**

**Med. Weight**: **+6** to **mastery roll**

**Heavy Weight**: **+8** to **mastery roll**

**Extremely Heavy Weight**: **+10** to **mastery roll**

card.desc:
There are four main methods of training:
**Shadow boxing**
**Weight training**
**Meditation training**
**Spar training (REQUIRES 2 PEOPLE)**

**Shadow boxing** increases your **DEX** stat.
**Weight training** increases your **STR** and **CON** stat.
**Meditation training** increases your **WILL** and **SPI** stat.
**Spar training** increases **ALL STATS** (except INT).

---

You can roll a **d10 x (SAGA)** to see how many stat points you gained. If you did a spar training, roll **5d10** **x (SAGA)**

When sparing with an opponent who’s power level is at least **250%** yours, increase the stat gain result by **250**% for each stat and decrease the opponent’s stat gain by **70%** for each stat.

If the training improves two stats, divide the gain in half and distribute the points how you want.

The stat gain can be amplified by training in a stronger gravity. You can go to a different planet or buy a gravity chamber.

**x10 Gravity**: 2d10x (SAGA)  gain, 500 PL Req

**x20 Gravity**: 4d10x (SAGA) gain, 1000 PL Req

**x50 Gravity**: 6d10x (SAGA) gain, 5000 PL Req

**x100 Gravity**: 1d100x (SAGA) gain, 10000 PL Req

**x150 Gravity**: 2d100x (SAGA) gain, 50000 PL Req

**x200 Gravity**: 4d100x (SAGA) gain, 100000 PL Req

**x250 Gravity**: 6d100x (SAGA) gain, 250000 PL Req

**x300 Gravity**: 10d100x (SAGA) gain, 500000 PL Req

These are the stat gains for spar training in stronger gravity.

**x10 Gravity**: 5d20x (SAGA) gain, 500 PL Req

**x20 Gravity**: 5d40x (SAGA) gain, 1000 PL Req

**x50 Gravity**: 5d60x (SAGA) gain, 5000 PL Req

**x100 Gravity**: 5d100x (SAGA) gain, 10000 PL Req

**x150 Gravity**: (2 5d100)x (SAGA) gain, 50000 PL Req

**x200 Gravity**: (4 5d100)x (SAGA) gain, 100000 PL Req

**x250 Gravity**: (6 5d100)x (SAGA) gain, 250000 PL Req

**x300 Gravity**: (10 5d100)x (SAGA) gain, 500000 PL Req

You can train multiple times a day, but each training will be less profitable. Refer to [https://trello.com/c/TmIAq3d8/109-fatigue](https://trello.com/c/TmIAq3d8/109-fatigue "smartCard-inline")  for more information.

card.desc:
You are evenly matched, clashing fists, kicks, and even ki beams.

If the attack that started the clash was a **melee attack**, start a clash frenzy. Both players roll **d20+DEX** mod. Both players roll **d20+DEX** mod again. This pattern continues until one party wins twice in a row.  This will override who’s turn it was and **The winning party rolls their attack roll for damage.**

If the attack that started the clash was a **ki attack**, start a ki struggle. Both players roll **d20+WIL** mod. Both players roll **d20+WIL** mod again. This pattern continues until one party wins twice in a row. This will override who’s turn it was and **The winning party rolls their attack roll for damage.**
card.name: Clashing

old.desc:

If the attack that started the clash was a **melee attack**, start a clash frenzy. Both players roll **d20+DEX** mod. Both players roll **d20+DEX** mod again. This pattern continues until one party wins twice in a row. The winning party rolls their attack roll for damage.

If the attack that started the clash was a **ki attack**, start a ki struggle. Both players roll **d20+WIL** mod. Both players roll **d20+WIL** mod again. This pattern continues until one party wins twice in a row. The winning party rolls their attack roll for damage.

_**Saga Mission**_

if the number is **higher than or equal to 93 but lower than 98**, you found a **story quest**! This quest’s difficulty changes based on the saga and can even be the reason for a saga change. Notify your friends or create enemies! You will fight a character, depending on your alignment, from the original Dragon Ball anime, respective to the saga and timeline. **THESE CAN ONLY BE ROLLED ON EARTH AS OF NOW. IF NOT ON EARTH, ROLL A d2. 1 = Mentor (if none, do a challenging quest) 2 = Challenging Quest.**
(Or Optionally Do a Backstory involved mission, must be approved my Tae, chilly or wolfie.)

Completing these quests gives (**d90+30 x saga number**) stat points and **500d100** zeni to whoever helped/opposed.
Make sure to read [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline")!

card.desc:
You can gather resources **3** times per area.

This resets every day.

When gathering resources, spend **10%** max ki and roll **1d5 x INT** which dictates how many resources you gain.

A form of currency that allows you to craft things. You can get it through gathering resources.

Resources, no matter the quantity, only take up one inventory slot.
card.name: Resource Gather

old.desc:
You can gather resources **2** times per area.

This resets every day.

When gathering resources, spend **10%** max ki and roll **1d5 x INT** which dictates how many resources you gain.

A form of currency that allows you to craft things. You can get it through gathering resources.

Resources, no matter the quantity, only take up one inventory slot.

card.desc:
These are actions that affect the story. Things like destroying cities or defeating an evil monster or invasion.

These are **NOT** actions like fishing or doing basic jobs.

Canon actions also heavily dictate your alignment. Doing net negative actions like mass murder will decrease your alignment, while doing net positive actions like saving a planet from destruction will increase your alignment.

It also worth noting that since the story progresses from these actions, consequences of your actions will start to appear.

All Players have the ability to complete **1 CANON ACTION** every _**3 days**_

You must alert **EVERYONE** whenever you make a canon action.

**Upon completion, roll a 3d90+80 for stat points.**
card.name: Canon Action

card.desc:
Grappling allows you to restrain your opponent’s movements and control their body weight, whether that be pinning them onto the ground or throwing them around like a ragdoll.

This ability take 1 [**ACTION**](https://trello.com/c/gJNhtO4D/296-action "‌"), you can grapple. If the opponent is not [https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance](https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance "smartCard-inline"), roll with disadvantage.

If the grapple misses, **l**ose [**BONUS ACTIONS**](https://trello.com/c/fYSLNTR5/297-bonus-actions "‌") and turn ends.

When succeeding a grapple, apply [https://trello.com/c/4JJvwsUX/114-grapple](https://trello.com/c/4JJvwsUX/114-grapple "smartCard-inline").

card.desc: **Bonus Actions:** Bonus actions are quick, secondary moves that add flexibility and versatility to a turn. Players can use them to activate specific moves or abilities, heal themselves, or heal allies who are still fighting. These actions offer tactical support options, letting players stay in the fight longer or protect others without using up their primary action for the turn.
card.name: Bonus Actions

card.desc:
**Actions**: Actions are the main moves a player can take in a turn. These include making attacks with physical or ki abilities, which can trigger -_Extra Attack_- passive (if the player has it), or performing strategic maneuvers like the HELP/SAVE action.

The HELP/SAVE action is crucial for supporting downed allies, as it lets players stabilize allies close to dying, preventing them from failing additional death saves.
card.name: Action

card.desc:
The basic universal currency to purchase things. You can buy things ranging from food to spaceships with it. You can obtain zeni by doing missions and honest work.

Alternatively, you could go down a dark path and take what isn’t yours. Whether it be lives or wallets…

Zeni, no matter the quantity, only takes up one inventory slot.

Zeni  for _Basic Mission_ = _**5000$**_
Zeni  for a _Challenging Mission_ = _**10000$**_
Zeni  for a Extremely Challenging mission = _**15000$**_
Zeni  for a Saga Mission = _**30000$ (Unless stated otherwise)**_
card.name: Zeni

card.desc:
**Combat is on a turn-based basis**. Who goes first is decided on initiative. (roll a raw **d50** and whoever gets the highest goes first, in descending order.)

ALL PLAYER WILL HAVE ONE [_**ACTION**_](https://trello.com/c/gJNhtO4D/296-action "‌") AND ONE [_**BONUS ACTION**_](https://trello.com/c/fYSLNTR5/297-bonus-actions "‌")

Player one will describe an Action and state specifically what they are using. If any, (**PHYSICAL ATTACK OR KI-BASED ATTACK**) clarify weather the attack is an action or bonus action.

If attacking with either action or bonus actions during their turn, Player one (ATTACKER) and player (DEFENDER) two will both roll **1d20+DEX** mod. If the attacker rolls higher than defender or if the defender critically fails (NAT 1), the hit lands. If the attacker rolls lower than the defender or if the attacker critically fails (NAT 1), that hit is either blocked or dodged: Both roll **1d20+DEX** again. **If the attacker critically failed, they roll 1d20-5**. **If the defender critically succeeded, they roll 1d20+5**. If the attacker rolled higher than the defender, the attack is blocked negating **80%** of the damage (Round down if decimal). However, if the attacker rolled lower than or the same as the defender, the defender dodges, receiving no damage. \*\*If both the attacker and the defender roll the same, [_**clash**_](https://trello.com/c/H9H51Ahx/123-clashing "‌").

If the hit lands, the attacker will roll **1d5+STR/WILL** mod. If the attacker **critically succeeds** (NAT 5 OR MAX ROLL), the attacker has a chance to break armor and break/remove a limb. The attacker rolls a **d20+STR/WILL**  mod. If the target is the defender’s head, roll a **d18+STR/WILL**  mod. The defender rolls a constitution saving throw. (if blocking, roll **d35+CON mod.** If not, roll **d25+CON mod**). If their throw is lower than the attacker’s roll, break/slice off the opponent’s limb. (**If it is a blunt attack, then the specified limb is broken/concussed. If it is a slash attack, then the specified limb is sliced off.**)

After the an a player fully end’s their turn, it will now be the person’s turn who was next in order of initiative.

This pattern continues to go on until one side has no more opposing players/player HP is 0.

If the battle is not going in a player’s favor, they can attempt to retreat.
Both players roll a **d20**. The roll needed to retreat is equal to the opponent’s roll + their **DEX** modifier. On a successful roll, the player will escape to a random area on the planet equal. (i.e roll = 356 so area-356) On a failed roll, They’ll lose their full turn and will gain disadvantage on all actions and actions bonus until the end of their next turn.

If player is knocked out or incapacitated during combat.
They must succeed a death d20 save every time it is their turn.
**Succeeding a death save 2** times (_rolling over 8_) times with leave you incapacitated. **Failing a death save 3 times** (_Rolling under 8_) _**will kill you.**_ A **player or npc can use an action** on their turn to **SAVE You** and cause you to **automatically succeed your death save**, yet at the same can also target you and  still **Attack You**, which is a **guaranteed** attack, in doing so you will have to **roll a con save**( **d20+Con** ) **if failed** (_**Under 15**_) **gain 1 failed death save**.

1. rolls 1d20 = 9 = failed once , on their next turn rolled again 1d20= 3 failed again, on their next turn rolls 1d20=2 dead.

Battles can be fought with more than 2 players. You’ll have to specify who’s on which team and who’s attacking who.

If the attacker rolls higher than defender or if the defender critically fails (NAT 1), the hit lands. If the attacker rolls lower than the defender or if the attacker critically fails (NAT 1), that hit is either blocked or dodged: Both roll **1d20+DEX** again. **If the attacker critically failed, they roll 1d20-5**. **If the defender critically succeeded, they roll 1d20+5**. If the attacker rolled higher than the defender, the attack is blocked negating **80%** of the damage (Round down if decimal). However, if the attacker rolled lower than or the same as the defender, the defender dodges, receiving no damage. \*\*If both the attacker and the defender roll the same, [_**clash**_](https://trello.com/c/H9H51Ahx/123-clashing "‌").

If the hit lands, the attacker will roll **1d5+STR/WILL** mod. If the attacker **critically succeeds** (NAT 5 OR MAX ROLL), the attacker has a chance to break armor and break/remove a limb. The attacker rolls a **d20+STR/WILL**  mod. If the target is the defender’s head, roll a **d18+STR/WILL**  mod. The defender rolls a constitution saving throw. (if blocking, roll **d35+CON mod.** If not, roll **d25+CON mod**). If their throw is lower than the attacker’s roll, break/slice off the opponent’s limb. (**If it is a blunt attack, then the specified limb is broken/concussed. If it is a slash attack, then the specified limb is sliced off.**)

After the an a player fully end’s their turn, it will now be the person’s turn who was next in order of initiative.

This pattern continues to go on until one side has no more opposing players/player HP is 0.

If the battle is not going in a player’s favor, they can attempt to retreat.
Both players roll a **d20**. The roll needed to retreat is equal to the opponent’s roll + their **DEX** modifier. On a successful roll, the player will escape to a random area on the planet equal. (i.e roll = 356 so area-356) On a failed roll, They’ll lose their full turn and will gain disadvantage on all actions and actions bonus until the end of their next turn.

If player is knocked out or incapacitated during combat.
They must succeed a death d20 save every time it is their turn.
**Succeeding a death save 2** times (_rolling over 8_) times with leave you incapacitated. **Failing a death save 3 times** (_Rolling under 8_) _**will kill you.**_ A **player or npc can use an action** on their turn to **SAVE You** and cause you to **automatically succeed your death save**, yet at the same can also target you and  still **Attack You**, which is a **guaranteed** attack, in doing so you will have to **roll a con save**( **d20+Con** ) **if failed** (_**Under 15**_) **gain 1 failed death save**.

1. rolls 1d20 = 9 = failed once , on their next turn rolled again 1d20= 3 failed again, on their next turn rolls 1d20=2 dead.

Battles can be fought with more than 2 players. You’ll have to specify who’s on which team and who’s attacking who.

card.desc:
A long and low sweeping strike with you polearm, aimed at your opponents legs.

Use **12** ki to swing you weapon at your opponents legs. On successful hit/block, force the opponent to make a **DEX** saving throw with a save of **d18+STR** **mod** if failed apply [https://trello.com/c/oKMnKj3N/295-prone](https://trello.com/c/oKMnKj3N/295-prone "smartCard-inline") for 1d2 turns. Deals **1d13+STR** mod

**– Mastery –**
**1 Mastery**: Deals **1d15+STR** mod. Costs **10** ki.
**2 Mastery**: Deals **1d17+STR** mod. Costs **8** ki
**3 Mastery**: Upon **critically succeeding** attack rolls (not damage), ground flying enemies costs **9** ki.

card.desc:
**Wolf Fang Fist** is a technique used and taught by Yamcha.

**– Proficiencies –**

**Heightened Instincts**: Your connection to wolves and nature sharpen your reflexes. **+4** **DEX** defense rolls.

**Predatory Precision**: Drawing from your wolf-like instincts, you exhibit heightened melee accuracy. **+4** **DEX** melee attack rolls.

**Swift Onslaught**: You trade out precise and strong blows for multiple that swarm and blitz your enemy. Roll **2 d20+DEX mod** for attack rolls, but roll **2** (**d2+STR** **mod/2**) for damage rolls. You no longer cause the opponent to roll defense checks due to your unprecise strikes.

**Frenzy Strikes**: Your unorthodox fighting style is unpredictable and occasionally you release a dual-strike. If you **critically succeed** both **STR** melee attack rolls on a successful attack roll, Roll **1d20**. If the roll is higher than or equal to **18**, add **2d4+(STR mod/2)** to your damage total and apply [https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed](https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed "smartCard-inline") for **1** turn.

**Vulnerable Pelt**: You traded out a lot of durability and defense for offense. **-3 CON** modifier.

‌

**– Abilities –**

**Wolf Fang Fist**

**Whirlwind Kick**

**Wolf Slice Fist**

**Neo Wolf Fang Fist**

card.desc:
The Seed of Might is capable of planting the legendary “Tree of Might”, also known as the “Tree of Death”. This legendary existence is only able to grow through the energy of the planet it’s planted on. As such, the planet that the tree is on will be susceptible to death unless enough energy is provided.

The Seed of Might itself will also redevelop after the tree grows, and you will be given the opportunity to plant the tree another time, however this also comes at a cost. Each planet only has enough energy to harbor the tree once, and no mortal can survive eating more than two fruits off the tree without immense side effects.

The Tree of Might is only capable of surviving on planets with an established atmosphere that could house any other plants, such as Earth, Namek, and Yardrat. However, as Earth is substantially smaller than the other two planets, it will be subsequently destroyed after the tree fully blossoms.

The Fruit of Might, a Fruit that comes from the Tree of Might, is a substance that is nearly all powerful. This fruit is able to instantly cultivate users to unheard of levels after simply eating one. After the first fruit is eaten, the second fruit’s effects will be diminished, however this is still incredibly strong.

As The Fruit of Might is incredibly strong, it will take a full saga to plant and bear fruits. This tree can also only be planted **AFTER** the Saiyan Saga. Additionally, it is up to you to capitalize off of the fruits. Depending on which planet you plant the Tree of Might on, you may be met with discontent. In order to protect their planet, heroes will attack you, and in order to gain more power, Villains will attempt to kill you and steal the Fruits of Might.

The Fruit of Might is a mythical existence, said to be made purely for the Gods to consume, however this doesn’t meant mortals cannot eat them. The base modifier for the first fruit you eat from the Tree of Might will be
**5d20+20**. The Second Fruit you eat from the Tree of Might will be a flat **2x** multiplier. If you for some reason attempt to eat a **THIRD** fruit from the Tree, you will be greatly weakened, as the divine powers of the fruit disagree with your foolish mortal exoskeleton, and you will have to roll a save. **1d100**.

**1-20**: You unfortunately perish.

**21-40**: You lose **80%** of your total power, and also lose all ability to use ki, as well as all ki related abilities, and mastery. (These can be relearned.)

**41-60**: Your Body violently rejects the fruit, but fortunately you only lose **40%** of your total power, and retain your ki mastery.

**61-90**: The third fruit surprisingly does not affect your body.

**91-99**: The third fruit cultivates with you on another level. Your power is doubled once more.

**100**: The third fruit resonates with your soul deeply. Your power is quadrupled.

card.desc:
A small beam of light that one fires through their fingertip.

Use **8** ki to fire a beam of light. Force the opponent to make a **DEX** saving throw with a save of **d20+WIL** mod. Deals **1d7+WIL** mod.

**– Mastery –**

**Mastery 1**: Deals **1d8+WIL** mod. Uses **7** ki
**Mastery 2**: Deals **1d9+WIL** mod. Uses **6** ki
**Mastery 3**: Deals **1d10+WIL** mod. If the opponent missed an attack that ended their turn the previous turn, force them to roll the **DEX** saving throw with disadvantage.

card.desc:
Unleash your hatred onto the world. Your skin starts to glow a deep blue, revealing all of your hideous features. Orbs of ki start to circle around you, with your ki turning a strange deep blue and mimicking roaring hell flames

Gain **+15** **ALL MODS** (except INT) while the form is active. Transforming does not take an action. Gain **x30 PL**.

Every **-50** alignment increases modifier by **+10** and **PL modifier by x5** more.

Drain: **40** Ki per turn.

**Soul Siphon**: Every punch saps the victim’s energy. On **successful hits/blocked hits**, regain **1d15** ki and cause them the same amount.

card.desc:
You can apply ki to your attacks. You can also condense your ki into attacks known as Ki Blasts.

You can learn this through a mentor or when meditating.

If meditating, roll **1d50** with a save of **49** or higher. You must have **300** **PL** to learn it this way.

Use **5** ki each turn to add **+3** **attack damage** mod and **+3 DEX** mod.

**– Mastery –**
**1 Mastery**: Costs **3** ki. Adds **+4** attack damage mod.
**2 Mastery**: Costs **2** ki. Adds **+5** attack damage mod and **+4 DEX** mod
**3 Mastery**: This ability is now passive and costs no ki. Add 1/4 **WIL** mod to attack damage.

card.desc:
You know how to control your ki to be more efficient.

You can learn this through a mentor or when meditating.

If meditating, roll **1d50** with a save of **49** or higher. You must have **120** Max Ki to learn it through **meditation.**

**+1 SPI** mod.

**– Mastery Thresholds –**

**Mastery 1**: **+2 SPI** mod.
**Mastery 2**: **+3 SPI** mod and **+1 WIL** mod.
**Mastery 3**: -**5** less ki drain on ki attacks and **-3** less ki drain on physical attacks.

card.desc:
Merchants can be found anywhere in major cities in planets. Depending on the planet, they might sell different things.
Only Earth shops sells Ramen, Bread, Dumplings, shovels, and fishing rods.

When buying in bulk (**more than 3, even if you leave and come back**), roll **1d65** to see how many are in stock. You can reroll this value every day you visit the shop. Please pin the value for other people to see in case they want to buy the same item.

**Recovery Capsule**: 30k Zeni
**Ki Recovery Capsule**: 30k Zeni
**Fishing Rod** : 15k Zeni
**Fishing Tackle**: 50k Zeni
**Mixed Capsule**: 45k Zeni
**Sage Water**: 20k Zeni
**Hetap™**: 10k Zeni

card.desc:
Unleash your hatred onto the world. Your skin starts to glow a deep blue, revealing all of your hideous features. Orbs of ki start to circle around you, with your ki turning a strange deep blue and mimicking roaring hell flames

Gain **+15** **ALL MODS** (except INT) while the form is active. Transforming does not take an action. Gain **x30 PL**.

Every **-50** alignment increases modifier by **+10**.

Drain: **40** Ki per turn.

**Soul Siphon**: Every punch saps the victim’s energy. On **successful hits/blocked hits**, regain **1d15** ki and cause them the same amount.

card.desc:
Use your ki to make you fly. Increase **DEX** defense and attack rolls by 2. Opponent’s on the ground have **disadvantage** when attacking with a melee attack.

**MUST LEARN FROM MENTOR.**

**Drain: 10 energy** per turn.

Traveling takes **2** less energy.

Must clarify in combat if fly is used or not.

**– Mastery Thresholds** **–**

**1 Mastery**: Drain is reduced by **2**.

**2 Mastery**: Drain is reduced by **2**. Traveling takes **4** less energy.

**3 Mastery**: Drain is reduced by **2**. Increase **DEX** defense rolls by **2**.

**4 Mastery**: Drain is reduced by **2**. Add **+3** to **retreat** **rolls**. Traveling takes **6** less energy.

**5 Mastery**: Drain is reduced by **2**. You can reroll your travel roll once. Traveling no longer takes ki.

card.desc:
You can search **7 times per new area**. This limit resets every midnight. Searching takes **3 Ki**.

By searching, you can find gear, quests, and characters/mentors.
For quests, check [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline") and [https://trello.com/c/ugKoYqi8/110-alignment](https://trello.com/c/ugKoYqi8/110-alignment "smartCard-inline")!

Roll a **1d100.**

_**Legendary Item**_

_**Saga Mission**_

if the number is **higher than or equal to 93 but lower than 98**, you found a **story quest**! This quest’s difficulty changes based on the saga and can even be the reason for a saga change. Notify your friends or create enemies! You will fight a character, depending on your alignment, from the original Dragon Ball anime, respective to the saga and timeline. **THESE CAN ONLY BE ROLLED ON EARTH AS OF NOW. IF NOT ON EARTH, ROLL A d2. 1 = Mentor (if none, do a challenging quest) 2 = Challenging Quest.**
(Or Optionally Do a Backstory involved mission, must be approved my Tae, chilly or wolfie.)

Completing these quests gives (**d90+30 x saga number**) stat points and **500d100** zeni to whoever helped/opposed.
Make sure to read [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline")!

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\__

_**Mentorship**_
If the number is **higher than or equal to** **80 but lower than 93 you found a** mentor! You’ll have to fight them and win to see if you can learn anything from them. This fight also counts as spar training. **Please contact a DM for stat rolls.**

_**Very Challenging Mission**_

If the number is **higher than or equal to 75 but lower than 80**, you found a **Very** **challenging quest**! Roll a **d2** to see what type of quest it is.

Negatively aligned = 1
Positively aligned = 2

Both quests give (**d30+10 x saga number**) stat points and **400d100** zeni.
Make sure to read [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline")!

_**Challenging Mission**_

If the number is **higher than or equal to 65 but lower than 75** you found a **challenging quest**! Roll a **d2** to see what type of quest it is.

Negatively aligned = 1
Positively aligned = 2

Both quests give (**d20 + 8 x saga number**) stat points and **200d100** zeni.

_**Casual Mission**_

If the number is **higher than or equal to 50 but lower than 65**, you found a **low rank quest**! Roll a **d2** to see what type of quest it is.

Negatively aligned = 1
Positively aligned = 2

Both quests give (**d10 + 5 x saga number**) stat points and **100d100** zeni.
**Engaging in combat gives you d15 die instead of d10**.

For quests, check [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline") and [https://trello.com/c/ugKoYqi8/110-alignment](https://trello.com/c/ugKoYqi8/110-alignment "smartCard-inline")!

Roll a **1d100.**

_**Saga Mission**_

if the number is **higher than or equal to 93 but lower than 98**, you found a **story quest**! This quest’s difficulty changes based on the saga and can even be the reason for a saga change. Notify your friends or create enemies! You will fight a character, depending on your alignment, from the original Dragon Ball anime, respective to the saga and timeline. **THESE CAN ONLY BE ROLLED ON EARTH AS OF NOW. IF NOT ON EARTH, ROLL A d2. 1 = Mentor (if none, do a challenging quest) 2 = Challenging Quest.**
(Or Optionally Do a Backstory involved mission, must be approved my Tae, chilly or wolfie.)

Completing these quests gives (**d90+30 x saga number**) stat points and **500d100** zeni to whoever helped/opposed.
Make sure to read [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline")!

If the number is **higher than or equal to 75 but lower than 80**, you found a **Very** **challenging quest**! Roll a **d2** to see what type of quest it is.

Positively aligned = 2

Bansho Fan: roll a d3 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d2+1 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. Your attacks use half of your **SPIRIT** mod and half of your **STR** mod for ATTACK damage.

**This damaged is Split Between Targets.**

card.desc:
You are a specimen amongst the demon clan warriors. You are feared for your absolutely terrifying physique and dominate physical prowess.

**Innate**: You can use this on top of other forms.

Gain **+4 ALL MODS.** Gain **x30 PL**.

**Drain: NONE**

**– Abilities –**

**Intimidating Stature**: Your large frame and broad shoulders intimidate your enemies. Sometimes showing up even causes them to retreat and surrender. Every turn, if bigger and have more **PL** than your opponent, force a **WIL** saving throw of **CON dice+CON** mod.

**Physical Prowess**: Your freak physique amplifies your strength and speed. You can no longer obtain an injury whenever you block an attack.

**Crushing Blows**: Your size can easily make your opponent bend to your will. When attacking an opponent’s block, force them to make a **CON** saving throw with a save of **STR dice+STR** mod. Gain **+5 ALL MODS** (except INT) while the form is active, applying modifiers as needed.

This form can only be triggered when at 70% Hp and lower, this Transformation Takes an action.

**Drain**: **40 Energy** per turn.

The Hera’n Race **Unlock this form at 10k Base BP**

card.desc:

Mastery Level 3: Reduce drain by **100.**

card.desc:
Unleash your hatred onto the world. Your skin starts to glow a deep blue, revealing all of your hideous features. Orbs of ki start to circle around you, with your ki turning a strange deep blue and mimicking roaring hell flames

Gain **x10** **ALL STATS** (except INT) while the form is active. Transforming does not take an action.

Every **-50** alignment increases exponent by **1**.
i.e: **-50** alignment  = **x10^2** | **-100** alignment  = **x12^3**

Drain: **40** Ki per turn.

**Soul Siphon**: Every punch saps the victim’s energy. On **successful hits/blocked hits**, regain **1d15** ki and cause them the same amount.
card.name: Dark Devil
