i.e: **-50** alignment  = **x6** | **-100** alignment  = **x7**

Drain: **40** Ki per turn.

**Soul Siphon**: Every punch saps the victim’s energy. On **successful hits/blocked hits**, regain **1d15** ki and cause them the same amount.

card.desc:
Mastery is extremely important. Mastery allows you to become more efficient and effective with your transformations. Sometimes, using a weaker transformation that you have better mastery in is better than using your latest, strongest transformation. The same applies to abilities.

At the end of every fight that you are conscious and have used the ability, roll a **d20** for abilities and a **d50** for forms (unless specified otherwise) for mastery on **one** ability/form that you used during combat. The save is **20/50** respectively.

You can also roll for mastery on abilities and forms after you train. Ki abilities can be trained through meditation, while physical/martial abilities can be trained through sparring or shadow boxing.

After every fight in which you fail the save, you gain a **+1** modifier to your next mastery roll.

_**Saga Mission**_

if the number is **higher than or equal to 93 but lower than 98**, you found a **story quest**! This quest’s difficulty changes based on the saga and can even be the reason for a saga change. Notify your friends or create enemies! You will fight a character, depending on your alignment, from the original Dragon Ball anime, respective to the saga and timeline. **THESE CAN ONLY BE ROLLED ON EARTH AS OF NOW. IF NOT ON EARTH, ROLL A d2. 1 = Mentor (if none, do a challenging quest) 2 = Challenging Quest.**
(Or Optionally Do a Backstory involved mission, must be approved my Tae, chilly or wolfie.)

Completing these quests gives (**d90+30 x saga number**) stat points and **500d100** zeni to whoever helped/opposed.
Make sure to read [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline")!

_**Very Challenging Mission**_

If the number is **higher than or equal to 75 but lower than 80**, you found a **Very** **challenging quest**! Roll a **d2** to see what type of quest it is.

Negatively aligned = 1
Positively aligned = 2

Both quests give (**d30+10 x saga number**) stat points and **400d100** zeni.

_**Casual Mission**_

_**Saga Mission**_

if the number is **higher than or equal to 93 but lower than 98**, you found a **story quest**! This quest’s difficulty changes based on the saga and can even be the reason for a saga change. Notify your friends or create enemies! You will fight a character, depending on your alignment, from the original Dragon Ball anime, respective to the saga and timeline. **THESE CAN ONLY BE ROLLED ON EARTH AS OF NOW. IF NOT ON EARTH, ROLL A d2. 1 = Mentor (if none, do a challenging quest) 2 = Challenging Quest.**

Completing these quests gives (**d90+30 x saga number**) stat points and **500d100** zeni to whoever helped/opposed.
Make sure to read [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline")!

You drive your sword into the opponent’s torso.

Use **10** ki to impale a target. Upon successful attack, apply **1** turn of [https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed](https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed "smartCard-inline") and deal additional **1d4**. Force the opponent to make a **CON** saving throw with a save of **d20+STR mod**. If failed, apply [https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance](https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance "smartCard-inline") for **1** turn and regain action.

**– Mastery –**

**2 Mastery**: Costs **8** Ki. Deal **1d6** mod

card.desc:
Unleash your hatred onto the world. Your skin starts to glow a deep blue, revealing all of your hideous features. Orbs of ki start to circle around you, with your ki turning a strange deep blue and mimicking roaring hell flames

Gain **x5** **ALL STATS** (except INT) while the form is active. Transforming does not take an action.

Every **-50** alignment increases by **1**.
i.e: **-50** alignment  = **x6** | **-100** alignment  = **x7**

Drain: **40** Ki per turn.

**Soul Siphon**: Every punch saps the victim’s energy. On **successful hits/blocked hits**, regain **1d15** ki and cause them the same amount.

card.desc:
The Tortles are a wise race of humanoid turtles, known for their deep connection to nature, profound wisdom, and remarkable defensive capabilities. With a strong sense of community, they strive to create peace and prosperity within their own and other communities. These creatures are seen as good fortune to those who cross paths with them and are welcomed with open arms in to most communities, only frowned upon by creatures with evil and nefarious intentions.

– Abilities –

**Master of Defense**: Being a giant turtle has its pros and cons, With your shell you have a **+10 CON** mod with downside of **-5+15% DEX** mod.

**Heavy Shed**: Every week you shed your shell giving a **+10 DEX** mod, at the same time you lose **-5+15% CON** mod. Shell regenerates **4** days after the shed.

**Way of Oogway**: Descendants of the Tortle Master Oogway, you gain a **+2** in **SPI**, **WIL**, and a minimum of **4** INT as you are a sentient turtle. On top of this you are naturally seen as a symbol of good luck and peacefulness, gain an extra **+1** Alignment from all positive tasks

**Shell Rest**: While you have your shell, you have the option to hide in your shell for **+5** modifier to short rests. However, you cannot use healing pods because of your shell.

**Ancient** **Martial Weapon Proficiency:** As Descendants of the Ancient Master Oogway the tortles have a spiritual and physical connection with martial weapons. **-1d3 dex hinderance on Martial weapons** (I.e Katana , Nodachi , Sai , Nun-Chucks, Bo-Staff, Spear , and Power pole)

**Decedents of Way**: Holding saint Oogway to the highest regard all Torless must have, “Way”, in there name.
card.name: Tortless Way

Gain **10^8x ALL STATS** (except INT) while the form is active, applying modifiers as needed.

**Drain**: **500 energy** per turn.

Mastery Level 1: Reduce drain by **100.**
Mastery Level 2: Reduce drain by **100.**
Mastery Level 3: Reduce drain by **100.**
Mastery Level 4: Reduce drain by **50**.
Mastery Level 5: Reduce drain by **50**. Gain **+12** **STR** modifier to attack rolls and **+8 DEX** modifier to attack and defense rolls.

card.desc:
Big monke. Scary monke. Monke gold. Monke scarier.

**Can be transformed into if you’re a Saiyan with a tail, you look at a full moon/fake moon, and you have access to Super Saiyan 3.**

Roll a **d20**. When critically **succeeding**, transform into a **Golden Oozaru**, else, transform into a regular **Oozaru**.

Gain **x10^50 ALL STATS** (except INT) while the form is active. Fighting styles and their buffs are lost.

You cannot choose who you attack. Roll **1dX** to choose who to attack where **X** is the number of combatants in the combat.

Every turn, roll **d50.** When critically succeeding, transform and unlock **Super Saiyan 4**.
card.name: Golden Oozaru

Mastery Level 5: Reduce drain by **20**. Gain **+8** **STR** modifier to attack rolls and **+5 DEX** modifier to attack and defense rolls, and **+5 CON. Instead**

card.desc:
Unleash your hatred onto the world. Your skin starts to glow a deep blue, revealing all of your hideous features. Orbs of ki start to circle around you, with your ki turning a strange deep blue and mimicking roaring hell flames

Gain **x10** **ALL STATS** (except INT) while the form is active. Transforming does not take an action.

Every **-50** alignment increases by **1**.
i.e: **-50** alignment  = **x11** | **-100** alignment  = **x12**

Drain: **40** Ki per turn.

**Soul Siphon**: Every punch saps the victim’s energy. On **successful hits/blocked hits**, regain **1d15** ki and cause them the same amount.
card.name: Dark Devil

**You then revert to 25% of your original age.**

card.desc:
Restores you to your youth, if you drink from its water purifying your body and further lengthening your potential.

Roll a 1d20 to determined what your permanent stat multiplier.
1-10 =1.25x
10-15 =1.50x
15-19 =1.75x
20  = 2x
**You then revert to 25% of your original age.**
card.name: Fountain of Youth

card.desc:
Jeremy Wade’s legendary fishing rod is more than just a tool; it’s an extension of his spirit and mastery over the waters. Crafted from resilient, almost mystical materials, it hums with the strength and stories of every battle fought against river monsters and deep-sea giants. This rod bends and flexes like a living force, standing unyielding against the most ferocious, thrashing beasts that other gear would shatter against. In Wade’s skilled hands, it becomes unstoppable—an artifact infused with the power to conquer the untamable, bridging the world of man and beast with every cast and reel.

_**Infinite Durability [ Unsellable ]**_
card.name: Jeremy Wade's Fishing Rod

card.desc:
A compact capsule capable of instantaneously storing any **non-living item**, **regardless of its size, mass, or volume**, reducing it to pocket-size for easy transport and retrieval.

**Store 5x Items**
card.name: True Capsule

card.desc:
The Spear of Longinus is a legendary lance with a pointed, elegant blade that symbolizes immense power and divine origin. Famed for its mythic association with granting immortality or divine favor to those who wield it, the Spear is often depicted as possessing the ability to pierce anything, even the toughest armor or barriers. Its aura radiates an otherworldly energy, with inscriptions or designs that hint at ancient secrets, making it a highly coveted and revered artifact in both lore and legend.

**Spear**: roll d17+2 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d9+2 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. Your attacks use half of your **WILLPOWER** mod and half of your **STR** mod for ATTACK damage. **(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.)**

**+5 Con and 5 Wil** whiled wielded
card.name: Spear of Longinus

old.desc: **Spear**: roll d17+2 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d9+2 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. Your attacks use half of your **WILLPOWER** mod and half of your **STR** mod for ATTACK damage. **(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.)**

card.desc: **Spear**: roll d17+2 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d9+2 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. Your attacks use half of your **WILLPOWER** mod and half of your **STR** mod for ATTACK damage. **(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.)**
card.name: Spear of Longinus

card.desc:
A molecular Monstrosity, infusing this gemstone into your body warps and Mutates you.

**All your stats are halved But you gain an additional mutation roll with advantage.**
card.name: Blood Ruby
Eldritch Run (Contains the power of the stars)

card.desc:
Protection for Good and Evil.

**Otherworldly Entities Cannot and Will not Interact With you.**
card.name: Ancient Wuxia Talisman

card.desc:
You can **reroll** your **travel roll** twice a day, **Traveling no longer takes ki** as you ride on your magic carpet.

The ride is exceptionally comfortable, while on the carpet gain and traveling automatically used a **Free Rest charge**. (Cooldown every 30min)
card.name: Magic Carpet

card.desc:
When you first obtain a weapon, whether it be from making it, you must roll for its stats. The type of dice you roll depends on the weapon.

Weapons:

**Club**: roll a d2 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation) , roll a d3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod.

**Spiked Club**: roll a d3 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod

**Power Pole**: roll a d4 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod

**Bo-Staff:** roll a d4 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod, your **DEX mod** is used for **ATTACK** damage.

**Nun-Chuck:** roll a d2 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod, your **DEX mod** is used for **ATTACK** damage.

**Duel Sai**: roll a 2 d2 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d4+1 for inhibiting attacking DEX mod Your attacks use half of your **ATTACK** mod and half of your **DEX** mod for ATTACK damage.

**Sword**: roll a d5 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d7+4 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod

**Katana**: roll a d2 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d7+5 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. Your attacks use half of your **ATTACK** mod and half of your **DEX** mod for **ATTACK** damage.

**Scythe**: roll a d7+1 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d8+4 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. **(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.) Crits with this weapon cause the dice to explode.**

**Nodachi**: roll a d4+1 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d9+5 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. Your attacks use half of your **ATTACK** mod and half of your **DEX** mod for damage. Add **+5** to durability roll. **(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.)**

**Spear**: roll d6+2 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d8+3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. **(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.)**

**Halberd**: roll d8+3 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d10+5 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. **(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.)**

**Greatsword**: roll a d9+3 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d10+5 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod.

**Greathammer**: roll a d10+3 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d11+8 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. **(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.)**

**Bansho Fan**: roll a d3 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d2+1 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. Your attacks use half of your **SPIRIT** mod and half of your **STR** mod for ATTACK damage.

**Brave Sword**: roll a d15+4 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d8+3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. Cannot break.

**Dimension Sword**: roll a d20+6 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d6+2 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. Cannot break.

Attacking with a weapon and rolling less than a **3** on your NAT roll reduces durability by **1**.
card.name: Weapons

card.desc:
This Weapon is capable of to convert Ki into Wind.

Bansho Fan: roll a d3 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d2+1 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. Your attacks use half of your **SPIRIT** mod and half of your **STR** mod for ATTACK damage.

Once Per Combat this fan is capable of **Hitting Multiple enemies (3x)** at once who’s turns are directly after each other for **10%+30ki.**
**This damaged is Halved Between Targets.**
card.name: Bansho Fan

card.desc:
You can search **7 times per new area**. This limit resets every midnight. Searching takes **3 Ki**.

By searching, you can find gear, quests, and characters/mentors.
For quests, check [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline") and [https://trello.com/c/ugKoYqi8/110-alignment](https://trello.com/c/ugKoYqi8/110-alignment "smartCard-inline")!

Roll a **1d100.**

_**Legendary Item**_

If the NAT roll is **98** or higher, you found a **legendary item**! Roll a **d20** to see which legendary item it is(If Location Specific items are rolled, reroll):

_**Saga Mission**_

if the number is **higher than or equal to 93 but lower than 98**, you found a **story quest**! This quest’s difficulty changes based on the saga and can even be the reason for a saga change. Notify your friends or create enemies! You will fight a character, depending on your alignment, from the original Dragon Ball anime, respective to the saga and timeline. **THESE CAN ONLY BE ROLLED ON EARTH AS OF NOW. IF NOT ON EARTH, ROLL A d2. 1 = Mentor (if none, do a challenging quest) 2 = Challenging Quest.**

Completing these quests gives (**d90+30 x saga number**) stat points and **500d100** zeni to whoever helped/opposed.
Make sure to read [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline")!

_**Mentorship**_
If the number is **higher than or equal to** **80 but lower than 93 you found a** mentor! You’ll have to fight them and win to see if you can learn anything from them. This fight also counts as spar training. **Please contact a DM for stat rolls.**

_**Casual Mission**_

If the number is **higher than or equal to 50 but lower than 65**, you found a **low rank quest**! Roll a **d2** to see what type of quest it is.

Negatively aligned = 1
Positively aligned = 2

Both quests give (**d10 + 5 x saga number**) stat points and **100d100** zeni.
**Engaging in combat gives you d15 die instead of d10**.
Make sure to read [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline")!

_**Normal Item**_

If the number is **higher than or equal to 30 but lower than 50**, you found an **item**! Roll a **d20** to see what item it is.

Small wallet (5000 zeni) = 1
[5x] Resources = 2
Recovery capsule = 3
Shovel = 4
Hetap™ = 5
Vita Drink = 6
Sage Water = 7
Ki recovery capsule = 8
[5/5 durabiltiy] Welding Torch = 9
[Broken] Motherboard = 10
Component = 11
[2x] Copper Wires = 12
[Destroyed] [Unrepairable] Engine Conjuction = 13
Mixed capsule = 14
Hunting Traps = 15
Fishing Rod = 16
Small Training Weight = 17
Healer’s Kit = 18
Skining Knife =19
Senzu bean = 20

If the number is **lower than 30**, you found **nothing**.

card.desc:
When you first obtain a weapon, whether it be from making it, you must roll for its stats. The type of dice you roll depends on the weapon.

Weapons:

**Club**: roll a d2 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation) , roll a d3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod.

**Spiked Club**: roll a d3 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod

**Power Pole**: roll a d4 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod

**Bo-Staff:** roll a d4 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod, your **DEX mod** is used for **ATTACK** damage.

**Nun-Chuck:** roll a d2 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod, your **DEX mod** is used for **ATTACK** damage.

**Duel Sai**: roll a 2 d2 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d4+1 for inhibiting attacking DEX mod Your attacks use half of your **ATTACK** mod and half of your **DEX** mod for ATTACK damage.

**Sword**: roll a d5 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d7+4 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod

**Katana**: roll a d2 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d7+5 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. Your attacks use half of your **ATTACK** mod and half of your **DEX** mod for **ATTACK** damage.

**Scythe**: roll a d7+1 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d8+4 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. **(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.) Crits with this weapon cause the dice to explode.**

**Nodachi**: roll a d4+1 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d9+5 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. Your attacks use half of your **ATTACK** mod and half of your **DEX** mod for damage. Add **+5** to durability roll. **(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.)**

**Spear**: roll d6+2 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d8+3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. **(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.)**

**Halberd**: roll d8+3 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d10+5 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. **(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.)**

**Greatsword**: roll a d9+3 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d10+5 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod.

**Greathammer**: roll a d10+3 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d11+8 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. **(Swordsman buffs do not apply unless stated otherwise.)**

**Brave Sword**: roll a d15+4 for **ATTACK** mod, roll a d8+3 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. Cannot break.

**Dimension Sword**: roll a d20+6 for **ATTACK** mod (bypasses armor damage negation), roll a d6+2 for inhibiting attacking **DEX** mod. Cannot break.

Attacking with a weapon and rolling less than a **3** on your NAT roll reduces durability by **1**.

card.desc:
The Tortles are a wise race of humanoid turtles, known for their deep connection to nature, profound wisdom, and remarkable defensive capabilities. With a strong sense of community, they strive to create peace and prosperity within their own and other communities. These creatures are seen as good fortune to those who cross paths with them and are welcomed with open arms in to most communities, only frowned upon by creatures with evil and nefarious intentions.

– Abilities –

**Master of Defense**: Being a giant turtle has its pros and cons, With your shell you have a **+10 CON** mod with downside of **-5 DEX** mod.

**Heavy Shed**: Every week you shed your shell giving a **+10 DEX** mod, at the same time you lose **-5 CON** mod. Shell regenerates **4** days after the shed.

**Way of Oogway**: Descendants of the Tortle Master Oogway, you gain a **+2** in **SPI**, **WIL**, and a minimum of **4** INT as you are a sentient turtle. On top of this you are naturally seen as a symbol of good luck and peacefulness, gain an extra **+1** Alignment from all positive tasks

**Shell Rest**: While you have your shell, you have the option to hide in your shell for **+5** modifier to short rests. However, you cannot use healing pods because of your shell.

**Ancient** **Martial Weapon Proficiency:** As Descendants of the Ancient Master Oogway the tortles have a spiritual and physical connection with martial weapons. **-1d3 dex hinderance on Martial weapons** (I.e Katana , Nodachi , Sai , Nun-Chucks, Bo-Staff, Spear , and Power pole)

**Decedents of Way**: Holding saint Oogway to the highest regard all Torless must have, “Way”, in there name.
card.name: Tortless Way

card.desc:
Combat is on a turn-based basis. Who goes first is decided on initiative. (roll a **d50** and whoever gets the highest goes first, in descending order.)

1. Player one will describe the attack and state which move they are using, if any. (**PHYS OR KI**)
2. Player one and player two will both roll **1d20+DEX** mod. If the attacker rolls higher than defender or if the defender critically fails (NAT 1), the hit lands. If the attacker rolls lower than the defender or if the attacker critically fails (NAT 1), the hit is either blocked or dodged: Both roll **1d20+DEX** again. **If the attacker critically failed, they roll 1d20-5**. **If the defender critically succeeded, they roll 1d20+5**. If the attacker rolled higher than the defender, the attack is blocked negating **80%** of the damage (Round down if decimal). However, if the attacker rolled lower than or the same as the defender, the defender dodges, receiving no damage. If both the attacker and the defender roll the same, [clash](https://trello.com/c/H9H51Ahx/123-clashing "‌").
3. If the hit lands, the attacker will roll **1d5+STR/WILL** mod. If the attacker **critically succeeds** (NAT 5 OR MAX ROLL), the attacker has a chance to break armor and break/remove a limb. The attacker rolls a **d20+STR/WILL** mod. If the target is the defender’s head, roll a **d18+STR/WILL** mod. The defender rolls a constitution saving throw. (if blocking, roll **d35+CON mod.** If not, roll **d25+CON mod**). If their throw is lower than the attacker’s roll, break/slice off the opponent’s limb. (**If it is a blunt attack, then the specified limb is broken/concussed. If it is a slash attack, then the specified limb is sliced off.**)
4. After the attack is dealt or missed, unless specified otherwise, the roles switch between the players.
5. This pattern continues to go on until one side has no more opposing players/player HP is 0.
6. If the battle is not going in a player’s favor, they can attempt to retreat. Both players roll a **d20**. The roll needed to retreat is equal to the opponent’s roll + their **DEX** modifier. On a successful roll, the player will escape to a random area on the planet equal. (i.e roll = 356 so area-356) On a failed roll, they will gain disadvantage on all actions until their next turn.

**It is assumed that every random combat instance is a death battle, regardless of the opponent’s intentions. When a battle is lost you must roll your death saves, you must pass a save of 10 with a d20 (no mods) twice with out failing twice in a row twice or three times in general.**

example.
rolls 1d20 = 9 = failed once , rolled again 1d20= 3 failed again dead.

Battles can be fought with more than 2 players. You’ll have to specify who’s on which team and who’s attacking who.

1001-2000 PL - 5 3d100

**Challenging Quest** - A harder version of a Low-Ranked Quest, you have to fight an opponent to obtain the rewards. They also get a fighting Style

Roll a **d6** for their fighting style.
**1** = Swordsmen ( By Default use a Regular Sword )
**2** = Wolf
**3** = Crane
**4** = Wrestler
**5** = Boxing
**6** = Tiger

**Player Power level requirements for enemy stat rolls :**
0-50 PL -  5 1d40 + 10
51-250 PL - 5 1d80 + 20
251-500 PL -  5 2d70  + 50
501-1000 PL -  5 3d100  + 50
1001-2000 PL - 5 5d100 + 60

---

**Very Challenging Quest** - A harder version of a Challenging Quest, you have to fight potentially multiple opponents to obtain the rewards. They also get a fighting Style.
Roll **d2+1** for enemy count unless told otherwise by a mod.

Roll a **d6** for their fighting style.
**1** = Swordsmen ( By Default use a Regular Sword )
**2** = Wolf
**3** = Crane
**4** = Wrestler
**5** = Boxing
**6** = Tiger

**Player Power level requirements for enemy stat rolls :**
0-50 PL -  5 1d40 + 10
51-250 PL - 5 1d100 + 20
251-500 PL -  5 2d70  + 35
501-1000 PL -  5 3d100  + 50
1001-2000 PL - 5 5d100 + 60

---

**Saga Quest** - The hardest quest to complete. The enemy stat roll will be decided through DMs.

card.desc:
From birth, your power was abnormally (and almost unnaturally) high. You were usually abysmally stronger than the fighters that opposed you. You never really had to struggle for strength.

**– Abilities –**

**Abnormal Growth**: Your body easily adapts to stresses your body is placed under and repairs quite fast under rest. When rolling a dice for training, add **+%25** to the roll and multiply the result by **1d2+1** on top of gravity multipliers.

**Born Ruler**: Your natural strength makes the universe bow its head. When rolling for your initial stats, roll **5 2d80+40** instead of **5d20**.

**Prone to Comfortability**: Since you never really had to struggle or train much, it is much harder to control your power. Your mastery requirements on transformations are **4x** harder. You cannot master other forms when you haven’t mastered the previous form.

- **Second Form**: Roll **d100**+Fail Modifier
  The success save is **75**
  [2 levels of mastery]
  Level 1 = 1/6 normal stats
  Level 2 = 1/4 normal stats
  Add **+1** to mastery roll every fail.
- **Third Form**: Roll **2d100**+Fail Modifier
  The success save is total **195**
  [3 levels of mastery]
  Level 1 = 1/3 normal stats
  Level 2 = 1/2 normal stats
  Level 3 = Increase regeneration to **1d7%** **energy**
  Add **+1** to mastery roll every fail.
- **Final Form**: Roll **3d100**+Fail Modifier
  The success save is **295**
  [4 levels of mastery]
  Level 1 = Base
  Level 2 = x1.10
  Level 3 = x1.15 normal stats
  Level 4 = x1.20 normal stats
  Add **+1** to mastery roll every fail..
- **100% Final Form:** Roll 4d100+Fail Modifier
  The success save is **399**
  [5 levels of mastery]
  **Level 0**: Base  | Lose **-3 DEX** mod and gain **+6 STR** mod.
  **Level 1**: x1.05 | Reduce drain by **5**|Gain **+7 STR** mod instead.
  **Level 2:** x1.10 | Reduce drain by **10**|Gain **+8 STR** mod instead.
  **Level 3**: x1.15 | Reduce drain by **5**|Gain **+9 STR** mod instead.
  **Level 4:** x1.20 | Reduce drain by **10**|Gain **+9** **STR** mod and **+1 DEX** mod.
  **Level 5**: x1.25 | Reduce drain by  **10**|Gain **+2 DEX** mod instead.
  Drain: **100 ki** per turn.
card.name: Prodigious Achievement

card.desc:
As long as you are not in any dangerous situation or combat situation, you can gain short rest charges.

Short rest charges heal at a rate of **d25** hp, restore **d10** ki, and remove **d15(%)** fatigue.

_**Outside a healing pod**_, you gain **1** short rest charge every 30 minutes.

_**Inside a healing pod**_, you gain **2** short rest charges every 15 minutes.

You can also use certain consumable items to heal yourself.

At **midnight**, you will heal back to full, regenerate all of your energy regardless of cooldown, and remove all fatigue. Does not apply if you are still in combat.

**Maximum Amount** of stored **Rest charge: 2**

card.desc:
Weights can enhance your training gains by large margins. The strongest fighters even fight with them on to enhance their gains. These gains are applied after all modifiers and multipliers to the result. They do not affect meditation.

**Light Weight**: **1.25**x Gains, -**2 DEX** mod
**Med. Weight**: **1.5**x Gains, -**4 DEX** mod
**Heavy Weight**: **2**x Gains, -**8 DEX** mod
**Extremely** **Heavy Weight**: **2.25**x Gains, -**15 DEX** mod

Weights have a durability of **20+INT** mod. Each time you train with weights equipped, lower the durability by **1**.

Winning with weights on gives you a bonus to your mastery roll.

**Light Weight**: **+3** to **mastery roll**
**Med. Weight**: **+6** to **mastery roll**
**Heavy Weight**: **+10** to **mastery roll**
**Extremely Heavy Weight**: **+12** to **mastery roll**

card.desc:
Frost Demons are bipedal humanoids that have red eyes and white keratinous plating covering scaly reptilian skin. They also have other reptilian features such as horns, long tails, three-toed feet, and spikes. Frost Demon’s keratinous plates can sometimes resemble gems.

**– Abilities –**

**Space Breathing**: Frost Demons have the ability to survive in the vacuum of space.

**Suppression Forms**: Frost Demons can suppress themselves into weaker forms to allow themselves to have a slight advantage in battles with weaker opponents.

**Race of Rulers**: Frost Demons are born incredibly strong. Roll **5 d80+10** for your stat rolls instead of **5d20**.

**Extraterrestrial Equilibrium:** Automatically gain the **flight** ability.

**Alien**: You spawn in the on the Frieza Planet.

**Long Tail:** Grapple attempts no longer have disadvantage against you.
card.name: Frost Demon

card.desc:
## Character ‘About Me’

**Character Name**: What you want your character to be called.

**Character Age**: How close your character is to dying from time. This a time relative rpg that will be starting in early dragon ball, so it would probably be best not to make an old character, unless getting the dragon balls is going to be a top priority for your lore.

**Character Race**: You can choose from any of the common races or create your own and be a Alien. You can achieve other races through modifying your body (Android) or reincarnation (Demon, Majin).

**Character Height**: Not required, but it is nice to know for immersion.

**Character Weight**: Not required, but it is nice to know for immersion.

**Character Goal**: Not required, but it is nice to know for immersion.

**Character Background**: Not required, but it is nice to know for immersion. Would highly recommend you create a background if you choose Alien.

## **READ THE RACES CATEGORY BEFORE CONTINUING AND MAKING YOUR BUILD.**

## Stats

When creating your character, you will need to make **3** rolls. One for your stats, one for mutations, and one for intelligence. You will roll a **5d20** for your first roll to dictate your stats, excluding intelligence. You can only reroll this total once. You will roll **1d10** for intelligence.

**Total Stats**: The sum of all of your stats.
**STR**: Dictates how strong your physical attacks are
**DEX**: Dictates your dodge/hit chance
**CON**: Dictates your Max HP count
**WIL**: Dictates how strong your ki/spiritual attacks are
**SPI**: Dictates how much max ki you have
**INT**: Dictates what level of technology you can make
**MAX HP**: How much total HP you have. This can be calculated through 20 + (**CON** mod x 10)
**MAX KI**: How much total ki you have. This can be calculated through 20 + (**SPI** mod x 10)
**POWER LEVEL**: A concept of measurement predicting how strong you are. Can be calculated through (1.5×STR)+(1.5×WIL)+(1×DEX)+(0.75×CON)+(0.75×SPI)+(0.5×INT)+(MAXHP/10)+(MAXKI/10) _**USE BOT COMMAND**_

_**/Calculate**_

Initially, every 20 points is a +1
After reaching 200 points in that stat, every 200 afterwards is +1
After reaching 2000 points in that stat, every 2000 afterwards is +1
(This goes on indefinitely.)

You can use the second roll to compensate for a mutation or add more stats to your total, losing your mutation roll in the process. (Instead of **5d20**, it would be **5d100+20**).

## Mutations

Mutations can change how your character functions, effectively altering some entire mechanics of the game. If you roll a **19** or higher on a **d20** roll, you can choose a mutation that already exists within the Dragon Ball verse or make your own. **(MUST BE APPROVED BY CHILLY (**@sauce9011 **)**
card.name: Character Creation

## Stats

**MAX KI**: How much total ki you have. This can be calculated through 20 + (**SPI** mod x 10)
**POWER LEVEL**: A concept of measurement predicting how strong you are. Can be calculated through **1 + (0.5 x Total Stats) + (8*ALL MODS)**

Initially, every 20 points is a +1
After reaching 200 points in that stat, every 200 afterwards is +1

(This goes on indefinitely.)

You have evolved past the limits of your kin. Breaking your limits, your grow taller and heavier,

You gain **x15** and you gain **1d10+10**% **ki** each turn.

If you roll higher than your opponent, they receive [https://trello.com/c/GEs5Y73T/89-frighten](https://trello.com/c/GEs5Y73T/89-frighten "smartCard-inline")  for **1d5** turns. This effect can only be triggered once per combat.

card.desc:
Combat is on a turn-based basis. Who goes first is decided on initiative. (roll a **d50** and whoever gets the highest goes first, in descending order.)

1. Player one will describe the attack and state which move they are using, if any. (**PHYS OR KI**)
2. Player one and player two will both roll **1d20+DEX** mod. If the attacker rolls higher than defender or if the defender critically fails (NAT 1), the hit lands. If the attacker rolls lower than the defender or if the attacker critically fails (NAT 1), the hit is either blocked or dodged: Both roll **1d20+DEX** again. **If the attacker critically failed, they roll 1d20-5**. **If the defender critically succeeded, they roll 1d20+5**. If the attacker rolled higher than the defender, the attack is blocked negating **80%** of the damage (Round down if decimal). However, if the attacker rolled lower than or the same as the defender, the defender dodges, receiving no damage. If both the attacker and the defender roll the same, [clash](https://trello.com/c/H9H51Ahx/123-clashing "‌").
3. If the hit lands, the attacker will roll **1d5+STR/WILL** mod. If the attacker **critically succeeds** (NAT 5 OR MAX ROLL), the attacker has a chance to break armor and break/remove a limb. The attacker rolls a **d20+STR/WILL** mod. If the target is the defender’s head, roll a **d18+STR/WILL** mod. The defender rolls a constitution saving throw. (if blocking, roll **d35+CON mod.** If not, roll **d25+CON mod**). If their throw is lower than the attacker’s roll, break/slice off the opponent’s limb. (**If it is a blunt attack, then the specified limb is broken/concussed. If it is a slash attack, then the specified limb is sliced off.**)
4. After the attack is dealt or missed, unless specified otherwise, the roles switch between the players.
5. This pattern continues to go on until one side has no more opposing players/player HP is 0.
6. If the battle is not going in a player’s favor, they can attempt to retreat. Both players roll a **d20**. The roll needed to retreat is equal to the opponent’s roll + their **DEX** modifier. On a successful roll, the player will escape to a random area on the planet equal. (i.e roll = 356 so area-356) On a failed roll, they will gain disadvantage on all actions until their next turn.

**It is assumed that every random combat instance is a death battle, regardless of the opponent’s intentions.**

Battles can be fought with more than 2 players. You’ll have to specify who’s on which team and who’s attacking who.

The attacker rolls a **d20+STR/WILL** mod. If the target is the defender’s head, roll a **d18+STR/WILL** mod. The defender rolls a constitution saving throw. (if blocking, roll **d35+CON mod.** If not, roll **d25+CON mod**). If their throw is lower than the attacker’s roll, break/slice off the opponent’s limb. (**If it is a blunt attack, then the specified limb is broken/concussed. If it is a slash attack, then the specified limb is sliced off.**)
4. After the attack is dealt or missed, unless specified otherwise, the roles switch between the players.
5. This pattern continues to go on until one side has no more opposing players/player HP is 0.
6. If the battle is not going in a player’s favor, they can attempt to retreat. Both players roll a **d20**. The roll needed to retreat is equal to the opponent’s roll + their **DEX** modifier. On a successful roll, the player will escape to a random area on the planet equal. (i.e roll = 356 so area-356) On a failed roll, they will gain disadvantage on all actions until their next turn.

**It is assumed that every random combat instance is a death battle, regardless of the opponent’s intentions.**

Battles can be fought with more than 2 players. You’ll have to specify who’s on which team and who’s attacking who.
card.name: Combat

old.desc:
Combat is on a turn-based basis. Who goes first is decided on initiative. (roll a **d50** and whoever gets the highest goes first, in descending order.)

1. Player one will describe the attack and state which move they are using, if any. (**PHYS OR KI**)
2. Player one and player two will both roll **1d20+DEX** mod. If the attacker rolls higher than defender or if the defender critically fails (NAT 1), the hit lands. If the attacker rolls lower than the defender or if the attacker critically fails (NAT 1), the hit is either blocked or dodged: Both roll **1d20+DEX** again. **If the attacker critically failed, they roll 1d20-5**. **If the defender critically succeeded, they roll 1d20+5**. If the attacker rolled higher than the defender, the attack is blocked negating **80%** of the damage (Round down if decimal). However, if the attacker rolled lower than or the same as the defender, the defender dodges, receiving no damage. If both the attacker and the defender roll the same, clash.
3. If the hit lands, the attacker will roll **1d5+STR/WILL** mod. If the attacker critically succeeds (NAT 5 OR MAX ROLL), the attacker has a chance to break armor and break/remove a limb. The attacker rolls a **d20+STR/WILL** mod. If the target is the defender’s head, roll a **d18+STR/WILL** mod. The defender rolls a constitution saving throw. (if blocking, roll **d35+CON mod.** If not, roll **d25+CON mod**). If their throw is lower than the attacker’s roll, break/slice off the opponent’s limb. (**If it is a blunt attack, then the specified limb is broken/concussed. If it is a slash attack, then the specified limb is sliced off.**)
4. After the attack is dealt or missed, unless specified otherwise, the roles switch between the players.
5. This pattern continues to go on until one side has no more opposing players/player HP is 0.
6. If the battle is not going in a player’s favor, they can attempt to retreat. Both players roll a **d20**. The roll needed to retreat is equal to the opponent’s roll + their **DEX** modifier. On a successful roll, the player will escape to a random area on the planet equal. (i.e roll = 356 so area-356) On a failed roll, they will gain disadvantage on all actions until their next turn.

**It is assumed that every random combat instance is a death battle, regardless of the opponent’s intentions.**

card.desc:
You are evenly matched, clashing fists, kicks, and even ki beams.

If the attack that started the clash was a **melee attack**, start a clash frenzy. Both players roll **d20+DEX** mod. Both players roll **d20+DEX** mod again. This pattern continues until one party wins twice in a row. The winning party rolls their attack roll for damage.

If the attack that started the clash was a **ki attack**, start a ki struggle. Both players roll **d20+WIL** mod. Both players roll **d20+WIL** mod again. This pattern continues until one party wins twice in a row. The winning party rolls their attack roll for damage.
card.name: Clashing

old.desc:
You are evenly matched, clashing fists, kicks, and even ki beams.

When the combat is at **3 clash counters** and the attack that started the clash was a **melee attack**, start a clash frenzy. Both players roll **d20+DEX** mod. Both players roll **d20+DEX** mod again. This pattern continues until one party wins twice in a row.

When the combat is at **3 clash counters** and the attack that started the clash was a **ki attack**, start a ki struggle. Both players roll **d20+WIL** mod. Both players roll **d20+WIL** mod again. This pattern continues until one party wins twice in a row.

card.desc:
From birth, your power was abnormally (and almost unnaturally) high. You were usually abysmally stronger than the fighters that opposed you. You never really had to struggle for strength.

**– Abilities –**

**Abnormal Growth**: Your body easily adapts to stresses your body is placed under and repairs quite fast under rest. When rolling a dice for training, add **+%25** to the roll and multiply the result by **1d3** on top of gravity multipliers.

**Born Ruler**: Your natural strength makes the universe bow its head. When rolling for your initial stats, roll **5 2d80+40** instead of **5d20**.

**Prone to Comfortability**: Since you never really had to struggle or train much, it is much harder to control your power. Your mastery requirements on transformations are **4x** harder. You cannot master other forms when you haven’t mastered the previous form.

- **Second Form**: Roll **d100**+Fail Modifier
  The success save is **75**
  [2 levels of mastery]
  Level 1 = 1/6 normal stats
  Level 2 = 1/4 normal stats
  Add **+1** to mastery roll every fail.
- **Third Form**: Roll **2d100**+Fail Modifier
  The success save is total **195**
  [3 levels of mastery]
  Level 1 = 1/3 normal stats
  Level 2 = 1/2 normal stats
  Level 3 = Increase regeneration to **1d7%** **energy**
  Add **+1** to mastery roll every fail.
- **Final Form**: Roll **3d100**+Fail Modifier
  The success save is **295**
  [4 levels of mastery]
  Level 1 = Base
  Level 2 = x1.10
  Level 3 = x1.15 normal stats
  Level 4 = x1.20 normal stats
  Add **+1** to mastery roll every fail..
- **100% Final Form:** Roll 4d100+Fail Modifier
  The success save is **399**
  [5 levels of mastery]
  **Level 0**: Base  | Lose **-3 DEX** mod and gain **+6 STR** mod.
  **Level 1**: x1.05 | Reduce drain by **5**|Gain **+7 STR** mod instead.
  **Level 2:** x1.10 | Reduce drain by **10**|Gain **+8 STR** mod instead.
  **Level 3**: x1.15 | Reduce drain by **5**|Gain **+9 STR** mod instead.
  **Level 4:** x1.20 | Reduce drain by **10**|Gain **+9** **STR** mod and **+1 DEX** mod.
  **Level 5**: x1.25 | Reduce drain by  **5**|Gain **+2 DEX** mod instead.
  Drain: **100 ki** per turn.
card.name: Prodigious Achievement

card.desc:
Your veins bulge out your face as you roar, filling the realm with the presence of your voice. Temporal dimensions start to cave in on themselves as you unleash your power.

Gain **x10^2 ALL STATS** (except INT) while the form is active, applying modifiers as needed. This modifier increases by **1*turn number** exponent each turn.

**+d80** Ki every turn.

**Drain**: **70 Energy** per turn.

card.desc:
Big monke. Scary monke. Monke gold. Monke scarier.

**Can be transformed into if you’re a Saiyan with a tail, you look at a full moon/fake moon, and you have access to Super Saiyan 3.**

Roll a **d20**. When critically **succeeding**, transform into a **Golden Oozaru**, else, transform into a regular **Oozaru**.

Gain **10x^15 ALL STATS** (except INT) while the form is active.

You cannot choose who you attack. Roll **1dX** to choose who to attack where **X** is the number of combatants in the combat.

Every turn, roll **d50.** When critically succeeding, transform and unlock **Super Saiyan 4**.

You are a specimen amongst the demon clan warriors. You are feared for your absolutely terrifying physique and dominate physical prowess.

**Innate**: You can use this on top of other forms.

Gain **x5 ALL STATS.**

**Drain: NONE**

**– Abilities –**

**Intimidating Stature**: Your large frame and broad shoulders intimidate your enemies. Sometimes showing up even causes them to retreat and surrender. Every turn, if bigger and have more **PL** than your opponent, force a **WIL** saving throw of **CON dice+CON** mod.

**Physical Prowess**: Your freak physique amplifies your strength and speed. You can no longer obtain an injury whenever you block an attack.

**Crushing Blows**: Your size can easily make your opponent bend to your will. When attacking an opponent’s block, force them to make a **CON** saving throw with a save of **STR dice+STR** mod. card.desc:
Your physical strength and weight to increase greatly, though it does not increase your energy level like other forms do. Your height varies depending on how big you wish to get.

Gain **+3 STR** mod and **+3 CON** mod. Heal **1d10**% (rounded down) of your health back and refill your energy back to max. This effect can only be triggered once per battle.

**Drain: 10 ki per turn.**

card.desc:
You are a specimen amongst the demon clan warriors. You are feared for your absolutely terrifying physique and dominate physical prowess.

**Innate**: You can use this on top of other forms.

Gain **x10 ALL STATS.**

**Drain: NONE**

**– Abilities –**

**Intimidating Stature**: Your large frame and broad shoulders intimidate your enemies. Sometimes showing up even causes them to retreat and surrender. Every turn, if bigger and have more **PL** than your opponent, force a **WIL** saving throw of **CON dice+CON** mod.

**Physical Prowess**: Your freak physique amplifies your strength and speed. You can no longer obtain an injury whenever you block an attack.

**Crushing Blows**: Your size can easily make your opponent bend to your will. When attacking an opponent’s block, force them to make a **CON** saving throw with a save of **STR dice+STR** mod. If failed, apply **1** turn of [https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance](https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance "smartCard-inline")

card.desc:
You can search **7 times per new area**. This limit resets every midnight. Searching takes **3 Ki**.

By searching, you can find gear, quests, and characters/mentors.
For quests, check [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline") and [https://trello.com/c/ugKoYqi8/110-alignment](https://trello.com/c/ugKoYqi8/110-alignment "smartCard-inline")!

Roll a **1d100.**

_**Legendary Item**_

If the NAT roll is **98** or higher, you found a **legendary item**! Roll a **d9** to see which legendary item it is:

1 = Dragon Ball that hasn’t been found yet
2 = Huge treasure (1500000 zeni)
3 = [https://trello.com/c/SBWa3LTF/16-seed-of-might](https://trello.com/c/SBWa3LTF/16-seed-of-might "smartCard-inline")
4 = Half-Saiyan’s Sword
5 = Dimensional Shard
6 = [https://trello.com/c/lOXga68Y/172-masterwork-weapon](https://trello.com/c/lOXga68Y/172-masterwork-weapon "smartCard-inline")
7 = [https://trello.com/c/B9csO4Lf/173-masterwork-armor](https://trello.com/c/B9csO4Lf/173-masterwork-armor "smartCard-inline")
8 = [https://trello.com/c/IdUcmYzH/174-bag-of-senzu-16x](https://trello.com/c/IdUcmYzH/174-bag-of-senzu-16x "smartCard-inline")

_**Saga Mission**_

if the number is **higher than or equal to 93 but lower than 98**, you found a **story quest**! This quest’s difficulty changes based on the saga and can even be the reason for a saga change. Notify your friends or create enemies! You will fight a character, depending on your alignment, from the original Dragon Ball anime, respective to the saga and timeline. **THESE CAN ONLY BE ROLLED ON EARTH AS OF NOW. IF NOT ON EARTH, ROLL A d2. 1 = Mentor (if none, do a challenging quest) 2 = Challenging Quest.**

Completing these quests gives (**d90+30 x saga number**) stat points and **500d100** zeni to whoever helped/opposed.
Make sure to read [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline")!

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\__

_**Mentorship**_
If the number is **higher than or equal to** **80 but lower than 93 you found a** mentor! You’ll have to fight them and win to see if you can learn anything from them. This fight also counts as spar training. **Please contact a DM for stat rolls.**

_**Very Challenging Mission**_

If the number is **higher than or equal to 75 but lower than 80**, you found a **Very** **challenging quest**! Roll a **d2** to see what type of quest it is.

Negatively aligned = 1
Positively aligned = 2

Both quests give (**d30+10 x saga number**) stat points and **400d100** zeni.
Make sure to read [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline")!

_**Challenging Mission**_

If the number is **higher than or equal to 65 but lower than 75** you found a **challenging quest**! Roll a **d2** to see what type of quest it is.

Negatively aligned = 1
Positively aligned = 2

Both quests give (**d20 + 8 x saga number**) stat points and **200d100** zeni.
Make sure to read [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline")!

_**Casual Mission**_

If the number is **higher than or equal to 50 but lower than 65**, you found a **low rank quest**! Roll a **d2** to see what type of quest it is.

Negatively aligned = 1
Positively aligned = 2

Both quests give (**d10 + 5 x saga number**) stat points and **100d100** zeni.
**Engaging in combat gives you d15 die instead of d10**.
Make sure to read [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline")!

If the number is **higher than or equal to 30 but lower than 50**, you found an **item**! Roll a **d20** to see what item it is.

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\__

_**Mentorship**_
If the number is **higher than or equal to** **80 but lower than 93 you found a** mentor! You’ll have to fight them and win to see if you can learn anything from them. This fight also counts as spar training. **Please contact a DM for stat rolls.**
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\__

_**Very Challenging Mission**_

If the number is **higher than or equal to 75 but lower than 80**, you found a **Very** **challenging quest**! Roll a **d2** to see what type of quest it is.

Negatively aligned = 1
Positively aligned = 2

Both quests give (**d30+10 x saga number**) stat points and **400d100** zeni.
Make sure to read [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline")!

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\__

_**Challenging Mission**_

If the number is **higher than or equal to 65 but lower than 75** you found a **challenging quest**! Roll a **d2** to see what type of quest it is.

Negatively aligned = 1
Positively aligned = 2

Both quests give (**d20 + 8 x saga number**) stat points and **200d100** zeni.
Make sure to read [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline")!
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\__

_**Casual Mission**_

If the number is **higher than or equal to 50 but lower than 65**, you found a **low rank quest**! Roll a **d2** to see what type of quest it is.

Negatively aligned = 1
Positively aligned = 2

Both quests give (**d10 + 5 x saga number**) stat points and **100d100** zeni.
**Engaging in combat gives you d15 die instead of d10**.
Make sure to read [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline")!

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\__

_**Normal Item**_

If the number is **higher than or equal to 30 but lower than 50**, you found an **item**! Roll a **d20** to see what item it is.

Small wallet (5000 zeni) = 1
[5x] Resources = 2
Recovery capsule = 3
Shovel = 4
Hetap™ = 5
Vita Drink = 6
Sage Water = 7
Ki recovery capsule = 8
[5/5 durabiltiy] Welding Torch = 9
[Broken] Motherboard = 10
Component = 11
[2x] Copper Wires = 12
[Destroyed] [Unrepairable] Engine Conjuction = 13
Mixed capsule = 14
Hunting Traps = 15
Fishing Rod = 16
Small Training Weight = 17
Healer’s Kit = 18
Skining Knife =19
Senzu bean = 20

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\__

If the number is **lower than 30**, you found **nothing**.

card.desc:
These are actions that affect the story. Things like destroying cities or defeating an evil monster or invasion.

These are **NOT** actions like fishing or doing basic jobs.

Canon actions also heavily dictate your alignment. Doing net negative actions like mass murder will decrease your alignment, while doing net positive actions like saving a planet from destruction will increase your alignment.

It also worth noting that since the story progresses from these actions, consequences of your actions will start to appear.

You must alert **EVERYONE** whenever you make a canon action.

**Upon completion, roll a 3d90+80 for stat points.**

card.desc:
Unleash your hatred onto the world. Your skin starts to glow a deep blue, revealing all of your hideous features. Orbs of ki start to circle around you, with your ki turning a strange deep blue and mimicking roaring hell flames

Gain **x10** **ALL STATS** (except INT) while the form is active. Transforming does not take an action.

Every **-50** alignment increases the exponent by **1**.
i.e: **-50** alignment  = **x10^2** | **-100** alignment  = **x10^3**

Drain: **40** Ki per turn.

**Soul Siphon**: Every punch saps the victim’s energy. On **successful hits/blocked hits**, regain **1d15** ki and cause them the same amount.

card.desc:
**Wolf Fang Fist** is a technique used and taught by Yamcha.

**– Proficiencies –**

**Heightened Instincts**: Your connection to wolves and nature sharpen your reflexes. **+4** **DEX** defense rolls.

**Predatory Precision**: Drawing from your wolf-like instincts, you exhibit heightened melee accuracy. **+4** **DEX** melee attack rolls.

**Swift Onslaught**: You trade out precise and strong blows for multiple that swarm and blitz your enemy. Roll **2 d20+DEX mod** for attack rolls, but roll **2** **d2+STR** mod for damage rolls. You no longer cause the opponent to roll defense checks due to your unprecise strikes.

**Frenzy Strikes**: Your unorthodox fighting style is unpredictable and occasionally you release a dual-strike. If you **critically succeed** both **STR** melee attack rolls on a successful attack roll, Roll **1d20**. If the roll is higher than or equal to **18**, add **2d4+(STR mod/2)** to your damage total and apply [https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed](https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed "smartCard-inline") for **1** turn.

**Vulnerable Pelt**: You traded out a lot of durability and defense for offense. **-3 CON** modifier.

‌

**– Abilities –**

**Wolf Fang Fist**

**Whirlwind Kick**

**Wolf Slice Fist**

**Neo Wolf Fang Fist**

card.desc:

Gain **10x** all your stats permanently.

This has a cooldown of **2** sagas.
card.name: Super Namekian

card.desc:
The Seed of Might is capable of planting the legendary “Tree of Might”, also known as the “Tree of Death”. This legendary existence is only able to grow through the energy of the planet it’s planted on. As such, the planet that the tree is on will be susceptible to death unless enough energy is provided.

The Seed of Might itself will also redevelop after the tree grows, and you will be given the opportunity to plant the tree another time, however this also comes at a cost. Each planet only has enough energy to harbor the tree once, and no mortal can survive eating more than two fruits off the tree without immense side effects.

The Tree of Might is only capable of surviving on planets with an established atmosphere that could house any other plants, such as Earth, Namek, and Yardrat. However, as Earth is substantially smaller than the other two planets, it will be subsequently destroyed after the tree fully blossoms.

The Fruit of Might, a Fruit that comes from the Tree of Might, is a substance that is nearly all powerful. This fruit is able to instantly cultivate users to unheard of levels after simply eating one. After the first fruit is eaten, the second fruit’s effects will be diminished, however this is still incredibly strong.

As The Fruit of Might is incredibly strong, it will take a full saga to plant and bear fruits. This tree can also only be planted **AFTER** the Saiyan Saga. Additionally, it is up to you to capitalize off of the fruits. Depending on which planet you plant the Tree of Might on, you may be met with discontent. In order to protect their planet, heroes will attack you, and in order to gain more power, Villains will attempt to kill you and steal the Fruits of Might.

The Fruit of Might is a mythical existence, said to be made purely for the Gods to consume, however this doesn’t meant mortals cannot eat them. The base modifier for the first fruit you eat from the Tree of Might will be
5 **d20+20**. The Second Fruit you eat from the Tree of Might will be a flat **2x** multiplier. If you for some reason attempt to eat a **THIRD** fruit from the Tree, you will be greatly weakened, as the divine powers of the fruit disagree with you foolish mortal exoskeleton, and you will have to roll a save. **1d100**.

**1-20**: You unfortunately perish.

**21-40**: You lose **80%** of your total power, and also lose all ability to use ki, as well as all ki related abilities, and mastery. (These can be relearned.)

**41-60**: Your Body violently rejects the fruit, but fortunately you only lose **40%** of your total power, and retain your ki mastery.

**61-90**: The third fruit surprisingly does not affect your body.

**91-99**: The third fruit cultivates with you on another level. Your power is doubled once more.

**100**: The third fruit resonates with your soul deeply. Your power is quadrupled.
card.name: Seed of Might

card.desc:
There are **DEX** milestones that increase your dice size.
**DEX** = 100: **1d25**
**DEX** = 1000: **1d30**
**DEX** = 10000: **1d35**
etc.

There are **STR** milestones that increase your dice size.
**STR** = 100: **1d10**
**STR** = 1000: **1d15**
**STR** = 10000: **1d20**
etc.

There are **CON** milestones that increase your dice size.
**CON** = 100: **d20+5 to dice size on CON throws**
**CON** = 1000: **d25+6 to dice size on CON throws**
**CON** = 10000: **d30+7 to dice size on CON throws**
etc.

There are **WIL** milestones that increase your dice size.
**WIL** = 100: **d20+5 to dice size on WIL throws**
**WIL** = 1000: **d25+6 to dice size on WIL throws**
**WIL** = 10000: **d30+7 to dice size on WIL throws**
etc.

There are **SPI** milestones that increase your dice size.
**SPI** = 100: **d20+5 to dice size on SPI throws**
**SPI** = 1000: **d25+6 to dice size on SPI throws**
**SPI** = 10000: **d30+7 to dice size on SPI throws**
etc.

card.desc:
## Character ‘About Me’

**Character Name**: What you want your character to be called.

**Character Age**: How close your character is to dying from time. This a time relative rpg that will be starting in early dragon ball, so it would probably be best not to make an old character, unless getting the dragon balls is going to be a top priority for your lore.

**Character Race**: You can choose from any of the common races or create your own and be a Alien. You can achieve other races through modifying your body (Android) or reincarnation (Demon, Majin).

**Character Height**: Not required, but it is nice to know for immersion.

**Character Weight**: Not required, but it is nice to know for immersion.

**Character Goal**: Not required, but it is nice to know for immersion.

**Character Background**: Not required, but it is nice to know for immersion. Would highly recommend you create a background if you choose Alien.

## **READ THE RACES CATEGORY BEFORE CONTINUING AND MAKING YOUR BUILD.**

## Stats

When creating your character, you will need to make **3** rolls. One for your stats, one for mutations, and one for intelligence. You will roll a **5d20** for your first roll to dictate your stats, excluding intelligence. You can only reroll this total once. You will roll **1d10** for intelligence.

**Total Stats**: The sum of all of your stats.
**STR**: Dictates how strong your physical attacks are
**DEX**: Dictates your dodge/hit chance
**CON**: Dictates your Max HP count
**WIL**: Dictates how strong your ki/spiritual attacks are
**SPI**: Dictates how much max ki you have
**INT**: Dictates what level of technology you can make
**MAX HP**: How much total HP you have. This can be calculated through 20 + (**CON** mod x 10)
**MAX KI**: How much total ki you have. This can be calculated through 20 + (**SPI** mod x 10)
**POWER LEVEL**: A concept of measurement predicting how strong you are. Can be calculated through **1 + (0.5 x Total Stats) + (8*ALL MODS)**

Initially, every 20 points is a +1
After reaching 200 points in that stat, every 200 afterwards is +1
After reaching 2000 points in that stat, every 2000 afterwards is +1
(This goes on indefinitely.)

You can use the second roll to compensate for a mutation or add more stats to your total, losing your mutation roll in the process. (Instead of **5d20**, it would be **5d100+20**).

## Mutations

Mutations can change how your character functions, effectively altering some entire mechanics of the game. If you roll a **19** or higher on a **d20** roll, you can choose a mutation that already exists within the Dragon Ball verse or make your own. **(MUST BE APPROVED BY CHILLY (**@sauce9011 **)**
card.name: Character Creation

**DEX** = 1000: **1d30**
**DEX** = 10000: **1d35**
etc.

There are **STR** milestones that increase your dice size.
**STR** = 100: **1d10**
**STR** = 1000: **1d15**
**STR** = 10000: **1d20**
etc.

There are **CON** milestones that increase your dice size.
**CON** = 100: **+5 to dice size on CON throws**
**CON** = 1000: **+10 to dice size on CON throws**
**CON** = 10000: **+15 to dice size on CON throws**
etc.

There are **WIL** milestones that increase your dice size.
**WIL** = 100: **+5 to dice size on WIL throws**
**WIL** = 1000: **+10 to dice size on WIL throws**
**WIL** = 10000: **+15 to dice size on WIL throws**
etc.

There are **SPI** milestones that increase your dice size.
**SPI** = 100: **+5 to dice size on SPI throws**
**SPI** = 1000: **+10 to dice size on SPI throws**
**SPI** = 10000: **+15 to dice size on SPI throws**
etc.

card.desc:
The messenger of Death. You bring the feeling of doom with your very presence. Hell spat you out because you were too bitter for its gaping maw. Bastardized by your very home, you roam the overworld searching...

**Mistake:** Your very being is a mistake. Unlike many Onis, your bulky muscles do not slow you down. Negate the **DEX** penalty applied from being an Oni.

**Fuel the Flames of Hatred:** You feed off negative energy. Gain **+2** to **ALL MODS** for every **-50** alignment.

**Damned:** Cannot gain access to God Ki. When fighting against foes with God Ki, gain **+5** to **DEX** and **STR** rolls. You also no longer gain disadvantage when fighting foes with God Ki.

**Tormented**: Cannot meditate, but gains **+1 SPI** mod every **5** kills. Kills also heal **+10** HP and **+5** Ki. **(ONLY FROM COMBAT)**

**Unleashed:** Gain access to Dark Devil form.
card.name: Dread-forged Ashen Soul

card.desc:
Boxing, the fighting style of hitting and not getting hit. Some people say it’s an art, and some refer to it as the sweet science.

**– Proficiencies –**

**Focused Iron Fist**: You’ve trained your fist to deliver crushing blows, likening your hand to that of a truck. **+3 STR** attack mod.

**Decisive Strikes**: You can pick apart your opponent, delivering punches in the right place at the right time. When dodging, you can spend **5** ki and force the opponent to make a **DEX** saving throw with a save of **d15+DEX mod (d20+DEX** mod if the opponent critically failed). On fail, roll to attack the enemy for **damage dice+(STR mod/2)** and gain [https://trello.com/c/sdiPWijl/193-rhythm](https://trello.com/c/sdiPWijl/193-rhythm "smartCard-inline") **.** On critical success, explode the dice. (roll it again without modifiers.)

**Head Movement**: You are tiresome to hit. Dodging an opponent’s attack drains **1d6** ki.

**– Abilities –**

**One-Two**

**Liver Punch**

**Corkscrew**

card.desc:
A strong slash that crosses the opponent’s body.

Use **18** ki to violently slash across the opponent’s body. On successful hit/block, force the opponent to make a **CON** saving throw with a save of **d20+STR** **mod**. If failed, apply [https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed](https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed "smartCard-inline") for **1d4** turns and force the opponent to make another **CON** saving throw with a save of **1d12+(STR mod/4)** (round down). If failed, split the opponent in half, killing them. Else, deals **1d10+STR** mod.

**– Mastery –**
**1 Mastery**: Deals **1d12+STR** mod. Costs **16** ki.
**2 Mastery**: Deals **1d14+STR** mod. Costs **14** ki
**3 Mastery**: Upon **critically succeeding**, explode the dice. Costs **12** ki.

card.desc:
Cerealians are anthropomorphic aliens that look very similar to Human-type earthlings, only really differing by their green hair and right eye. Over time, Cerealians' right eye evolved into a merged iris and pupil, red in color, that grants them incredible visual acuity.

**– Abilities –**

**Evolved Right Eye**: As a result of their right eye adapting over time, Cerealians are very capable snipers. When using a **Ki** attack, a Cerealian is able to **reroll their attack** chance through the use of more **Ki** this skill takes **7** Energy and can only be used **once** per attack.

**Exception Perception**: With your eye, you can easily identify patterns in an opponent’s fighting style. Every **5** turns while fighting the same opponent, roll **1d5**. If the roll is **5**, add **-1d3** **DEX** mod to their attacks for the rest of the combat.

**Vital Strike:** Through inflicting damage on the opponents weak spots, you drain their Energy. This move will roll whichever combat dice you normally use and uses **4 Energy** for Cerelians (it is learnable for other races but will double the drain to use) and it will drain **10 Energy** to whoever takes this hit. For Cerealians specifically, when critically succeeding, they land a critical hit, and deal 50% more damage

card.desc:
**Wolf Fang Fist** is a technique used and taught by Yamcha.

**– Proficiencies –**

**Heightened Instincts**: Your connection to wolves and nature sharpen your reflexes. **+4** **DEX** defense rolls.

**Predatory Precision**: Drawing from your wolf-like instincts, you exhibit heightened melee accuracy. **+4** **DEX** melee attack rolls.

**Swift Onslaught**: You trade out precise and strong blows for multiple that swarm and blitz your enemy. Roll **2 d20+DEX mod** for attack rolls, but roll **2** **d2+STR** mod for damage rolls. You no longer cause the opponent to roll defense checks due to your unprecise strikes.

**Frenzy Strikes**: Your unorthodox fighting style is unpredictable and occasionally you release a dual-strike. If you **critically succeed** both **STR** melee attack rolls on a successful attack roll, Roll **1d20**. If the roll is higher than or equal to **18**, add **2d4+(STR mod/2)** to your damage total and apply [https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed](https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed "smartCard-inline") for **1** turn.

**Vulnerable Pelt**: You traded out a lot of durability and defense for offense. **-3 CON** modifier.

‌

**– Abilities –**

**Wolf Fang Fist**

**Whirlwind Kick**

**Wolf Slice Fist**

**Alpha Form**

card.desc:
Charge a ball of ki that can be released into a beam of radiant light.

Spend **10** ki to charge up a Kamehameha. You can charge it for **3** turns straight, using **5** ki each turn.

For each hit you take, roll **1d20+CON** mod with a save of **16+(ATTACK DMG/2)**. Upon failing this save, stop charging Kamehameha.

For every turn you charge Kamehameha, add **+2** modifier to the damage roll.

When the Kamehameha hits successfully, deal **1d10+WIL mod+charge modifier**.

**– Mastery –**
**1 Mastery**: Roll **1d12** for damage.
**2 Mastery**: Roll **1d14** for damage. Roll **1d22+CON** mod instead.
**3 Mastery**: Roll **1d16** for damage.
card.name: Kamehameha

card.desc:
Channeling the essence of the legendary Kamehameha, Turtle users can unleash super beams after reaching a specific power threshold.

Requires and uses **80%** of your max ki. Roll **1d10+5** along with your Kamehameha attack. This can be used in the middle of your Kamehameha charging turn. While charging a Kamehameha, negate all effects of fatigue.

**– Mastery –**
**1 Mastery**: Roll **1d15+5**
**2 Mastery**: Roll **1d20+5**
**3 Mastery**: Roll **1d25+10.** Upon successful hit, force the opponent to make a **CON** saving throw of (**d20**+**CON** mod+remaining HP), requiring a save of **d25+WIL mod+(Damage Dealt/3 rounded down)**. If failed, disintegrate the opponent.

card.desc:
Finish a combat turn while using a [SPEAR] Weapon then roll a **2d100**, the save is **199**, in order to unlock this style.

Will-Power must be your second or highest skill to roll the unlock for this style.

**Draconic Precision**: Your technique mimics the deadly accuracy of a drake’s strike. Gain a **+1d3** attack modifier to spear rolls. Additionally, you may add **50% of your WIL modifier** to the damage of spear **attack rolls** by spending **20% of your ki**. ( Stacks with **Precision Strikes** )

**Reptilian Swiftness:** Draconic energy flowing through you enhances your footwork and speed, while you wield a spear. **-1d2+1 to all dexterity hindrances from Spears**.

**Will of the Drake:** Your resolve draws on the power of draconic energy, enhancing your spiritual attacks. **+2 SPI** modifier and **+2 WIL** modifier. When using **ki-based abilities** with your spear, you gain a additional **+2 bonus** to your **WIL modifier** for the duration of the attack.

**Scale and Strength:** Through rigorous training, your body has become as tough as drake scales. You gain a **+3** to your **CON modifier** while wielding a spear, and you gain **3 Temporary HP** for every **WIL modifier** representing the resilience of a drake. When lost restore fully at **midnight**.

**Draconic Aura:** Your presence on the battlefield resonates with the power of drakes, instilling fear in your foes. Once per encounter, you can emit an aura that forces all **opponents** roll a **WIL saving throw** with a save of **1d30+WILL** . On failure, they receive disadvantage on all rolls for one turn.

Once per encounter, you can emit an aura that forces all **opponents** roll a **WIL saving throw** with a save of **1d30+WILL** . On failure, they receive disadvantage on all rolls for one turn.

card.desc:
You elevate your fighting style with devastating kicks and agile maneuvers, making your legs a dangerous threat. Every strike is an expression of art and strength, capable of cutting through your opponent's defenses.

**– Proficiencies –**

**Wings of the Tempest**: Your legs move with the speed and grace of a hurricane’s gusts, enabling you to strike from unexpected angles. If you successfully land two kicks in a row, gain a third strike as a free action. The third strike deals **DEX mod** as additional damage.

**Phantom Step**: You glide across the battlefield unpredictably with the elegance of a breeze. **+3 DEX** mod. Any opponent attempting to attack you after a dodge is forced to roll a **WIL** saving throw with the save of **d20+DEX** mod. Upon failure, apply **1** turn of [https://trello.com/c/OWYFCAJQ/251-hesitant](https://trello.com/c/OWYFCAJQ/251-hesitant "smartCard-inline").

**Knee Block**: You’ve learned to block with a harder part of your body, the knees. Doesn’t actually do anything, I just think its a cool detail.

**Flamingo Stance**: You open up your opponent, using a stance similar to that of a Flamingo to keep your opponent guessing. After critically succeeding a **DEX** attack roll, switch into [https://trello.com/c/tc2qbqna/252-flamingo-stance](https://trello.com/c/tc2qbqna/252-flamingo-stance "smartCard-inline") and **store** the original roll. Roll the attack roll again and choose between the original or the new attack roll. Both attacks can be thrown out in the same turn.

**Steady Base**: Your training helps you stay on your feet. When you would be [https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance](https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance "smartCard-inline"), roll a **WIL** saving throw with a save of **D20+Enemy DEX** mod. If it succeeds, negate the effect. You can only do this once until its your turn.

**– Abilities –**

**Crashing Thunder Kick**
**Tornado Roundhouse**
**Heaven’s Howl**
card.name: Taekwondo

card.desc:
Boxing, the fighting style of hitting and not getting hit. Some people say it’s an art, and some refer to it as the sweet science.

**– Proficiencies –**

**Focused Iron Fist**: You’ve trained your fist to deliver crushing blows, likening your hand to that of a truck. **+3 STR** attack mod.

**Decisive Strikes**: You can pick apart your opponent, delivering punches in the right place at the right time. When dodging, you can spend **5** ki and force the opponent to make a **DEX** saving throw with a save of **d15+DEX mod (d20+DEX** mod if the opponent critically failed). On fail, roll to attack the enemy for **damage dice+(STR mod/2)** and gain [https://trello.com/c/sdiPWijl/193-rhythm](https://trello.com/c/sdiPWijl/193-rhythm "smartCard-inline") **.** On critical success, explode the dice. (roll it again without modifiers.)

**Head Movement**: You are tiresome to hit. Dodging an opponent’s attack drains **1d7** ki.

**– Abilities –**

**One-Two**

**Liver Punch**

**Corkscrew**
card.name: Boxing

After dodging or attacking successfully, gain **1** stack of [https://trello.com/c/sdiPWijl/193-rhythm](https://trello.com/c/sdiPWijl/193-rhythm "smartCard-inline"). Getting hit/blocking and getting grappled removes all stacks of [https://trello.com/c/sdiPWijl/193-rhythm](https://trello.com/c/sdiPWijl/193-rhythm "smartCard-inline"). Maximum of **5** stacks. cards.desc:
## Character ‘About Me’

**Character Name**: What you want your character to be called.

**Character Age**: How close your character is to dying from time. This a time relative rpg that will be starting in early dragon ball, so it would probably be best not to make an old character, unless getting the dragon balls is going to be a top priority for your lore.

**Character Race**: You can choose from any of the common races or create your own and be a Alien. You can achieve other races through modifying your body (Android) or reincarnation (Demon, Majin).

**Character Height**: Not required, but it is nice to know for immersion.

**Character Weight**: Not required, but it is nice to know for immersion.

**Character Goal**: Not required, but it is nice to know for immersion.

**Character Background**: Not required, but it is nice to know for immersion. Would highly recommend you create a background if you choose Alien.

## **READ THE RACES CATEGORY BEFORE CONTINUING AND MAKING YOUR BUILD.**

## Stats

When creating your character, you will need to make **3** rolls. One for your stats, one for mutations, and one for intelligence. You will roll a **5d20** for your first roll to dictate your stats, excluding intelligence. You can only reroll this total once. You will roll **1d10** for intelligence.

**Total Stats**: The sum of all of your stats.
**STR**: Dictates how strong your physical attacks are
**DEX**: Dictates your dodge/hit chance
**CON**: Dictates your Max HP count
**WIL**: Dictates how strong your ki/spiritual attacks are
**SPI**: Dictates how much max ki you have
**INT**: Dictates what level of technology you can make
**MAX HP**: How much total HP you have. This can be calculated through 20 + (**CON** mod x 10)
**MAX KI**: How much total ki you have. This can be calculated through 20 + (**SPI** mod x 10)
**POWER LEVEL**: A concept of measurement predicting how strong you are. Can be calculated through (1.5×STR)+(1.5×WIL)+(1×DEX)+(0.75×CON)+(0.75×SPI)+(0.5×INT)+(MAXHP/10)+(MAXKI/10) _**USE BOT COMMAND**_

_**/Calculate**_

Initially, every 20 points is a +1
After reaching 200 points in that stat, every 200 afterwards is +1
After reaching 2000 points in that stat, every 2000 afterwards is +1
(This goes on indefinitely.)

You can use the second roll to compensate for a mutation or add more stats to your total, losing your mutation roll in the process. (Instead of **5d20**, it would be **5d100+20**).

## Mutations

Mutations can change how your character functions, effectively altering some entire mechanics of the game. If you roll a **19** or higher on a **d20** roll, you can choose a mutation that already exists within the Dragon Ball verse or make your own. **(MUST BE APPROVED BY CHILLY (**@sauce9011 **)**
cards.name: Character Creation
