cards.name: Character Template

cards.desc:
1. Nobody’s the main character. Please do not think that you are special and that you deserve more than someone else. You are a part of the story and nothing more.
2. No descriptive sexual activities. Marrying and copulating is fine, as long as you’re not weird and descriptive about it. Basically do not ERP.
3. Metagaming is not allowed.
4. You cannot be any characters from the main series.
cards.name: Rules

cards.desc: ## PILAF SAGA (SAGA 1)
cards.name: Current Saga

cards.desc:
## Description

Saiyans are very similar in appearance to Human-type Earthlings if you don’t account for their monkey-like tails.

## Class

Roll **1d100**.

[0-50] **Low Class Saiyan**: Training is much more beneficial to you. Instead of rolling **1d10** for training, roll **1d15**. Gain **30%** more stats (rounded down) from potential unlock. Zenkai now only required to be less than **20%** of your health.

[51-80] **Elite Class Saiyan**: Gain 1 extra **d40** roll when rolling for your stats.

[80-100] **Royal Class Saiyan**: Instead of rolling **5d20**, roll **5 d40+7** for your stats. When lower than **50%** of your Max HP, add **+4** to your rolls.

## Racial Abilities

**Zenkai**: When a saiyan recovers from a near death situation, they will gain a power boost. For this to activate, you must survive a battle with less than **10%** of your health. When you recover, you will gain **PL** x (**1d15/100**) stat points rounded up.

**Intense Anger**: When under intense stress (Planet blowing up, someone important to the story dying, last stand), add **25%** of your base stats to your stats and roll **1d50**. If the roll critically succeeds, you unlock your next super saiyan transformation.

**Long Tail:** Grapple attempts no longer have disadvantage against you.

Ex:
Power Level: 500
Roll 1d15: 13
500 x (13/100)
500 x .13 = 65
Stat Points Gained: 65
cards.name: Saiyan

cards.desc:
Half-Saiyans are generally identical to Saiyans in appearance, but sometimes they do not have tails. Under intense stress, they exhibit their human side of rising to the challenge.

**– Abilities –**

**To Tail or to Not**: Roll 1d2 to decide if you grow a tail.
1 = No Tail
2 = Tail

**Zenkai**: When a saiyan recovers from a near death situation, they will gain a power boost. For this to activate, you must survive a battle with less than **10%** of your health. When you recover, you will gain PL x (**1d10/100**) stat points rounded up.

**Intense Anger**: When under intense stress (Planet blowing up, someone important to the story dying, last stand), add **50%** of your stats to your stats and roll **1d40**. If the roll critically succeeds, you unlock your next super saiyan transformation.

**Adept in Ki**: Half-Saiyans have a good understanding of their Ki and will regenerate (**d2+WIL modifier/2**) Ki every round.

Zenkai Ex:
Power Level: 500
Roll 1d10: 8
500 x (8/100)
500 x .08 = 40
Stat Points Gained: 40
cards.name: Half-Saiyan

cards.desc:
This constitutes every living being that lives on the Planet Earth. Regardless of their looks or type, they mainly have certain abilities in common.

**– Abilities –**

**Masters of Ki**: Earthlings have a strong understanding of their Ki and will regenerate (**4+WIL modifier**) Ki every round.

**Item User**: Earthlings are skilled at using items to get by. Consumable items are **100%** (rounded down) more beneficial to Earthlings.

**Intelligent**: Earthlings are a little bit more intelligent than most races. Roll **1d10+1** when rolling for initial intelligence.

**Highly Adaptable**: Earthlings are very adaptable to situations, making them very hard to get rid of completely. Earthlings have advantage on saving throws.

**Adept Potential**: Earthlings have much more potential for greatness than other races. Roll **2d60+50** for potential unlock rolls instead.
cards.name: Earthling

cards.desc:
Frost Demons are bipedal humanoids that have red eyes and white keratinous plating covering scaly reptilian skin. They also have other reptilian features such as horns, long tails, three-toed feet, and spikes. Frost Demon’s keratinous plates can sometimes resemble gems.

**– Abilities –**

**Space Breathing**: Frost Demons have the ability to survive in the vacuum of space.

**Suppression Forms**: Frost Demons can suppress themselves into weaker forms to allow themselves to have a slight advantage in battles with weaker opponents.

**Race of Rulers**: Frost Demons are born incredibly strong. Roll **5 d80+10** for your stat rolls instead of **5d20**.

**Extraterrestrial Equilibrium:** Automatically gain the **flight** ability.

**Alien**: You spawn in the on the Frieza Planet.

**Long Tail:** Grapple attempts no longer have disadvantage against you.
cards.name: Frost Demon

cards.desc:
Namekians are humanoids with slug-like characteristics, including antennae, light green skin, and pink patches (pale yellow in the original manga) appearing throughout their bodies. They also lack eyebrows. Elderly Namekians have darker green skin and less prominent pink patches (these appear to become dull-orange as the Namekian advances in age), pointy ears, and red rings, in which they have three red conjoined rings on their ankles and wrists, making them look like they have ankle bands and wristbands.

**– Abilities –**

**Namekian**: Namekians live on **Namek**… yeah.

**Regeneration**: Namekians have the natural ability to regenerate. Gain the ability [https://trello.com/c/90M1BpOR/139-regeneration](https://trello.com/c/90M1BpOR/139-regeneration "smartCard-inline").

**Flexible**: Namekians have extremely stretchy and flexible limbs. Spend **8** ki to gain **+4** mod to grapple attempts.

**Namekian Fusion**: Namekian warriors would often combine their powers to take out strong threats. Gain ability to fuse with one other Namekian player/NPC. Doing this will make both become one, becoming a [https://trello.com/c/iH4DF06J/104-super-namekian](https://trello.com/c/iH4DF06J/104-super-namekian "smartCard-inline"). In order to fuse with a Namekian that is not a player with no relationship, roll **1d25**. If you have a positive relationship with that Namekian, roll **1d20**. If you have a positive relationship with that Namekian and a mutual goal (i.e beating a threat to Namek), roll **1d10**. Must **critically succeed**.

**Rebirth**: Namekians have a strange way of reproducing, but it works. Lay an egg. When dying, instead of passing into the otherworld, be reborn from this egg, regaining **100%+1d20%** of previous stats on top of rolling for stats as normal. This can only be done once every **5** sagas. If this egg is destroyed or broken in some way, you cannot be reborn.

**Large Ears**: Namekians have large ears for greater hearing. Sense people up to **10** areas away with just hearing alone. Loud noises can disorient and irritate, causing **-7 DEX** mod. Alternatively, ripping off the ears can prevent this.

**Clan**: Namekians have roles in their society. Roll **1d2** to choose between Demon Clan or Dragon Clan. **1** = Demon, **2** = Dragon

- **Demon Clan**: Trained for killing and combat, you are a lot more adept at fighting than other lifeforms. Gain **+2 DEX** mod, **+3 WIL** mod, and **+3 STR** mod. Roll **5d40+10** for stats instead.
- **Dragon Clan**: The peacekeepers of the Namekian race. Gain the abilities [https://trello.com/c/P3HyvaKH/135-create-dragon-ball](https://trello.com/c/P3HyvaKH/135-create-dragon-ball "smartCard-inline") and [https://trello.com/c/nYwik5I2/140-magic-materialization](https://trello.com/c/nYwik5I2/140-magic-materialization "smartCard-inline"). Roll **1d10+2** for **INT** and gain **+5 WIL** mod and **+5 SPI** mod.
cards.name: Namekian

cards.desc:
Cerealians are anthropomorphic aliens that look very similar to Human-type earthlings, only really differing by their green hair and right eye. Over time, Cerealians' right eye evolved into a merged iris and pupil, red in color, that grants them incredible visual acuity.

**– Abilities –**

**Evolved Right Eye**: As a result of their right eye adapting over time, Cerealians are very capable snipers. When using a **Ki** attack, a Cerealian is able to **reroll their attack** chance through the use of more **Ki** this skill takes **7** Energy and can only be used **once** per attack.

**Exception Perception**: With your eye, you can easily identify patterns in an opponent’s fighting style. Every **5** turns while fighting the same opponent, roll **1d5**. If the roll is **5**, add **-1d3** **DEX** mod to their attacks for the rest of the combat.

**Vital Strike:** Through inflicting damage on the opponents weak spots, you drain their Energy. This move will roll whichever combat dice you normally use and uses **4 Energy** for Cerelians (it is learnable for other races but will double the drain to use) and it will drain **10 Energy** to whoever takes this hit. For Cerealians specifically, when critically succeeding, they land a critical hit, and deal 50% more damage
cards.name: Cerealian

cards.desc:
Konatsians are known for their humanoid appearance, typically resembling Earthlings in stature and physical features. They possess varying skin tones, ranging from various shades of human-like colors, with some having slightly altered features like elongated ears or distinct facial structures.

**– Abilities –**

**Hero’s Flute**: You pull out a flute and play it. Roll a **d20**. If the roll is higher than **15**, remove all mental status effects including **Blind Rage**.

**Sword Proficiency**: Your race was known around the universe as valiant swordsmen. You know how to handle a sword very well. Add **+2 STR** mod to attacks done with swords and **-4** to all dexterity hinderances from using a weapon.
(THESE EFFECTS STACK WITH SWORDSMAN FIGHTING STYLE)

**Feinting Strike**: After critically succeeding a damage roll with a sword, your next attack roll will have advantage.
cards.name: Konatsian

cards.desc:
Physically, Tuffles are small in stature compared to Saiyans, with round heads, large brains, and diminutive bodies. They have unique features such as large, expressive eyes and distinct facial structures, often portrayed with different skin tones ranging from various shades of blue, purple, or green. They are highly skilled in advanced machinery, genetics, and engineering, which allowed them to create sophisticated gadgets, advanced weaponry, and groundbreaking inventions.

**– Abilities –**

**Incredibly Intelligent**: Tuffles can easily make advanced technology as well as understand it. Roll **1d12+3** when rolling for your initial intelligence.

**Physically Frail**: Tuffles are not exactly built for combat. -**2 STR** mod and -**2 CON** mod when in combat.

**Advances in Bioengineering**: Due to your advanced intellect, you are extremely proficient in the studies of bioengineering. When making **Androids**, roll **5 8d100+120+(creators INT mod*10)** instead. You can also make [https://trello.com/c/CfWExemf/48-baby-tuffle](https://trello.com/c/CfWExemf/48-baby-tuffle "smartCard-inline").
cards.name: Tuffle

cards.desc:
Onis typically have muscular builds, with horns protruding from their heads, sharp claws, and sometimes various skin tones ranging from dark shades of red, blue, or even green. Their eyes often exhibit a distinct color or glow, adding to their intimidating presence. Onis are commonly depicted with facial features that accentuate their demon-like nature, including sharp fangs and pointed ears.

**– Abilities –**

**Extreme Strength**: Onis are abnormally strong, but they are really bulky. Add +**5** **STR** mod, but -**3** **DEX** mod.

**Durable**: Add +**5** to your **CON** mod.

**Enhanced Pump Up**: Your body is a lot stronger than most races. [https://trello.com/c/lABmjHs2/99-pump-up](https://trello.com/c/lABmjHs2/99-pump-up "smartCard-inline") is a lot more effective for you.
cards.name: Oni

cards.desc:
Heras typically possess distinct features that set them apart from other races. They often have a humanoid appearance with varying teal skin tones and orange hair. Additionally, some members may exhibit unique physical traits like elongated limbs, giving them an imposing and menacing presence.

**– Abilities –**

**Enhanced Physicals**: You are physically adept and have great control over your strong body. Add +**3** to **STR** mod and +**3** to **DEX** mod. Instead of rolling **5d20**, roll **5d20+20** for your stats.

**Treasure Hunters**: You spent most of your time looting and finding treasure. When failing a **search**, you will always find an item. Roll **1d100+10** instead of **1d100**. (Legendary rolls are unaffected by this passive.)

**Enhanced Pump Up**: Your body is a lot stronger than most races. [https://trello.com/c/lABmjHs2/99-pump-up](https://trello.com/c/lABmjHs2/99-pump-up "smartCard-inline")  is a lot more effective for you.
cards.name: Hera

cards.desc:
The Tortles are a wise race of humanoid turtles, known for their deep connection to nature, profound wisdom, and remarkable defensive capabilities. With a strong sense of community, they strive to create peace and prosperity within their own and other communities. These creatures are seen as good fortune to those who cross paths with them and are welcomed with open arms in to most communities, only frowned upon by creatures with evil and nefarious intentions.

– Abilities –

**Master of Defense**: Being a giant turtle has its pros and cons, With your shell you have a **+10 CON** mod with downside of **-5+15% DEX** mod.

**Heavy Shed**: Every week you shed your shell giving a **+10 DEX** mod, at the same time you lose **-5+15% CON** mod. Shell regenerates **4** days after the shed.

**Way of Oogway**: Descendants of the Tortle Master Oogway, you gain a **+2** in **SPI**, **WIL**, and a minimum of **4** INT as you are a sentient turtle. On top of this you are naturally seen as a symbol of good luck and peacefulness, gain an extra **+1** Alignment from all positive tasks

**Shell Rest**: While you have your shell, you have the option to hide in your shell for **+5** modifier to short rests. However, you cannot use healing pods because of your shell.

**Ancient** **Martial Weapon Proficiency:** As Descendants of the Ancient Master Oogway the tortles have a spiritual and physical connection with martial weapons. **-1d3 dex hinderance on Martial weapons** (I.e Katana , Nodachi , Sai , Nun-Chucks, Bo-Staff, Spear , and Power pole)

**Decedents of Way**: Holding saint Oogway to the highest regard all Torless must have, “Way”, in there name.
cards.name: Tortless Way

cards.desc:
Aliens are anything that isn’t specifically listed.

**– Abilities –**

1-3 Custom Abilities. **(MUST BE APPROVED)**
cards.name: Alien

cards.desc:
Androids are mechanical versions of their specified races. Currently, the only known races to be converted are **Cerealian**, **Earthling**, and **Tuffle**. When being converted into an android, reset your stats and roll **5 8d100+(creators INT mod*3)** for your stats and roll **1d15+5** for your intelligence.
Requires **50000** resources to make an Android.

**– Abilities –**

**Nuclear Battery**: Your ki is replaced by charge. Your **SPI** now dictates your potential max charge. Starts at **50%** of the potential max charge. Must be upgraded to be able to use more potential max charge. After combat, your battery is filled back to full. Doing an action that usually takes ki takes charge now. Unlike organics, you cannot regenerate charge in combat.

**Infinite Stamina**: You will never be fatigued by your energy.

**Flesh is Weak**: You cannot eat, sleep, or train. You can make mechanical clones of yourself. When dying, upload your consciousness to a mechanical clone (if you have one). Every facet of yourself can be upgraded through cybernetic enhancements. If you were injured, you must fix the injury through a repair table.
cards.name: Android

cards.desc:
Baby Tuffles are parasites, seeking strong vessels to carry out their plans.
When being converted into an Baby Tuffle, reset your stats and roll **8 8d100+(creators INT mod*10)** for your stats, roll **1d20+5** for your intelligence, and gain a mutation roll.
Requires **950,000/ 1/4th int** resources to make a Baby Tuffle.

**– Abilities –**

**Vesselmonger**: You need a lifeform to take control of. You take **2x** more damage when outside of a body. You are vulnerable to Spirit Fission. When outside of a body, -**7 DEX** mod.

**Life Hijack**: Baby Tuffle can enter into people’s bodies through cuts. When an opponent is bleeding, force them to make a **CON** save with a save of **35**. If failed, the opponent loses their body.

**Parasite Infection**: Leave eggs behind in previous hosts, turning them into Tuffle servants. Victims can roll a **D20** to break free of the parasite every **30** **minutes** or every **5** turns (if in combat). **The victim must critically succeed.**

**My New Body**: Baby Tuffles amplify their vessels and unleash the full potential of their being. Baby Tuffles add their vessel’s stats onto theirs. They also receive the forms and mutations unlocked by the vessel.

**Hateful**: Gain access to Revenge Death Ball.
cards.name: Baby Tuffle

cards.desc:
**– Side Effects –**

**Not Your Blood**: You rely on the blood of living things. You have a blood bar whose limit is equal to **100+(CON mod*3)**. If you do not have any blood in your body for 24 hours, you die.

**Mutated**: You still cherish your original form. Choose **2** abilities to keep from your original race.

**Instant Twitch Muscle Fibers**: Your body’s muscle become insanely efficient, capable of twitching 50 million times faster than normal living entities. Gain **+4 STR** mod and **+4 DEX** mod and advantage to **CON** saving throws..

**Hemophilia**: Blood is extremely enticing to you. The red substance makes your mouth water on sight. When making an entity [https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed](https://trello.com/c/PIHVkdWQ/79-bleed "smartCard-inline"), heal **8** HP.

**Heliophobic**: You feel like the sun is there to harass. Solar Flare blindness lasts for **2** turns longer and **negates all buffs** gained from vampirism.

**Shapeshifting**: You can change how you look, even copying other people’s appearances.

**Longevity**: You can live for 3x longer than earthlings.

**Can Doesn’t Mean Should**: Trying to scientifically modify your body kills you.

**Pseudo-Regeneration**: You know how to use the essence of life to your advantage. You can spend blood in your blood bar to heal equal to 1/4 of the amount spent.

**Abnormal**: You cannot use recovery capsules or ki capsules, and you do not heal from eating senzu beans.

‌

**– Abilities –**

**Suck Blood**
cards.name: Vampire

cards.desc:
Saibamen are plant creatures. **planting seeds and pouring growth liquid over them** will cause a Saibamen to sprout. They are born to kill, and excel at doing so.

**- Abilities -**

**We Are Not The Same:** Saibamen are physical demons out the womb. Instead of rolling **5d20** for stats, you will instead roll **5d50.**

---

**Apex Predator:** Saibamen are quick, and sneaky. They are capable of completely camouflaging themselves, including their ki signatures in areas of vegetation. **+20%** to all Dexterity Saving Throws.

---

**Plant Life:** Saibamen are immune to all forms of poison, and have strong regeneration. They are capable of regenerating limbs on short rests.

---

**Ruler of Many:** Once every saga (Except The First Saga) Saibamen are capable of draining their ki and health to 1 in order to release a seed from their heads. This seed will sprout 24 hours from planting, and will have 1/10th of the stats of the creator. This Saibamen cannot complete any other actions than self destruct, or sparring with their creator.

---

**PTSD:** These beings are capable of firing every synapse in their body at once in order to implode from the inside out. This explosion will instantly end the life of the user, and will deal **(User Current Hp + User Current Ki)** . If there are any hatchlings in the area, the user is able to transfer it’s consciousness to one of them instead of ending their lineage there.

---

**Sharp Claws:** Saibamen have no need for ki blasts or weapons. They use their sharp claws to tear through flesh. Barehanded attacks are capable of tearing off limbs, and **all critically successful attacks apply bleed for 1 turn.**

---

**Simple Minded:** Saibamen roll **1d3** for intelligence instead of **1d10**
cards.name: Saibamen

cards.desc:
The fury of a Saiyan unleashed.

Gain **+5 ALL MODS** (except INT) while the form is active, applying modifiers as needed.

This form can only be triggered by anger. Roll **d20+WIL** mod with a save of **16** when under **50%** HP. This roll can only be done once per battle. Transforming does not take an action.

**Drain**: **20 Energy** per turn.
cards.name: False Super Saiyan

cards.desc:
Big Monke. Scary monke.

**Can be transformed into if you’re a Saiyan with a tail and you look at a full moon/fake moon.**

Gain **+5 ALL MODS** (except INT) while the form is active. Fighting styles and their buffs are lost.

You cannot choose who you attack. Roll **1dX** to choose who to attack where **X** is the number of combatants in the combat.
cards.name: Oozaru

cards.desc:
Your hair flares upwards. Your ki erupts, turning golden.

Gain **+10 ALL MODS** (except INT) while the form is active, applying modifiers as needed. Transforming takes an action. Gain **x50 PL**.

**Drain**: **30 Energy** per turn.

Mastery Level 1: Reduce drain by **10**
Mastery Level 2: Reduce drain by **10.**
Mastery Level 3: Reduce drain by **5.**
Mastery Level 4: Reduce drain by **5**.
Mastery Level 5: Reduce drain by **5.** Gain **+5** **STR** modifier to **attack rolls** **and +5 DEX** modifier to attack and defense rolls. Gain **x65 PL**.
cards.name: Super Saiyan

cards.desc:
Reminiscent of your first awakening, your hair flares up once again, this time being accompanied by lightning that occasionally sparks around your body. Your golden aura is much more intense and condensed than that of your previous form.

Gain **+20 ALL MODS** (except INT) while the form is active, applying modifiers as needed. Gain **x100 PL**.

**Drain**: **100 Energy** per turn

Mastery Level 1: Reduce drain by **20**
Mastery Level 2: Reduce drain by **20.**
Mastery Level 3: Reduce drain by **20.**
Mastery Level 4: Reduce drain by **10**. Gain **+5 STR** modifier to attack rolls and **+5 DEX** modifier to attack and defense rolls.
Mastery Level 5: Reduce drain by **10**. Gain **+5 STR** modifier to attack rolls and **+5 DEX** modifier to attack and defense rolls. Gain **x150 PL**.
cards.name: Super Saiyan 2

cards.desc:
AND THIS… IS TO GO… EVEN FURTHER… BEYOND..! Your scream shakes the heavens and scares the ends of hell. Your ki floods the entire realm with immense pressure.

Gain **+80 ALL MODS** (except INT) while the form is active, applying modifiers as needed. Gain **x400 PL**.

**Drain**: **500 energy** per turn.

Mastery Level 1: Reduce drain by **100.**
Mastery Level 2: Reduce drain by **100.**
Mastery Level 3: Reduce drain by **100.**
Mastery Level 4: Reduce drain by **50**. Gain **+10** **STR** modifier to attack rolls and **+10 DEX** modifier to attack and defense rolls.
Mastery Level 5: Reduce drain by **50**. Gain **+10** **STR** modifier to attack rolls and **+10 DEX** modifier to attack and defense rolls. Gain **x480 PL**.
cards.name: Super Saiyan 3

cards.desc:
Big monke. Scary monke. Monke gold. Monke scarier.

**Can be transformed into if you’re a Saiyan with a tail, you look at a full moon/fake moon, and you have access to Super Saiyan 3.**

Roll a **d20**. When critically **succeeding**, transform into a **Golden Oozaru**, else, transform into a regular **Oozaru**.

Gain **+120 ALL MODS** (except INT) while the form is active. Fighting styles and their buffs are lost. Gain **x700 PL**.

You cannot choose who you attack. Roll **1dX** to choose who to attack where **X** is the number of combatants in the combat.

Every turn, roll **d50.** When critically succeeding, transform and unlock **Super Saiyan 4**.
cards.name: Golden Oozaru

cards.desc:
“That’s right. you may have anticipated my attacks so far, but you have no idea what I’m capable of now… and what you don’t know… could hurt you.” The ultimate form for a mortal saiyan. Embrace your lineage.

Can only be gained through Golden Oozaru.

Gain **+240 ALL MODS** (except INT) while the form is active. Gain **x1200 PL**.

**Drain**: **1000** ki per turn.
cards.name: Super Saiyan 4

cards.desc:
You’ve reached the pinnacle of Saiyan strength. Your mere presence is unstable within reality. It struggles to maintain the amount of ki present.

Gain **+480 ALL STATS** (except INT) while the form is active, applying modifiers as needed. Gain **x4800 PL**.

Drain: **5000** ki each turn
cards.name: Super Saiyan 5

cards.desc:
Your veins bulge out your face as you roar, filling the realm with the presence of your voice. Temporal dimensions start to cave in on themselves as you unleash your power.

Gain **+25 ALL MODS** (except INT) while the form is active, applying modifiers as needed. Gain **+5 ALL MODS** per turn. The modifier gained increases by **5*turn number** each turn.

**+d80** Ki every turn.

**Drain**: **70 Energy** per turn.
cards.name: Legendary Super Saiyan

cards.desc:
You are a descendent of the Three-Eye people, usually worshipped as god-like by Earthlings. These good natured people can see into the souls of people, giving them much more insight than usual.

**Innate**: This form can be used on top of other forms.
**Peaceful Mind**: Cannot be used with forms that cause stress. **(Kaioken, Pump up)**
**Pure Hearted**: Cannot be used when negatively aligned. **(Your third eye closes)**

Every single time you complete a battle, roll **4d100** **+ Awakening mod.** The save is **400.** You gain **+1** to awakening mod each time you fail.

**– Incomplete/Untrained –**

**Soul Insight**: You can see true intents of people’s soul. Roll **1d20** using **3 energy** to see the alignment of a specified entity, negating persuasion and deception rolls if the roll is more than or equal to **10**.

**Enhanced Perception**: Your eye helps your with attacking and defending immensely giving you a whole new perspective. Add **+3 DEX** to defense and attack rolls.

‌

**– Complete/Trained –**

**Maintains the previous abilities of the untrained version.**

**God-like Perception**: You almost perceive things in slow motion. Add **+5 DEX** to defense and attack rolls and add an extra **+2 DEX** to defense and attack rolls if your **DEX** is higher than your opponent’s. When **critically succeeding** a defense roll on a ki attack, **reflect the attack** back onto the opponent, optionally increasing it’s damage by **20%** by spending **10 ki**.

**Proactive Actions**: Before an enemy attacks, you can spend **5** ki and gain **+3** to your defense roll result, and if their attack misses, you can immediately counter with a basic attack. **This stacks with other things that do the same.**

**Life-Force Synergy:** Your mastery over ki allows you to convert your own life force into bursts of power at critical moments. Whenever your health falls below **50%,** you can add an additional **+5** to your **attack rolls** and deal an extra **d25** damage on all **physical** and **ki-based** attacks for **3** turns. Costs **5%** of your max HP each turn it's active. Cannot be canceled early.
cards.name: Third Eye

cards.desc:
The first form of Frost Demons. This is mostly for comfortability, removing the probability of exertion.

Your stats are **1/8** of their normal values, but you gain **1d20 ki** (rounded down) each turn.
cards.name: 1st Form

cards.desc:
The second form of a Frost Demon’s evolution. Your figure grows tall and imposing. You show them a slight taste of your power, alluding to how terrifying you could really be.

You are at **1/4** of all your stats, but you gain **1d10% ki** (rounded down) each round.
cards.name: 2nd Form

cards.desc:
The third form of a Frost Demon’s mutation. Your head enlarges becoming more alien-like, reminding your opponents that you and them are nothing alike.

You are at **1/2** of all your stats, but you gain **1d5% ki** (rounded down) each turn.
cards.name: 3rd Form

cards.desc:
The fourth and final form for many Frost Demons. Your true magnificence is realized.

All your stats are present, but you gain no additional buffs.

**Innate**: This form can be used on top of other forms.
cards.name: 4th Form

cards.desc:
Push yourself to your peak state.

Lose **-5 DEX** mod and gain **+5 STR** mod.

Drain: **80 ki** per turn.

**Mastery Level 1**: Reduce drain by **3.**
**Mastery Level 2**: Reduce drain by **3.** Gain **+6 STR** mod instead.
**Mastery Level 3:** Reduce drain by **5.** Gain **+7 STR** mod instead.
**Mastery Level 4**: Reduce drain by **5**. Gain **+8 STR** mod instead.
**Mastery Level 5**: Reduce drain by **5**. You no longer lose **DEX** from this form. Gain **+9** **STR** mod and **+1 DEX** mod.
**Mastery Level 6**: Reduce drain by **5.** Gain **+2 DEX** mod instead.
**Mastery Level 7**: Reduce drain by **8.** Gain **+3 DEX** mod instead.
**Mastery Level 8**: Reduce drain by **3.** Gain **+4 DEX** mod instead.
**Mastery Level 9**: Reduce drain by **5**. Gain **+5 DEX** mod instead.
**Mastery Level 10**: Reduce drain by **8**. Gain **+6 DEX** and **+10 STR** instead.
**Mastery Level 11**: Reduce drain by **30**. The form is now innate and you don’t look like a musclehead anymore.
cards.name: 100% 4th Form

cards.desc:
You have evolved past the limits of your kin. Breaking your limits, your grow taller and heavier,

You gain **+15 ALL MODS** and you gain **1d10+10**% **ki** each turn. Gain **x75 PL**.

Upon transforming, if you are stronger than your opponent (**PL**), force your opponent to make a **WIL** saving throw with a save of **30**. If you roll higher than your opponent, they receive [https://trello.com/c/GEs5Y73T/89-frighten](https://trello.com/c/GEs5Y73T/89-frighten "smartCard-inline")  for **1d5** turns. This effect can only be triggered once per combat.

**Drain: None**

**Innate**: This form can be used on top of other forms excluding.
cards.name: 5th Form

cards.desc:
Your physical strength and weight to increase greatly, though it does not increase your energy level like other forms do. Your height varies depending on how big you wish to get.

Gain **+3 STR** mod and **+3 CON** mod. Heal **1d10**% (rounded down) of your health back and refill your energy back to max. This effect can only be triggered once per battle.

**Drain: 10 ki per turn.**

**Mastery Level 1**: Add **+3** to your **CON** modifier.
**Mastery Level 2**: Add **+3** to your **WIL** modifier.
**Mastery Level 3**: Gain **1/2 ALL OF YOUR MODS PERMANENTLY**. When the transformation is active, gain **+6 STR** and **+9 CON** instead.
cards.name: Great Namekian

cards.desc:
You and another Namekian decided to fuse, combining your powers.

Gain **2x (YOUR MODS+NAMEKIAN MODS)** permanently. Gain (**YOUR PL + NAMEKIANS**)**x2**

This has a cooldown of **2** sagas.
cards.name: Super Namekian

cards.desc:
You are a specimen amongst the demon clan warriors. You are feared for your absolutely terrifying physique and dominate physical prowess.

**Innate**: You can use this on top of other forms.

Gain **+4 ALL MODS.** Gain **x30 PL**.

**Drain: NONE**

**– Abilities –**

**Intimidating Stature**: Your large frame and broad shoulders intimidate your enemies. Sometimes showing up even causes them to retreat and surrender. Every turn, if bigger and have more **PL** than your opponent, force a **WIL** saving throw of **CON dice+CON** mod.

**Physical Prowess**: Your freak physique amplifies your strength and speed. You can no longer obtain an injury whenever you block an attack.

**Crushing Blows**: Your size can easily make your opponent bend to your will. When attacking an opponent’s block, force them to make a **CON** saving throw with a save of **STR dice+STR** mod. If failed, apply **1** turn of [https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance](https://trello.com/c/4bdXoo2E/138-off-balance "smartCard-inline")
cards.name: Slug

cards.desc:
Unleash your hatred onto the world. Your skin starts to glow a deep blue, revealing all of your hideous features. Orbs of ki start to circle around you, with your ki turning a strange deep blue and mimicking roaring hell flames

Gain **+15** **ALL MODS** (except INT) while the form is active. Transforming does not take an action. Gain **x30 PL**.

Every **-70** alignment increases modifier by **+10** and **PL modifier by x5** more.

Drain: **40** Ki per turn.

**Soul Siphon**: Every punch saps the victim’s energy. On **successful hits/blocked hits**, regain **1d15** ki and cause them the same amount.
cards.name: Dark Devil

cards.desc:
**Begin to unleash your primal rage.**

Gain **+5 ALL MODS** (except INT) while the form is active, applying modifiers as needed.

This form can only be triggered when at 70% Hp and lower, this Transformation Takes an action.

**Drain**: **30 Energy** per turn.

The Hera’n Race **Unlock this form at 10k Base BP**
cards.name: Ultra Power

cards.desc:
Akin to your first Roid Rage your hair flares up once again but this tome out and down as your brows vanish, now being accompanied by Green lightning that occasionally sparks around your body. Your Green aura is much more intense and condensed than that of your previous form.

Gain **+15 Mod** (except INT) while the form is active, applying modifiers as needed. Gain **x75 PL**.

Require Traumatic Experience to Trigger Form. Doesn't take a Turn.
**Minimum** Req- **60k PL**

**Drain**: **80 Energy** per turn

Mastery Level 1: Reduce drain by **5**
Mastery Level 2: Reduce drain by **5 +1 str | +1 con | +1 dex**
Mastery Level 3: Reduce drain by **5**
Mastery Level 4: Reduce drain by **5**. **+2 Str | +2 con | +2 Dex | Instead**
Mastery Level 5: Reduce drain by 1**5**. +3 Str | +2 Con | +2 Dex | Instead
cards.name: Ultimate Power

cards.desc:
The power of your Tribunal Saint _**CBUM**_ flows through you at its highest level.
CBUM
(Tren, Tes, Roids)

Your ki floods the entire planet with Primative Energy (everyone has -5 int) While this form is active, Including you.

Gain +**30 Mods** (except INT) while the form is active, applying modifiers as needed. Gain **x120 PL**.
**Minimum** Req- **100k PL (Base)**

**Drain**: **200 energy** per turn.

Mastery Level 1: Reduce drain by **5.**
Mastery Level 2: Reduce drain by **10**
Mastery Level 3: Reduce drain by **15. +2 str | +2 con | +2 dex**
Mastery Level 4: Reduce drain by **20**.
Mastery Level 5: Reduce drain by **20**. Gain **+8** **STR** modifier to attack rolls and **+5 DEX** modifier to attack and defense rolls, and **+5 CON. Instead**
cards.name: True Tribal Power

cards.desc:
This mutation is caused by literal cosmic radiation reaching a Saiyan. Their size is morphed tremendously, the shortest being 6’5, shoulder broader than any other.

**– Abilities –**

**Frenzy Counters**: You gain **1d3** Frenzy Counters through basic combat every **3** turns.

**Blind Rage**: Upon gaining any **Frenzy Counters**, roll **1d20**. If you roll lower than the amount of **Frenzy Counters.** The rage will cause you to attack randomly, rolling 1d**X** where **X** is the number of the fighters and decides who you attack based on turn order. To exit **Blind Rage**, you will either have to drop to **0** HP or have nothing else to attack.

**Zenkai Burst**: Whenever you drop to **0 HP** and are still alive, roll a **d20** on your turn. If a **16** is rolled, heal back to full and gain **2x** your current stats, but gain **10 Frenzy Counters.** You will be downed after **10+Mastery Mod** turns or if your HP drops to **0** a second time. Gain **+1** Mastery with each use.
**0/100** Mastery and each **10** points is **+1** to **Zenkai Burst** length.

**Legendary Super Saiyan**: You can transform into a legendary super saiyan.
cards.name: Legendary Super Saiyan

cards.desc:
This mutation happened randomly amongst Saiyans, where a warrior with extreme potential is born. Their growth through tough-fought battles is immensely increased.

**– Abilities –**

**Godly Zenkai**: When recovering from a near death situation, you will gain a massive power boost. For this to activate, you must survive a battle with less than 10% of your health. When you recover, you will gain PL x (**(1d40+15)/100**) rounded up.
Ex:
Power Level: 500
Roll 1d40: 22
500 x ((22+15)/100)
500 x .37 = 185
Stat Points Gained: 185
cards.name: Zenkai Strain

cards.desc:
You were born destined for greatness. Your genes mutated in a way that includes both Saiyan and Human potential. Your potential rivals that of frost demon mutants.

**– Abilities –**

**Immense Potential**: You are insanely gifted. Increase training roll result by **3x**. You gain **2** more stat rolls when your potential is unlocked.

**Ultimate**: Your Mystic transformation is way stronger than normal.

**Improved Zenkai**: When recovering from a near death situation, you will gain a massive power boost. For this to activate, you must survive a battle with less than **10%** of your health. When you recover, you will gain PL x (**(1d25+15)/100**) rounded up.
Ex:
Power Level: 500
Roll 1d25: 19
500 x ((19+15)/100)
500 x .34 = 170
Stat Points Gained: 170
cards.name: Extreme Potential

cards.desc:
When forced into extreme situations, you tap into 100% of your potential and then some more. Your body starts to seemingly pull energy from its surroundings.

When under 20% of your HP with extreme stakes (last stand with planet/galaxy/universe at stake), activate following abilities:

**– Abilities –**

**Renewed Reason**: Your body is revitalized with burning passion for battle. Heal back to **half**.

**My Weapon is Judgement**: Your sword/fists are engulfed by your ki, giving you +**20** **STR** mod and removing the **DEX** mod debuff if using a weapon on your attacks. Your weapon cannot break and will not lose durability from attacking. If the opponent blocks your attack, 40% of the attack goes through no matter what. Decapitation rolls have the same requirement as amputation rolls.

**Give Me Everything**: You feel your body’s life force steadily drain, turning your body itself into a weapon. Your **HP** is converted into energy, losing **10%** HP per turn. Add +**75** **SPI** mod to your Max Ki and **set your energy back to max. If you drop to 0 HP** **from this passive, you die** **immediately**. Consumables that restore **HP** are ineffective.
cards.name: Hope of the Universe

cards.desc:
You were born with an extra eye on your forehead, increasing your perception. It is docile until activated. This can be improved until it is active at all times.

**– Abilities –**

**Third Eye**: You have access to the **Third Eye** transformation.
cards.name: Third Eye

cards.desc:
You have evolved past your predecessors. Your body has crushed your racial limits and have attained a new ceiling of power.

**– Abilities –**

**5th Form**: You can use the fifth transformation of Frost Demon
cards.name: 5th Transformation

cards.desc:
From birth, your power was abnormally (and almost unnaturally) high. You were usually abysmally stronger than the fighters that opposed you. You never really had to struggle for strength.

**– Abilities –**

**Abnormal Growth**: Your body easily adapts to stresses your body is placed under and repairs quite fast under rest. When rolling a dice for training, add **+%25** to the roll and multiply the result by **1d2+1** on top of gravity multipliers.

**Born Ruler**: Your natural strength makes the universe bow its head. When rolling for your initial stats, roll **5 2d80+40** instead of **5d20**.

**Prone to Comfortability**: Since you never really had to struggle or train much, it is much harder to control your power. Your mastery requirements on transformations are **4x** harder. You cannot master other forms when you haven’t mastered the previous form.

- **Second Form**: Roll **d100**+Fail Modifier
  The success save is **75**
  [2 levels of mastery]
  Level 1 = 1/6 normal stats
  Level 2 = 1/4 normal stats
  Add **+1** to mastery roll every fail.
- **Third Form**: Roll **2d100**+Fail Modifier
  The success save is total **195**
  [3 levels of mastery]
  Level 1 = 1/3 normal stats
  Level 2 = 1/2 normal stats
  Level 3 = Increase regeneration to **1d7%** **energy**
  Add **+1** to mastery roll every fail.
- **Final Form**: Roll **3d100**+Fail Modifier
  The success save is **295**
  [4 levels of mastery]
  Level 1 = Base
  Level 2 = x1.10
  Level 3 = x1.15 normal stats
  Level 4 = x1.20 normal stats
  Add **+1** to mastery roll every fail..
- **100% Final Form:** Roll 4d100+Fail Modifier
  The success save is **399**
  [5 levels of mastery]
  **Level 0**: Base  | Lose **-3 DEX** mod and gain **+6 STR** mod.
  **Level 1**: x1.05 | Reduce drain by **5**|Gain **+7 STR** mod instead.
  **Level 2:** x1.10 | Reduce drain by **10**|Gain **+8 STR** mod instead.
  **Level 3**: x1.15 | Reduce drain by **5**|Gain **+9 STR** mod instead.
  **Level 4:** x1.20 | Reduce drain by **10**|Gain **+9** **STR** mod and **+1 DEX** mod.
  **Level 5**: x1.25 | Reduce drain by  **10**|Gain **+2 DEX** mod instead.
  Drain: **100 ki** per turn.
cards.name: Prodigious Achievement

cards.desc:
Your body was always a lot tougher than your namekian peers. You are also quite bigger and bulkier.

**CANNOT BE SELECTED IF NOT DEMON CLAN**

**– Abilities –**

**Slug**: You gain access to your slug form.

**Extreme Durability**: Reroll your **CON** stat with **1d60**. Add **1d20** to your **CON** checks. You gain **1d15+training modifier** **CON** from training.

**Bulky**: Your bulk makes you noticeably slower than most. Roll **-1d4** on your **DEX** attack and defense modifier.

**Enhanced Regeneration**: Your abnormal body regenerates far easier than your peers. Regeneration now only takes **5** ki instead of **10** and healing injuries now only causes a **5%** loss to stats.
cards.name: Slug

cards.desc:
You are extremely wise. Your wisdom sometimes terrifies people and shake their beliefs.

**CANNOT BE SELECTED IF NOT DRAGON CLAN**

**– Abilities –**

**Understanding of Dormant Power**: You fully understand how much potential someone has and how to draw it out. Gain the ability to **unlock potential**. Cooldowns still apply.

**Ki Mastery**: You have fully mastered ki. Gain fully mastered [https://trello.com/c/YRZlRLnn/133-ki-efficiency](https://trello.com/c/YRZlRLnn/133-ki-efficiency "smartCard-inline") and [https://trello.com/c/4ABhYGJp/116-ki-sense](https://trello.com/c/4ABhYGJp/116-ki-sense "smartCard-inline").

**Pacifist**: You think combat is meaningless. Gain **disadvantage** to all attacking throws. Gain the ability to persuade in combat, forcing a **WIL** saving throw with a save of **17+SPI** mod. If failed, opponent gains **-12** to retreat chase rolls. Additionally, gain **+7 with advantage** to all persuasion checks.

**Maker**: Your wisdom allows you to make dragon balls much easier. Creating dragon balls now only costs **100** ki.
cards.name: Wise Old One

cards.desc:
This mutation is rumored to occur every few thousand years, when a genius Cerealian falls under extreme stress, or becomes absorbed with vengeance.

**– Abilities –**

**Greater Mastery**: **All Cerealian abilities are slightly buffed**.

**Evolved Right Eye:** costs **5** energy, reroll advantage **+2** on ki attacks.

**Exception Perception:** applies every **4** turns. Roll a **d4** every **4** turns, and if it lands on **4**, then subtract **3** from enemy **DEX** rolls for the rest of combat

**Vital Strike:** costs **3** energy, and drains **d16+WIL** mod energy from opponent.

**Raphael**: You are much stronger than average, allowing your **STR**, **CON**, and **SPI** stats to be rolled with a **d30+10**, while you’re far more adaptive to **DEX**, and **WIL**, allowing you to roll both as a **d40+5**, In addition to this, any mastery requirements will be subsequently lowered by **25%.**

**Hellbent**: Your goal of killing the Gods of Destruction plagues your mind, even when you lay down your head to rest. Gain **2** extra dice when rolling for training.

**Stone Cold**: While facing a seemingly unstoppable foe, your character will stay levelheaded, and be immune to mental related disadvantages.

**Burnout**: As you try too hard in any given field, resting is almost entirely useless. You will not heal while resting unless it’s midnight, where you will only recover half your health points instead of all of them. Adversely, you are still able to recover fatigue and ki this way.
cards.name: Hunter of Legend

cards.desc:
Dragonball DND


Public


Power-Ups

Automation

Filters
Share
Getting Started
Basic
Combat Mechanic
Roleplay Action
Race
Mutation
Known Ability
Technique
Transformation
Fighting Style
Status
Disease
Legendary Item
Item
cards.name: Dragonball DND

cards.desc:
The messenger of Death. You bring the feeling of doom with your very presence. Hell spat you out because you were too bitter for its gaping maw. Bastardized by your very home, you roam the overworld searching...

**Mistake:** Your very being is a mistake. Unlike many Onis, your bulky muscles do not slow you down. Negate the **DEX** penalty applied from being an Oni.

**Fuel the Flames of Hatred:** You feed off negative energy. Gain **+2** to **ALL MODS** for every **-70** alignment.

**Damned:** Cannot gain access to God Ki. When fighting against foes with God Ki, gain **+5** to **DEX** and **STR** rolls. You also no longer gain disadvantage when fighting foes with God Ki.

**Tormented**: Cannot meditate, but gains **+1 SPI** mod every **5** kills. Kills also heal **+10** HP and **+5** Ki. **(ONLY FROM COMBAT)**

**Unleashed:** Gain access to Dark Devil form.
cards.name: Dread-forged Ashen Soul

cards.desc:
A simple transformation for a simple creature. This mutation of a mutation is red in hue, and is much angrier and self aware than the rest of it’s kind.

\+1 Strength Modifier
\+1 Con Modifier
\+1 Dexterity Modifier
\+1 on Intelligence roll
cards.name: Red Saibamen

cards.desc:
**Mutant Turtle** (the teenage kind) Unstable Mutation: When you have your shell you get +12 CON and -8 DEX MODS and without your shell you get +12 DEX and -8 CON |

**Rough Scales**: Your scales are stronger than regular turtles, roll a d20 on any bladed attack heading your way, If you roll above 15 the weapon will lose 1 d3 durability and deal 1 d10 less damage Shrug it off: after an opponent is granted a crit roll a d20, rolling above 15 will negate the crits damage and the effects of the crit

**Godly Defense**: Every time you would get +1 for your CON mod you get +2
cards.name: TNMT

cards.desc:
**Actions**: Actions are the main moves a player can take in a turn. These include making attacks with physical or ki abilities, which can trigger -_Extra Attack_- passive (if the player has it), or performing strategic maneuvers like the HELP/SAVE action.

The HELP/SAVE action is crucial for supporting downed allies, as it lets players stabilize allies close to dying, preventing them from failing additional death saves.
cards.name: Action

cards.desc: **Bonus Actions:** Bonus actions are quick, secondary moves that add flexibility and versatility to a turn. Players can use them to activate specific moves or abilities, heal themselves, or heal allies who are still fighting. These actions offer tactical support options, letting players stay in the fight longer or protect others without using up their primary action for the turn.
cards.name: Bonus Actions

cards.desc:
The basic universal currency to purchase things. You can buy things ranging from food to spaceships with it. You can obtain zeni by doing missions and honest work.

Alternatively, you could go down a dark path and take what isn’t yours. Whether it be lives or wallets…

Zeni, no matter the quantity, only takes up one inventory slot.

Zeni  for _Basic Mission_ = _**5000$**_
Zeni  for a _Challenging Mission_ = _**10000$**_
Zeni  for a Extremely Challenging mission = _**15000$**_
Zeni  for a Saga Mission = _**30000$ (Unless stated otherwise)**_
cards.name: Zeni

cards.desc:
This is where you’ll store all of your items.

Normally, you can only hold 10 items at a time, but with upgrades you can hold more. You can buy inventory upgrades at merchants or make them yourself.

**EACH UPGRADE ADDS 10 CAPACITY TO YOUR INVENTORY**.

You can store items above your inventory limit, but every time you travel, roll a **d20**. If you roll below a **12**, you lose **1d5** items.
cards.name: Inventory

cards.desc:
You will find many items while wandering the world, most of which will be sold in markets. Some are legendary items that can only be found by exploring.

Items have four classes: **Combat, Consumables, Training,** and **Legendary**.

**Combat items** are items that you would use to fight. i.e Sword, scouter, armor. These items can be broken during combat.

**Consumable Items** are items that can be used at any time. Once used, they disappear from your inventory. i.e Senzu bean,

**Training items** are items that give you skill points when you fight with them. They do count as armor, so you’d need to take it off before you can use your actual combat armor.

**Legendary Items** are items that cannot be obtained through normal means, and must be found or wished. **Combat Items** can be turned into **Legendary Items** through wishing if you do not want to risk the item breaking.
cards.name: Items

cards.desc:
Eating replenishes your ki.

Roll **1d10** + the food modifier to see how much ki you regenerate.

Saiyans and Half-Saiyans have a **HUGE** appetite. Roll **1d20** + the food modifier instead.

Namekians do not need to eat as much. Roll **1d5** + the food modifier instead.

**Ex:**

Race: Human (roll d10)
Roll: 3+5 = 8
Energy Regained: 8*0.1 = 0.8 = 80%

**Ex2:**

Race: Saiyan (roll d20)
Roll: 12+2 = 14
Energy Regained: 14/2 = 7*0.1 = 0.7 = 70%

**Ex3:**

Race: Namekian (roll d5)
Roll: 3+6 = 9 (higher than 5 so roll = 5)
Energy Regained: 5\*2 = 10\*0.1 = 1 = 100%
cards.name: Eating

cards.desc: **REFER TO /CREATE ON THE BOT**
cards.name: Enemy Creation

cards.desc:
When doing quests, they can either be negatively aligned or positively aligned.

Low rank negatively/positively aligned quests give **-2/+2** alignment per quest.

Challenging negatively/positively aligned quests give **-4/+4** alignment per quest.

Very challenging negatively/positively aligned quests give **-12/+12** alignment per quest.

Story quests give **-25/+25** alignment depending on which side you took.

Canon actions give **+30/-30** alignment depending on which side you took.

---

Alignment can control how certain NPCs/Mentors talk to you. Some don’t care about your alignment, but most do. Also, your alignment can get you in trouble with the law. Goku Will Also Attempt to stop you from being evil.
cards.name: Alignment

cards.desc:
The infinitely expansive home of the non-living. Many spiritual and god-like entities live here in peace, while some are tortured in eternal damnation. You are sent here after dying, judged by King Yemma.

If your alignment was **Good**:
You can reincarnate with **25%** of your stats from when you were living, keeping your **SPI** stat and **Max Ki** from before.

If your alignment was **Neutral**:
You can reincarnate, but you won’t keep any of your stats from when you were living.

If your alignment was **Bad**:
You can try to persuade King Yemma. Roll a **d20**. The save is **20**. If saved, you can reincarnate as if you were neutral. Otherwise, you will be sent to hell, unable to participate in any world events until 2 sagas pass. The only way to bring you back is through revival or reincarnation at that point.

You do not have to reincarnate. Alternatively, you can wait for someone to revive you or you can try to train in the otherworld. Training in the otherworld yields **3.5x** more results, and sparring is **2x** as effective.
cards.name: Afterlife/Otherworld

cards.desc: A form of currency that allows you to craft things. You can get it through gathering resources. [https://trello.com/c/4tygswOs/120-resource-gather](https://trello.com/c/4tygswOs/120-resource-gather "smartCard-inline") Resources, no matter the quantity, only take up one inventory slot.
cards.name: Resource

cards.desc:
Traveling through the world is part of **Dragon Ball**, and you can find many new places and wonders of the world through traveling.

When on a planet, you can roll a dice to travel to a new area or existing with the following dice:

Earth’s Moon: D25 | +6 on ore rolls
**Earth**: **D75**

Random Moon: D15 | +5 on ore rolls
Random Barron Planet: D40 | +4 on ore rolls
Random Low Tech Planet: D45 | +2 on ore rolls
Random High Tech Planet: D60 | -2 on ore rolls

**Namek**: **D75**
Namek’s Blue Moon: D15 | +10 ore rolls
Namek’s Orange Moon: D25 | +5 ore rolls

**Yardrat**: **D50**

Frieza Empire Controlled Planet: D75

---

You can find very useful places, usually with some sort of canonical relevance to the story or a mentor to teach new abilities. If you roll on any of these within their specified planets (if not already found), ping Chilly in the Discord. Here’s a list of all important places right now:

**World Tournament Arena**: 24, Earth
**Goku’s House**: 3, Earth (doesnt exist)
**Roshi’s Island**: 36, Earth
**West City**: 45, Earth
**North City**: 1, Earth
**East City**: 6, Earth
**Satan City:** 17, Earth
**South City**: 31, Earth
**Capsule Corp**: 46, Earth
**Kami’s Lookout**: 41, Earth
**Korin’s Tower**: 40, Earth
**Crane School**: 10, Earth

Traveling uses **8** KI every time. You can travel to an area adjacent to the current one you already are at for **4** Ki instead.
cards.name: Traveling

cards.desc:
You can search **7 times per new area**. This limit resets every midnight. Searching takes **3 Ki**.

By searching, you can find gear, quests, and characters/mentors.
For quests, check [https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation](https://trello.com/c/KcB4fRPm/117-enemy-creation "smartCard-inline") and [https://trello.com/c/ugKoYqi8/110-alignment](https://trello.com/c/ugKoYqi8/110-alignment "smartCard-inline")!

Roll a **1d100.**

_**Saga Mission**_

if the number is **higher than or equal to 93 but lower than 98**, you found a **story quest**! This quest’s difficulty changes based on the saga and can even be the reason for a saga change. Notify your friends or create enemies! You will fight a character, depending on your alignment, from the original Dragon Ball anime, respective to the saga and timeline. **THESE CAN ONLY BE ROLLED ON EARTH AS OF NOW. IF NOT ON EARTH, ROLL A d2. 1 = Mentor (if none, do a challenging quest) 2 = Challenging Quest.**
(Or Optionally Do a Backstory involved mission, must be approved my Tae, chilly or wolfie.)

Completing these quests gives (**d90+30 x saga number**) stat points and **500d100** zeni to whoever helped/opposed.
